中文标题: 采用高能量吸收弹性体的新型减震材料
整编内容:
美国约翰斯霍普金斯大学研究人员开发出一种全新减震材料，可像金属一样提供防护性能，但质量更轻、性能更强，并且可以重复使用。这种新的泡沫状材料有望应用于头盔、防弹衣以及航空航天部件等多种领域。研究结果发表在《先进材料》杂志上。
该团队起初的设想是创造一种比目前的汽车保险杠和头盔衬垫减震性能更佳的材料。因为他们注意到这些关键保护设备的典型材料在高速下性能表现不佳，并且通常不可重复使用。研究人员希望开发一种可重复使用的结构材料，使其在很宽的应变率范围内均表现出较强的能量吸收能力，以增强振动和冲击保护性能。经研究发现，一种名为高能量吸收液晶弹性体（LCE）的材料能够在减轻重量的同时增加强度，这是由于LCE的粘弹性行为导致能量吸收速率增加造成的。而且，LCE材料可以通过改变介晶排列程度和相对于导向器的加载方向来调节能量吸收速率。在测试材料承受冲击能力的实验中，它能够抵抗重约4到15磅的物体撞击，速度高达每小时22英里。
在这项研究中，研究人员使用LCE作为简单一维元结构材料，但未来通过系统结构设计有望进一步增强能量吸收。这一设想不仅有助于对LCE结构非线性能量吸收机制的理解，而且有助于扩展轻质、极端能量吸收材料的应用前景，例如航空航天领域中发动机支架隔振或者关键部件的冲击防护等。
整编机构: 中国航发航材院
源标题: Shock-absorbing material could lead to stronger, lighter and safer helmets and vehicles
原文:
"We are excited about our findings on the extreme energy absorption capability of the new material," said senior author Sung Hoon Kang, an assistant professor of mechanical engineering. "The material offers more protection from a wide range of impacts, but being lighter could reduce fuel consumption and the environmental impact of vehicles while being more comfortable for protective gear wearers."
Kang, who is also a fellow at the Hopkins Extreme Materials Institute, wanted to create a material even more energy-absorbing than current car bumpers and helmet padding. He noticed the typical materials used for these critical protective devices don't perform well at higher speeds and often aren't reusable.
The research team was able to add strength while reducing weight with high energy-absorbing liquid crystal elastomers (LCEs), which have been used mainly in actuators and robotics.
During experiments to test the material's ability to withstand impact, it held up against strikes from objects weighting about four to 15 pounds, coming at speeds of up to about 22 miles per hour. The tests were limited to 22 miles per hour due to limits of the testing machines, but the team is confident the padding could safely absorb even greater impacts.
Liquid crystal elastomer structure tested in drop tester machine. Credit: Johns Hopkins University
Kang and his team are exploring a collaboration with a helmet company to design, fabricate, and test next-generation helmets for athletes and the military.
The results appeared in the journal Advanced Materials.
中文原文: 机械工程助理教授、资深作者宋勋康（Sung Hoon Kang）说：“我们对这种新材料的极端能量吸收能力的发现感到兴奋。”“这种材料提供了更多的保护，免受各种影响，但更轻可以减少车辆的燃料消耗和环境影响，同时对佩戴防护装备的人来说更舒适。”康也是霍普金斯极限材料研究所的研究员，他想创造一种比目前的汽车保险杠和头盔垫更能吸收能量的材料。他注意到，用于这些关键保护装置的典型材料在更高的速度下性能不佳，而且往往不可重复使用。研究小组能够通过高能量吸收液晶弹性体（LCEs）在减轻重量的同时增加强度，该弹性体主要用于执行器和机器人。在测试这种材料的抗冲击能力的实验中，它能抵抗大约4到15磅重的物体的撞击，速度高达每小时22英里。由于测试机器的限制，测试被限制在每小时22英里，但团队相信填充物可以安全地吸收更大的冲击。液晶弹性体结构在落差测试仪机上测试。信用：约翰·霍普金斯大学康和他的团队正在探索与一家头盔公司合作，为运动员和军队设计、制造和测试下一代头盔。研究结果发表在《先进材料》杂志上。
中文源标题: 减震材料可导致更坚固、更轻和更安全的头盔和车辆

中文标题: 微太空公司成功测试软件定义无线电技术
情报来源: 美国旅行者太空公司官方网站
整编内容: 8月23日，美国微太空公司（Space Micro）宣布，该公司的软件定义无线电（SDR）技术已在导弹防御局“立方星网络通信实验模块1”（CNCE Block 1）任务中成功测试。任务中，导弹防御局部署了2颗由微太空公司研发、携带射频（RF）有效载荷的立方星，并从不同距离、阵列、方位测试了SDR技术，结果显示，立方星之间及与地面终端均成功进行了通信，这一结果将进一步支持美国导弹防御技术及体系架构发展。本次实验是导弹防御局“纳米卫星试验平台计划”（NTI）的一部分，该项计划通过小型低成本卫星演示纳米卫星在轨期间的网络无线电通信情况。
整编机构: 中国航天系统科学与工程研究院
源标题: Voyager’s Space Micro Software Defined Radio Supports Success of Missile Defense Agency’s CubeSat Networked Communications Experiment
原文:
SAN DIEGO, Aug. 23, 2022 /PRNewswire/ — Space Micro Inc., powered by Voyager Space, today announced the successful performance of its Software Defined Radios (SDRs) on Missile Defense Agency’s (MDA) CubeSat Networked Communications Experiment (CNCE) Block 1. Initially launched in June 2021 and completed in March 2022, CNCE Block 1, which is part of MDA’s Nanosat Testbed Initiative (NTI), used small, low-cost satellites to demonstrate networked radio communications between nanosatellites while in orbit.
MDA deployed two CubeSats developed by Space Micro with integrated radio frequency (RF) payloads based on its μSDR-C? family of small form factor software defined radios. MDA tested Space Micro’s SDRs at various distances, formations, and orientations, all of which successfully communicated with each other and ground nodes. This demonstration helps support the development of U.S. missile defense technology and architecture.
SDRs can be re-programmed on orbit making them desirable in today’s rapidly changing world. Space Micro designed these particular radios, which are a precursor to the Company’s successful Nanocom family of SDRs, with the additional ability to create and operate within an ad-hoc communication network, similar to a terrestrial Wi-Fi network.
“We are proud to support MDA as they bolster our national defense, and to further demonstrate the capabilities and reliability of our RF radio frequency payloads for inter-satellite communications,” said David R. Czajkowski, Space Micro CEO.
“The Space Micro team continues to demonstrate flight-proven solutions that provide value to our national defense capabilities,” said Matt Kuta, President and COO of Voyager Space. “This successful demonstration of SDR technology is a critical step forward for the future of in space communications.”
MDA retired the Block 1 satellites in March 2022 and they will de-orbit and burn up harmlessly in the atmosphere.
Space Micro’s SDR product line comprises several models: The ?SDR-C? targets UHF, S-Band, L-Band and low C-Band applications, the more powerful Nanocom? targets higher frequency, higher data rate, and more processor intensive RF applications, and the ?XBT? X-Band Transponder is slated for several Artemis programs. Space Micro legacy S-, X- and Ka-Band radios are on orbit today on NASA IRIS, an observation mission of the solar atmosphere and NASA TESS, an exo-planet survey mission to provide prime targets for the James Webb Space Telescope.”
中文原文: 圣地亚哥2022年8月23日电/PRNewswire/--由旅行者太空公司提供动力的太空微公司今天宣布，其软件定义无线电（SDRs）在导弹防御局(MDA)立方体卫星网络通信实验(CNCE)1号区块上取得成功。CNCE Block 1最初于2021年6月发射，2022年3月完成，是MDA纳米卫星测试床倡议(NTI)的一部分，使用小型低成本卫星演示在轨纳米卫星之间的网络化无线电通信。MDA部署了两个由Space Micro开发的立方体卫星，该卫星具有基于其μSDR-C的集成射频(RF)有效载荷？小型软件无线电系列。MDA在不同的距离、编队和方向上测试了Space Micro的SDR，所有SDR都成功地与彼此和地面节点进行了通信。这一演示有助于支持美国导弹防御技术和体系结构的发展。SDR可以在轨道上重新编程，这使得它们在当今快速变化的世界中是可取的。Space Micro设计了这些特殊的无线电，这是该公司成功的Nanocom系列SDR的先驱，具有额外的能力，可以在类似于地面Wi-Fi网络的特设通信网络中创建和操作。Space Micro首席执行官David R.Czajkowski说：“我们为支持MDA而感到自豪，因为它们支持我们的国防，并进一步展示我们用于卫星间通信的RF射频有效载荷的能力和可靠性。”“太空微型团队继续展示经过飞行验证的解决方案，为我们的国防能力提供价值，”旅行者太空公司总裁兼首席运营官马特·库塔说。“SDR技术的成功演示是空间通信未来向前迈出的关键一步.”MDA于2022年3月退役了Block 1卫星，它们将脱离轨道，在大气层中无害地燃烧。Space Micro的SDR产品线包括几个型号：？SDR-C？针对UHF、S波段、L波段和低C波段的应用，更强大的Nanocom？目标是更高的频率、更高的数据速率和更多处理器密集型的RF应用，以及？XBT？X波段转发器被安排用于几个Artemis项目。太空微型遗产S-、X和Ka波段无线电今天在美国宇航局IRIS和美国宇航局TESS的轨道上运行，前者是对太阳大气的观测任务，后者是对外行星的勘测任务，为詹姆斯·韦伯太空望远镜提供主要目标。“

中文标题: 加拿大即将装备TRG M10狙击步枪
整编内容:
加拿大政府选定芬兰萨科公司研制的TRG M10狙击步枪用作新型远程步枪，计划于2022年底交付。
TRG M10狙击步枪采用旋转后拉式枪机，有多种口径，手动操作，可肩扛式发射；采用弹匣供弹，配有大容量弹匣和完全可调的枪托，可配装多种枪弹，适用于不同作战任务。该枪采用高度模块化设计，使狙击步枪成为多功能平台，可在几分钟之内实现远程精密步枪到紧凑型精确支援武器的转换。
TRG M10狙击步枪最大射程1500米，有效射程1200米；其最大的亮点是能够在两种口径间进行切换，可发射.338马格南枪弹和.308温彻斯特枪弹（7.62×51毫米北约制式枪弹）。该枪具有指示器，可帮助识别不同口径的不同模块化组件，其中每个口径相关组件都有特殊标记，因此用户可通过视觉或触摸识别每个零件的口径。
整编机构: 北方科技信息研究所
源标题: Canadian troops to get Sako TRG M10 sniper rifles
原文:
Defense News June 2022 Global Security army industry
ARTICLE CATEGORY
POSTED ON SUNDAY, 12 JUNE 2022 16:49
As reported by Boyko Nikolov in Bulgarian Military, the Finnish sniper weapon system Sako TRG M10 was selected for the new long-range rifle by the Canadian government and according to information circulated in the Canadian media 229, units of this sniper rifle should be delivered by the end of 2022.
The TRG M10 is a bolt-action sniper rifle that is available in multiple calibers, manually operated and shoulder-fired, as well as magazine-fed. It has a high-capacity magazine and fully adjustable stock that make it a multi-functional system in a single weapon, suitable for many different circumstances. A high level of configurability make the TRG M10 an extremely versatile platform: it easily converts from a true long-range precision rifle to a more compact piece of equipment. The maximum operating range is up to 1,500 meters, but the proven effective range is up to 1,200 meters.
Fully adjustable rear stock: all adjustments can be done quickly without the use of any tools. The stock can also be securely locked down when required by using tools that come inside the weapon. The pistol grip has an interchangeable back strap in three different sizes; all three are included in the standard package. Tactile indicators: identification of modular components for different calibers can be done visually or from tactile indicators placed on each critical component. Ambidextrous controls: the ambidextrous controls are well within the reach of the firing hand and are large enough to be also operated with gloves on. The robust and fully adjustable trigger unit can be detached for maintenance and adjustment without further disassembling the weapon.
Saco TRG M10 is considered an evolution in the design of sniper rifles and was officially unveiled more than ten years ago, in October 2011. One of the impressive key features is the ability of the sniper rifle to switch from one to the second caliber: between .308 Winchester [7.62 × 51mm NATO], .300 Winchester Magnum, and .338 Lapua Magnum chamberings by changing the bolts: the TRG M10 has indicators that help identify different modular components for different calibers, where each caliber-depending component is specially marked so users can recognize the caliber of each part visually or by touch. To completely switch from one caliber to another, the shooter still has to change magazines, forends, and barrels.
中文原文: 国防新闻2022年6月全球安全陆军工业文章类别发布于2022年6月12日星期日16:49据保加利亚军方的博伊科·尼科洛夫（Boyko Nikolov）报道，加拿大政府选择芬兰狙击武器系统Sako TRG M10作为新的远程步枪，根据加拿大媒体229流传的信息，这种狙击步枪的单位应该在2022年底交付。TRG M10是一个螺栓行动狙击步枪，可在多种口径，手动操作和肩发射，以及弹夹喂。它有一个大容量的弹匣和完全可调节的库存，使它成为一个单一武器的多功能系统，适用于许多不同的情况。高水平的可配置性使TRG M10成为一个极其通用的平台：它很容易从一个真正的远程精确步枪转换成一个更紧凑的设备。最大作用射程可达1500米，但已探明有效射程可达1200米。完全可调节的后部库存：所有的调整都可以快速完成，无需使用任何工具。当需要时，通过使用武器内部的工具，库存也可以安全地锁定。手枪握把有三种不同尺寸的可互换背带；所有这三个都包含在标准包中。触觉指示器：识别不同口径的模块化组件可以通过视觉或触觉指示器放置在每个关键组件上。双功能控制装置：双功能控制装置在射击手的触手可及范围内，并且足够大，也可以戴着手套操作。坚固和完全可调的触发单元可以拆卸以进行维护和调整，而无需进一步拆卸武器。中美合作公司TRG M10被认为是狙击步枪设计的一个进化，并于十多年前，2011年10月正式亮相。令人印象深刻的关键特征之一是狙击步枪能够从一种口径切换到第二种口径：通过改变螺栓，在0.308温彻斯特[7.62×51mm NATO]、.300温彻斯特梦龙和.338拉普亚梦龙之间:TRG M10有指示器，有助于识别不同口径的不同模块组件，每个取决于口径的组件都有特别标记，因此用户可以通过视觉或触摸识别每个部件的口径。要完全从一种口径切换到另一种口径，射手仍然必须更换弹夹、前角和枪管。

中文标题: 以色列国防工业将在巴黎防务会议上展示新武器
整编内容:
以色列国防部国际防务合作局（SIBAT）预计将于6月13日在巴黎举行的萨托里（Eurosatory）防务展上展示该国的国防工业，并为56家当地公司的以色列馆揭幕。SIBAT欧洲和北美主管阿米拉·亚妮（Amira Ilany）表示，欧洲是最重要的市场之一，以色列看到了全世界对其“尖端技术”的兴趣。以色列拥有三大防务公司：拉斐尔先进防御系统公司、以色列航空工业公司和埃尔比特系统公司。
对于萨托里防务展厅的数十家以色列公司来说，主要主题是先进技术。这包括人工智能的使用、识别威胁或目标系统的精准度、无人平台和地面部队的高端应用、自主系统、实时数据链、热成像和监视技术。例如，拉斐尔公司于6月9日宣布了其新型“长钉”（Spike）非瞄准线导弹系统（NLOS）第6代精确导弹，该型号导弹改进防区外射程（高达50公里），可以同时发射多达四枚导弹，并且可以从一个平台（例如直升机）发射，并结合图像匹配能力，移交给地面作战人员进行指导。拉斐尔还表示，它正在展示一种称为“NLOS任务特遣队”（NMT）的新概念，这是一种使小型单位能够与远处或隐藏目标交战的技术包。
整编机构: 北京航天情报与信息研究所
源标题: Israel’s defense industry unveils new weapons at Paris defense confab
原文:
JERUSALEM — Israel’s Ministry of Defense International Defense Cooperation Directorate, or SIBAT, is expected to helm a strong showing of the country’s defense industry at the Eurosatory defense exhibition beginning on June 13 in Paris, inaugurating an Israeli pavilion featuring 56 local companies.
Amira Ilany, director for Europe and North America at SIBAT, said that “Europe is one of the most important markets that we have.” She said Israel is seeing interest in its “cutting-edge technologies” all over the world. Israel has three large defense companies: Rafael Advanced Defense Systems, Israel Aerospace Industries and Elbit Systems.
SIBAT officials are expected to help promote the country’s small and medium enterprises, in particular. The government views these smaller companies “as an important part of the ministry’s value system. We deem it of the highest importance to strengthen these innovative industries, and many of them will be participating in the upcoming Eurosatory exhibition,” said Ilany.
For the dozens of Israeli companies on the Eurosatory show floor the main theme is advanced technology. That includes the use of artificial intelligence, precision in either identifying threats or targeting systems, unmanned platforms and high-end applications for ground forces, autonomous systems, real-time data links, thermal sights and surveillance technologies.
These innovations, some of which are operational in Israel or already being demonstrated abroad, build on Israel’s recent multi-year defense plan, dubbed Momentum. The plan focuses on pushing technology to frontline units and knitting together formations using data and communications. Israel’s political leadership has recently highlighted a move into laser air defenses, and across the spectrum of Israel’s defense industry there is a drive to incorporate AI as well as doubling down on target recognition and situational awareness.
The result is that Israeli companies go to Europe with a cluster of recently developed technologies or increased capabilities for existing systems that they have unveiled recently, many pegged to Eurosatory.
For example, Rafael announced its new Spike NLOS 6th-generation precision missile on June 9. Rafael’s Spike family is used by 39 countries. In Europe it is sold under the name Eurospike, a joint venture between Rafael, Diehl Defence GmbH and Rheinmetall Electronics.
Rafael says its newest variant has improved standoff range (up to 50km), can be launched in a salvo of up to four missiles and can be fired from one platform, such as a helicopter, and handed off for guidance to operators on the ground. It incorporates image-matching abilities, according to the manufacturer
Alongside the new missile, Rafael said it is exhibiting a “new concept called the NLOS Mission Taskforce,” or NMT, a technology package enabling small units to engage faraway or hidden targets.
Rafael links the importance of these systems to the overall need for mobility on the battlefield as well as force protection with systems like its Spyder air-defense system and I-Dome, the mobile version of Iron Dome.
“The security situation in Europe has exposed the need for such defense technologies, ones that can cover vast areas and are easily deployed and relocated according to the needs of the assets in the given arena,” the company said in a statement.
A partnership of Israel’s Uvision and Rheinmetall also appears to be a nod to the Ukraine conflict because they will present an integration of the UVision loitering munitions systems into “next-generation manned and unmanned infantry fighting vehicles.”
These weapons will provide “frontline forces with a new independent ability to locate, track and accurately eliminate heavily-armored targets from long ranges, in challenging battlefield conditions,” UVision said in a statement.
IAI stressed the importance of threat detection for units on the move. The company said it will unveil the Othello-P product, “a passive, high-performance Gunfire Detection System (GDS) with integrated artificial intelligence processing.”
The system is designed to detect gunfire, RPGs and subsonic munitions, such as handguns. It can be installed on various types of vehicles as well as unmanned platforms. IAI stressed in a statement that the system came out of its Innovation Center, which is staffed with engineers who previously served in the Israel Defense Forces.”
The war in Ukraine is something of a backdrop for the Defense Ministry and many Israeli companies showcasing new technology. “We have learned from experience. With the crisis in Europe, all countries are assessing the situation over there for force building,” said Ilany.
“Other countries are assessing [their needs] for defense systems all over the world, everyone is watching quite carefully and I believe each nation will take the responsibility for finding how they can keep and protect their nation and I believe that this will lead to a substantial wave of increasing in investment in defense systems all over the world,” she said.
Among the other new technologies presented, there is a focus on unmanned systems or add-ons to existing unmanned capabilities. For example, Steadicopter is highlighting its new Golden Eagle, which the company says is “the first-ever unmanned helicopter with precise-hit capabilities.” It is based on the existing Black Eagle 50E platform and now uses artificial intelligence and Smart Shooter’s Smash Dragon system, which is essentially a rifle incorporated into a drone.
Robotican is unveiling Rooster, “a hybrid drone-robot for indoor and underground tunnel scanning missions.” It also makes a drone interceptor called Goshawk. Meanwhile, drone specialist Third Eye Systems has a new version of its Chimera payload for UAVs, which provides day and night sensors and vision-based object recognition.
As the Ukraine war surpasses 100 days the tectonic changes in defense posture in the United States, Europe and other countries have meant a new focus on Israel’s defense industry as off-the-shelf suppliers.
This includes reports about German interest in the Arrow 3 air defense system as well as persistent questions about whether Israeli systems like Spike could be supplied to Ukraine.
Israel’s Ministry of Defense, Foreign Ministry and defense companies have declined to comment on these reports, but Israel is keenly aware of monitoring end users and third countries acquiring Israeli systems.
“There is a deep process internally in the Ministry with relevant entities including the Ministry of Foreign Affairs representatives. We check every request ... we take into consideration humanitarian challenges and government stability when we check licensing processes,” says Ilany. “We check and each customer should bring us the end-user certificate and it is something we conclude through the process and licensing.”
中文原文: 耶路撒冷--以色列国防部国际国防合作局（简称SIBAT）预计将于6月13日在巴黎开始的欧洲国防展上领导该国国防工业的强劲展示，为一个以56家当地公司为特色的以色列展馆揭幕。西巴特欧洲和北美总监阿米拉·伊拉尼（Amira Ilany）表示，“欧洲是我们最重要的市场之一。”她说，以色列看到了世界各地对其“尖端技术”的兴趣。以色列有三家大型国防公司：拉斐尔先进国防系统公司、以色列航空航天工业公司和埃尔比特系统公司。SIBAT官员预计将帮助促进该国的中小企业，尤其是。政府认为这些小公司“是该部价值体系的重要组成部分。我们认为加强这些创新产业是最重要的，其中许多将参加即将到来的欧洲展览会，“伊拉尼说。对于欧洲博览会上的几十家以色列公司来说，主要的主题是先进的技术。这包括人工智能的使用、识别威胁或瞄准系统的精度、无人平台和地面部队的高端应用、自主系统、实时数据链路、热瞄准和监视技术。这些创新，其中一些在以色列运行或已经在国外示范，建立在以色列最近的多年防御计划，称为动量。该计划侧重于将技术推广到前线部队，并利用数据和通信将编队编织在一起。以色列政治领导层最近强调了进入激光防空的举措，在以色列国防工业的各个领域，都有一股融合人工智能的动力，并在目标识别和态势感知方面加倍努力。其结果是，以色列公司带着一系列最近开发的技术或他们最近公布的现有系统的增强能力前往欧洲，其中许多与Eurosatory挂钩。例如，拉斐尔在6月9日宣布了其新的斯派克NLOS第六代精确导弹。拉斐尔的斯派克家族被39个国家使用。在欧洲，它以Eurospike的名义出售，Eurospike是Rafael、Diehl Defense GmbH和Rheinmetall Electronics之间的合资企业。拉斐尔说，它的最新变体提高了对峙距离（高达50km)，最多可以用四枚导弹发射，可以从一个平台发射，如直升机，并交给地面操作员指导。根据制造商的说法，它集成了图像匹配能力拉斐尔说，除了新导弹，它还展示了一种“新概念，称为NLOS任务工作组”，即NMT，这是一种技术包，使小型单位能够攻击遥远或隐藏的目标。拉斐尔将这些系统的重要性与战场机动性的总体需求以及部队保护联系起来，这些系统包括Spyder防空系统和I-Dome，移动版的铁穹。该公司在一份声明中表示：“欧洲的安全局势暴露了对此类防御技术的需求，这些技术可以覆盖广阔的地区，并根据特定领域的资产需求很容易部署和重新定位。”以色列Uvision和莱茵金属公司的合作似乎也是对乌克兰冲突的认可，因为他们将把Uvision游荡弹药系统集成到“下一代有人和无人步兵战车”中。UVision在一份声明中说，这些武器将为“前线部队提供一种新的独立能力，在具有挑战性的战场条件下，从远距离定位、跟踪和准确消除重型装甲目标”。IAI强调了对移动中的单位进行威胁检测的重要性。该公司表示，将推出Othello-P产品，“一种被动、高性能的枪声探测系统(GDS)，具有集成的人工智能处理。”该系统设计用于探测枪弹、RPG和亚音速弹药，如手枪。它可以安装在各种类型的车辆上，也可以安装在无人驾驶平台上。IAI在一份声明中强调，该系统来自其创新中心，该中心的工作人员是以前在以色列国防军服役的工程师。“乌克兰战争是国防部和许多以色列公司展示新技术的背景。“我们从经验中吸取了教训。随着欧洲的危机，所有国家都在评估那里的局势，以进行部队建设，“伊拉尼说。“其他国家正在评估他们对世界各地防御系统的需求，每个人都在非常仔细地观察，我相信每个国家都将承担责任，寻找他们如何保持和保护自己的国家，我相信这将导致投资的大幅增加

中文标题: 洛·马公司准备在环太平洋演习期间演示“规模化电子战”功能
整编内容:
洛克希德·马丁公司电子战项目高管乔·奥塔维亚诺称，洛·马公司准备在“环太平洋演习”期间在美国海军舰艇上展示针对小型船只的进攻性电子战能力。这种被称为“规模化电子战”或电子攻击的能力将于本周空运至夏威夷完成舰艇安装。
洛·马公司演示的能力核心源于“水面电子战改进计划”（SEWIP）。奥塔维亚诺说，此次将要演示的“规模化电子战”采用了最新迭代能力之一——“水面电子战改进计划”Block III，并降低了其空间、重量和动力要求，以适应更大范围的船只。“水面电子战改进计划”Block III具备两种能力，首先是探测附近正在搜索海军舰艇的敌方雷达，随后利用其电子攻击能力“蒙蔽”敌方雷达，有效隐藏配备“水面电子战改进计划”的舰艇。
整编机构: 北京航天情报与信息研究所
源标题: Lockheed prepping to demo ‘scaled EA’ capability at RIMPAC
原文:
WASHINGTON: Lockheed Martin is poised to demonstrate an offensive electronic warfare capability scaled for smaller vessels in the coming weeks during the international Rim of the Pacific exercise onboard a US Navy ship, a company official told Breaking Defense in an interview today.
The capability, which Lockheed and the Navy are calling “scaled EA,” or electronic attack, is being flown into Hawaii this week for installation onboard the ship, according to Joe Ottaviano, an executive at Lockheed overseeing its electronic warfare programs.
The core of Lockheed’s demonstration stems from the Surface Electronic Warfare Improvement Program, the Navy’s longstanding EW program of record. In essence, Ottaviano said, Lockheed has taken one of the latest iterations of the capability, dubbed Block III, and reduced its space, weight and power requirements to fit on a larger array of ships.
It’s an important development for two reasons. The first is that as the Navy has worked with several contractors to develop and upgrade SEWIP over the years, the service has always valued the notion of scaling the system’s requirements to fit the ship on which it is needed. (The “full” versions of the system, also called AN/SLQ-32, is destined for destroyers and won’t necessarily fit onboard smaller vessels such as a Littoral Combat Ship without modifications.)
The second is that while previous generations of SEWIP have in some cases been scaled to fit smaller vessels, they have lacked the electronic attack capability brought to the fleet through Block III.
Electronic warfare is not a new capability — SEWIP has been under development in some form since 2002 — but the descriptions of what it is are not always as clear as missiles being fired from destroyers or torpedoes from submarines.
Asked to put EW in layman’s terms, Ottaviano said SEWIP Block III has two jobs. The first is to detect a nearby enemy radar that is searching for a Navy ship. The second is to then use its electronic attack capability to “blind” the enemy’s radar, effectively hiding the SEWIP-equipped ship.
“He [the enemy] is shining a flashlight in the dark to try and find you,” Ottaviano said. “You shine a very bright flashlight back at him and now he can’t see anything.”
The trick for the Navy and Lockheed is being able to put that flashlight on any ship in the fleet, a competency the company hopes to demonstrate this summer as exercises at RIMPAC commence.
中文原文: 华盛顿：洛克希德·马丁公司的一名官员今天在接受《打破防务》采访时表示，在未来几周的环太平洋国际演习中，洛克希德·马丁公司将在一艘美国海军船只上展示一种针对较小船只的进攻性电子战能力。洛克希德监督其电子战项目的高管乔·奥塔维亚诺（Joe Ottaviano）表示，这种能力被洛克希德和海军称为“规模电子攻击”（scaled EA）或电子攻击，将于本周空运到夏威夷，安装在船上。洛克希德公司演示的核心源于水面电子战改进计划，这是海军长期创纪录的电子战计划。奥塔维亚诺说，本质上，洛克希德已经采取了这种能力的最新迭代之一，被称为Block III，并降低了其空间、重量和功率要求，以适应更大的船只阵列。这是一个重要的发展有两个原因。首先，随着海军多年来与几个承包商合作开发和升级SEWIP，该部门一直重视扩大系统要求以适应需要它的船只的概念。（该系统的“完整”版本也被称为AN/SLQ-32，用于驱逐舰，不经过修改就不一定适合于较小的船只，如濒海战斗舰。）第二个问题是，虽然前几代SEWIP在某些情况下已经进行了缩放，以适应更小的船只，但它们缺乏通过Block III为舰队带来的电子攻击能力。电子战不是一种新的能力--自2002年以来，SEWIP一直在以某种形式发展--但对它的描述并不总是像驱逐舰发射导弹或潜艇发射鱼雷那样清楚。当被问及用外行的话说电子战时，奥塔维亚诺说SEWIP Block III有两份工作。第一种是探测到附近正在搜索海军舰艇的敌方雷达。二是随后利用其电子攻击能力“蒙蔽”敌方雷达，有效隐藏装备SEWIP的舰艇。“他（敌人）在黑暗中用手电筒试图找到你，”奥塔维亚诺说。“你用很亮的手电筒对着他，现在他什么也看不见。”海军和洛克希德的诀窍是能够在舰队的任何船只上安装手电筒，该公司希望今年夏天在环太平洋军事演习开始时展示这一能力。

中文标题: 美太空军将人工智能视为联合全域指挥控制的关键
整编内容:
美太空军和行业官员称，如果没有人工智能和机器学习，联合全域指挥控制 （JADC2）根本无法实现。
太空军准将约翰·奥尔森表示，联合全域指挥控制（JADC2） 概念涉及全球多个网络，以便在各领域开展现代化战争，且用户需要自动化辅助。要让联合全域指挥控制发挥作用，人工智能和机器学习是必不可少的推动因素。
统一数据库（UDL）是太空军对联合全域指挥控制的主要贡献之一，该数据库是太空传感器以及越来越多地部署在其他领域的传感器的数据存储库。Bluestaq 公司最初于2018 年帮助空军太空司令部概念化了统一数据库，2019年获得后续合同开始建设数据库。太空军于 3 月份再次授予该公司 2.8 亿美元的合同，用于统一数据库的开发和数据集成。该公司首席执行官兼联合创始人 Seth Harvey 表示，仅太空军的统一数据库每天消耗数亿条记录，只触及可用数据的表面。因此，人工智能/机器学习软件是帮助用户“修剪数据”的必备软件。人工智能对于接管日常工作来说将非常有价值，比如整合到联合全域指挥控制结构中的任务传感器。另一方面，当人类的生命处于危险时，人工智能将成为“修剪信息并使其可供决策者使用”的工具。
当时担任联合全域指挥控制开发的负责人表示，美北方司令部早在 3 月份就使用其全球信息优势实验来测试三种旨在加快指挥官行动能力的人工智能“决策辅助工具”。人工智能算法将实现全域态势感知、“信息优势”和实时“跨作战司令部协作”。
整编机构: 北京航天情报与信息研究所
源标题: Space Force sees AI as ‘absolutely essential’ for JADC2
原文:
WASHINGTON: Without artificial intelligence and machine learning tools, the Pentagon’s ambitiousJoint All Domain Command and Control (JADC2)initiative simply will not be doable, according to Space Force and industry officials.
Brig. Gen. John Olsen, mobilization assistant to Space Force chief Gen. Jay Raymond, told a panel last week during the American Institute of Aeronautics and Astronautics’s ASCEND space conference that the JADC2 concept involves multiple networks around the globe in order to prosecute modern warfare in all domains, and that the human users are going to need some automated help.
“When we look at those kill chains — or when we look at the time to sense, makes sense, and act — those ‘observe, orient, decide, act or OODA Loop timelines become so compressed in the modern environment,” he said. “So, artificial intelligence and machine learning are absolutely essential enablers to make us able to react, and respond, and again, make sense of the information then act upon it.”

中文标题: 洛马公司完成棕榈谷“智能工厂”建设
整编内容: 洛马公司耗资40多亿美元兴建的“智能工厂”现已完成基础设施建设。新厂位于加州棕榈谷“臭鼬工厂”厂区，新厂占地215,000平方英尺（约2万平米）、拥有员工450名，可为加州提供1500个工作岗位。洛马公司在美国总共开设了四家“智能工厂”，棕榈谷“智能工厂”融汇其他三家工厂的优长，具有“智能工厂框架、制造环境先进、设置灵活性强”等特点，能在“发展美国制造能力的同时，快速灵活地保障客户重点建设项目的需要”。（航空工业信息中心 曹耀国 供稿 陈珊珊 审核）

源标题: Lockheed Martin Unveils Intelligent, Flexible Factory At The Skunk Works? In Palmdale, California
原文:
August 10, 2021 
Lockheed Martin (NYSE: LMT) has completed construction of an advanced manufacturing facility at its Palmdale, California, campus and headquarters to the Skunk Works?.
The 215,000 square foot intelligent, flexible factory has digital foundations to incorporate smart manufacturing components, embrace the Internet of Things and deliver cutting edge solutions rapidly and affordably to support the United States and its allies. This is one of four transformational manufacturing facilities Lockheed Martin is opening in the U.S. this year.
This new building incorporates all three of Lockheed Martin's advanced production priorities: an intelligent factory framework; a technology enabled advanced manufacturing environment; and a flexible factory construct to support customer priorities with speed and agility while bolstering manufacturing capability in the United States.
"For more than 100 years, Lockheed Martin has been proud to call California home," said Jeff Babione, vice president and general manager, Lockheed Martin Skunk Works. "Our partnership with the state has helped us remain competitive and has positioned us for long-term growth. The technology in our new Palmdale facility lets us go beyond manufacturing optimization to the next digital revolution, driving innovation and preserving California's leadership in the aerospace industry."
Merging the power of human and machine, manufacturing artisans will work with digital tools to execute operations with maximum efficiency. The incorporation of robotics, artificial intelligence and augmented reality reduces the need for hard tooling, elevating the human experience to drive rapid innovation, a hallmark of the Skunk Works.
In addition to manufacturing, the facility includes office and break spaces to accommodate more than 450 employees. The company has created over 1,500 new jobs for California since 2018.
This project is the cornerstone of over $400 million in capital investments being made across Lockheed Martin's Palmdale campus to address growth in support of its customers' missions.
Lockheed Martin Skunk Works is responsible for many aerospace firsts, including the United States' first jet fighter (P-80), the world's first stealth fighter (F-117) and the world's first 5th generation fighter (F-22). With a proven way of working based on 14 simple rules, the Skunk Works is known for rapidly solving urgent national needs. With eight Collier trophies and a National Medal of Technology and Innovation awarded from the office of the President of the United States, the Skunk Works continues to define what is next in aerospace.
中文原文: 2021年8月10日洛克希德·马丁公司（纽约证券交易所代码：LMT）已经完成了在加州棕榈谷的先进制造设施的建设，园区和臭鼬工厂的总部？。这座21.5万平方英尺的智能柔性工厂拥有数字化基础，可以融入智能制造组件，拥抱物联网，并快速、廉价地提供尖端解决方案，以支持美国及其盟友。这是洛克希德·马丁公司今年在美国开设的四个转型制造工厂之一。这座新建筑整合了洛克希德·马丁公司先进生产的所有三个优先事项：智能工厂框架；技术支持的先进制造环境；和一个灵活的工厂结构，以快速和敏捷的方式支持客户的优先考虑，同时增强美国的制造能力。“100多年来，洛克希德·马丁一直自豪地把加州称为家，”洛克希德·马丁臭鼬工厂副总裁兼总经理杰夫·巴比奥内说。“我们与该州的伙伴关系帮助我们保持竞争力，并为我们的长期增长奠定了基础。我们新棕榈谷工厂的技术让我们超越制造优化，进入下一次数字革命，推动创新，保持加州在航空航天行业的领导地位。”融合人和机器的力量，制造工匠将与数字工具一起工作，以最大的效率执行操作。机器人技术、人工智能和增强现实的结合减少了对硬工具的需求，提升了人类体验，以推动快速创新，这是臭鼬作品的标志。除了生产，该设施还包括办公室和休息空间，可容纳450多名员工。自2018年以来，该公司已为加州创造了1500多个新工作岗位。该项目是洛克希德·马丁公司棕榈谷校区超过4亿美元资本投资的基石，旨在解决支持客户使命的增长问题。洛克希德·马丁臭鼬工厂负责多项航空航天第一，包括美国第一架喷气式战斗机(P-80)、世界第一架隐身战斗机(F-117)和世界第一架第5代战斗机(F-22)。Skunk Works基于14条简单的规则，以快速解决国家紧急需求而闻名。随着八个科利尔奖杯和美国总统办公室授予的国家技术和创新奖章，臭鼬工厂继续定义航天领域的下一步。

中文标题: 美国太空军考虑第二颗NOAA气象卫星
整编内容: 美国太空军正在与国家海洋和大气管理局（NOAA）讨论替换印度洋上空的地球静止气象卫星。NOAA的前“地球静止环境业务卫星（GEOS）-13”卫星被更名为“光电红外气象系统-地球静止卫星”（EWS-G），为美国中央司令部提供图像支持。“光电红外天气系统”项目负责人表示，该卫星当前覆盖印度洋，太空军正在与NOAA讨论利用另一颗GOES卫星接替该卫星的任务。尽管这些讨论仍在进行，但美国太空军仍在努力更新军事气象卫星星座的其他元素。一是计划评估今年1月3日发射的立方体卫星未来的性能，将其作为光电和红外气象卫星（EWS）项目的一部分。通过EWS计划，太空军还准备使用通用原子电磁系统公司制造的小型卫星收集图像，该卫星配备了EO Vista开发的成像传感器。二是太空军计划发射两颗由Ball Aerospace公司制造的“气象系统后续微波”（WSF-M）卫星，以提供有关海洋表面风、热带气旋强度和太空气象的信息，首颗WSF-M卫星划于2024年1月发射，第二颗卫星将于11月订购，计划于2028年发射。

源标题: U.S. Space Force considers a second NOAA weather satellite
原文:
byDebra Werner—January 12, 2023
Ball Aerospace is building the Weather System Follow-on – Microwave satellite for the U.S. Space Force. The satellite includes a passive microwave imaging radiometer from Ball and an energetic charged particle sensor supplied by the government. Credit: Ball Aerospace
DENVER – The U.S. Space Force is holding discussions with the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration about replacing a geostationary weather satellite over the Indian Ocean.
In 2020, the U.S. Air Force began collecting weather imagery with the former GOES-13, a Geostationary Operational Environmental Satellite NOAA launched in 2006 and retired in 2018. That satellite, renamed Electro-Optical Infrared Weather System-Geostationary (EWS-G), provides imagery in support of U.S. Central Command.
“We currently are using where we’re calling EWS-G1, which is covering the Indian Ocean today,” Lt. Col. Joseph L. Maguadog, who direct the Electro-Optical and Infrared Weather System program, said Jan. 9 at the American Meteorological Society annual meeting here. “And we’re in discussions with our NOAA partners about utilizing another GOES satellite to succeed that first capability.”
While those discussions continue, efforts are underway to update other elements of the military weather satellite fleet.
A cubesat built byOrion Space Solutionsto gather weather imagery launched Jan. 3 on a SpaceX Falcon 9 rideshare flight. The U.S. Space Force plans to evaluate the cubesat’s performance over the next year as one element of its Electro-optical and infrared Weather Satellite (EWS) program.
“We look at it as more of a high-risk, high-reward prototype that we’re hoping might inform the type of capability we use in the long term,” Maguadog said.
Through the EWS program, the Space Force also is preparing to gather imagery with a small satellite built byGeneral Atomics Electromagnetic Systemsequipped with an imaging sensor developed by EO Vista.
“We believe that satellite will provide the necessary user capability as soon as we get it up there,” Maguadog said.
The Space Force plans to launch two Weather System Follow-on-Microwave (WSF-M) satellites built by Ball Aerospace to provide information on ocean surface winds, tropical cyclone intensity and space weather.
The first WSF-M is scheduled for launch in January 2024. The second satellite,ordered in November, is slated to launch in 2028.
Ball has completed construction of the WSF-M spacecraft bus and the satellite’s Microwave Imager (MWI) instrument, the company announced Jan. 10. The next step is space vehicle assembly, integration and testing.
“The nearly simultaneous completion of the spacecraft bus and instrument testing mark a significant milestone for the WSF-M program,” Hope Damphousse, Ball Aerospace vice president for strategic operations,said in a statement. “We are moving forward with spacecraft integration of the MWI sensor, along with a government-furnished Energetic Charged Particle sensor, which will be followed by a suite of space vehicle performance and environmental tests.”
中文原文: 比德布拉·沃纳-2023年1月12日鲍尔航天公司正在为美国太空部队建造气象系统微波跟踪卫星。该卫星包括一个来自鲍尔的被动微波成像辐射计和一个由政府提供的高能带电粒子传感器。信用：鲍尔航天丹佛--美国太空部队正在与国家海洋和大气管理局就更换印度洋上空的地球静止气象卫星进行讨论。2020年，美国空军开始用前GOES-13收集天气图像，这是一颗地球静止运行环境卫星，于2006年发射，2018年退役。这颗卫星被重新命名为电光红外天气系统--地球静止系统(EWS-G)，为美国中央司令部提供图像支持。“我们目前使用的是我们称之为EWS-G1的地方，它今天覆盖了印度洋，”光电和红外天气系统项目负责人约瑟夫·L·马瓜多中校1月9日在这里的美国气象协会年会上说。“我们正在与美国国家海洋和大气管理局的合作伙伴讨论利用另一颗GOES卫星来成功实现第一项能力。”在这些讨论继续进行的同时，正在努力更新军事气象卫星舰队的其他组成部分。1月3日，一个立方体卫星在SpaceX猎鹰9号驾驶飞机上发射了一次收集天气图像的byOrion太空解决方案。美国太空部队计划在明年评估立方体卫星的性能，作为其光电和红外气象卫星(EWS)计划的一个组成部分。Maguadog说：“我们认为它更像是一个高风险、高回报的原型，我们希望它能为我们长期使用的能力类型提供信息。”通过EWS计划，太空部队还准备用通用原子电磁系统制造的一颗小型卫星收集图像，该卫星配有EO Vista开发的成像传感器。“我们相信，一旦我们把卫星送到那里，它将提供必要的用户能力，”马古多格说。太空部队计划发射两颗由鲍尔航天公司建造的天气系统微波跟随（WSF-M）卫星，以提供海洋表面风、热带气旋强度和空间天气的信息。第一个WSF-M计划于2024年1月发射。第二颗卫星于11月订购，计划于2028年发射。鲍尔公司1月10日宣布，该公司已经完成了WSF-M宇宙飞船总线和卫星微波成像仪(MWI)仪器的建造。下一步是空间飞行器组装、集成和测试。“航天器总线和仪器测试几乎同时完成，标志着WSF-M计划的一个重要里程碑，”鲍尔航空航天公司负责战略运营的副总裁霍普·丹弗斯（Hope Damphousse）在一份声明中表示。“我们正在推进MWI传感器的航天器集成，以及政府提供的高能带电粒子传感器，随后将进行一系列航天器性能和环境测试。”

中文标题: 美国将在爱达荷国家实验室建设熔盐实验快堆
整编内容: 美国南方公司和能源部（DOE）签署了一项协议，在爱达荷国家实验室（INL）设计、建设和运行熔盐实验快堆（MCRE）。据称这将是世界上首座达到临界状态的熔盐快堆。与传统反应堆相比，熔盐快堆在更高的温度下运行，发电效率更高。南方公司将负责牵头，与美国泰拉能源公司（TerraPower）、爱达荷国家实验室、英国Core Power公司、法国欧安诺联合服务公司、美国电力研究协会（EPRI）和3M公司一起开发熔盐实验堆。根据一项为期5年、价值1.7亿美元的费用分摊资助协议，该熔盐实验堆项目得到能源部先进反应堆示范计划（ARDP）的支持。该项目将提供关键的运行数据，以支持泰拉能源公司未来开发熔盐快堆（MCFR），为示范堆的设计、许可和运行提供信息。

源标题: Fast-spectrum salt reactor to be built at INL
原文:
World Nuclear News 19 November 2021
Southern Company and the US Department of Energy (DOE) have signed an agreement to design, construct and operate the Molten Chloride Reactor Experiment (MCRE) - a proof-of-concept critical fast-spectrum salt reactor. Southern will lead a collaborative effort to build the MCRE - which it says will be the world's first fast-spectrum salt reactor to achieve criticality - at Idaho National Laboratory (INL).
An rendering of the MCRE (Image: Southern Company)
Collaborators in the MCRE project are TerraPower, INL, Core Power, Orano Federal Services, the Electric Power Research Institute and 3M Company. The project is supported through the DOE's Advanced Reactor Demonstration Program (ARDP) under a five-year, USD170 million cost-shared funding agreement. It will provide crucial operational data to support the future development of TerraPower's Molten Chloride Fast Reactor (MCFR), informing the design, licensing and operation of a demonstration reactor.
Mark Berry, Southern Company's vice president of R&D described the MCRE as "groundbreaking". Advancing next-generation nuclear is part of Southern's comprehensive strategy to deliver clean, safe, reliable, affordable energy, he said, adding: "The Molten Chloride Reactor Experiment will support the commercialisation of a revolutionary technology on a timescale that addresses climate change benchmarks and delivers on Southern Company's goal of net-zero greenhouse gas emissions by 2050."
TerraPower's MCFR technology uses molten chloride salt as both reactor coolant and fuel, allowing for so-called fast spectrum operation which the company says makes the fission reaction more efficient. It operates at higher temperatures than conventional reactors, generating electricity more efficiently, and also offers potential for process heat applications and thermal storage. An iteration of the MCFR - known as the m-MSR - intended for marine use is being developed.
Southern Company and TerraPower were in 2015 awarded some USD40 million of DOE funding to build integrated infrastructure necessary to support early development of MCFR technology. The MCRE will continue this momentum toward commercialisation of the MCFR, the partners said today.
"Our past work with Southern Company has led to important experimental milestones and to the establishment of unique test facilities necessary to validate molten salt reactor technology," said TerraPower President and CEO Chris Levesque, adding that Southern Company's leadership and experience in reactor licensing and operation had been essential. "The Molten Chloride Reactor Experiment will continue this important work in a critical reactor experiment, leading to the successful development of low-cost, clean energy for the future," he said.
TerraPower is also developing Natrium technology - featuring a sodium fast reactor combined with a molten salt energy storage system - a demonstration plant for which is to be built at Kemmerer in Wyoming.
中文原文: 《世界核报》2021年11月19日南方公司和美国能源部(DOE)签署了一项协议，设计、建造和运行熔融氯化物反应堆实验(MCRE)--一个概念验证的临界快谱盐反应堆。南方将领导一项合作努力，在爱达荷国家实验室(INL)建造MCRE--它说这将是世界上第一个达到临界的快谱盐反应堆。MCRE的渲染（图片：南方公司）MCRE项目的合作者是TerraPower、INL、Core Power、Orano Federal Services、电力研究所和3M公司。该项目由能源部的先进反应堆示范计划(ARDP)支持，该计划为期五年，费用分摊1.7亿美元。它将为TerraPower的熔氯快堆(MCFR)的未来发展提供关键的运行数据，为示范反应堆的设计、许可和运行提供信息。南方公司的研发副总裁马克·贝里将MCRE描述为“开创性的”。他说，推进下一代核能是南方提供清洁、安全、可靠、负担得起的能源的全面战略的一部分。他补充说：“熔融氯化物反应堆实验将支持一项革命性技术的商业化，该技术符合气候变化基准，并实现南方公司到2050年温室气体净零排放的目标。”TerraPower的MCFR技术使用熔融氯盐作为反应堆冷却剂和燃料，允许所谓的快速光谱操作，该公司表示，这使得裂变反应更有效。它在比传统反应堆更高的温度下运行，发电效率更高，也为过程热应用和热储存提供了潜力。MCFR的一个迭代--被称为m-MSR--打算用于海洋用途正在开发中。南方公司和TerraPower在2015年获得了美国能源部约4000万美元的资金，用于建设支持MCFR技术早期开发所需的综合基础设施。合作伙伴今天表示，MCRE将继续这一势头，以实现MCFR的商业化。TerraPower总裁兼首席执行官克里斯·莱维斯克（Chris Levesque）表示：“我们过去与南方公司的合作导致了重要的实验里程碑，并建立了验证熔盐反应堆技术所需的独特测试设施。”他补充说，南方公司在反应堆许可和运营方面的领导能力和经验至关重要。“熔融氯化物反应堆实验将在一个关键的反应堆实验中继续这项重要的工作，为未来成功开发低成本、清洁能源，”他说。TerraPower还在开发钠技术--以钠快堆和熔盐储能系统相结合为特色--将在怀俄明州的Kemmerer建立一个示范工厂。

源标题: Digital Twin Hololab goes live at USAF’s Tyndall AFB
原文:
March 21, 2022
The US Air Force (USAF) has announced that the Digital Twin Hololab has gone live at Tyndall Air Force Base (AFB) in Florida.
The Hololab displays the AFB in a digital model and will facilitate integrating new planning concepts and technologies.
It will also help the airmen to explore the digital transformation of the base and allow facilities operators to view the real-time condition of AFB assets virtually.
Commenting on the digital twin, Air Force Civil Engineer Center Natural Disaster Recovery Division branch chief Lowell Usrey said: “[It is a] near life-like, virtual representation of the physical world.
“This is the place where Airmen can interact with the model using virtual reality goggles or just a good old-fashioned computer screen.
“It’s more than a display. It is an open canvas that puts the virtual world into the hands of potential users to improve mission effectiveness and collect feedback to help improve the system.”
The model made its debut as part of the larger $4.9bn rebuild schedule.
The Department of the Air Force is implementing several new technologies at the base as part of the Installation of the Future initiative.
The Hololab is at the NDR building.
NDR division chief colonel Travis Leighton said: “We are making the Hololab accessible because we want to spread knowledge of how the Digital Twin will help us with our mission today, as well as spark conversations of how it can help us in the future.”
The construction of a new $32.5m flightline munitions storage area recently began at Tyndall AFB.
Local small business EMR secured the contract for the project that includes the development of eight buildings to support three F-35 fighter squadrons to be deployed at the base in future.
中文原文: 2022年3月21日美国空军(USAF)宣布，数字孪生Hololab已经在佛罗里达州的廷德尔空军基地(AFB)上线。Hololab以数字模型显示空军基地，并将有助于整合新的规划概念和技术。它还将帮助空军探索基地的数字化转型，并允许设施运营商虚拟查看空军基地资产的实时状况。空军土木工程师中心自然灾害恢复处处长洛厄尔·乌斯里（Lowell Usrey）在评论这对数字孪生兄弟时说：“[它]是一个接近生命的物理世界的虚拟再现。“在这里，飞行员可以使用虚拟现实护目镜或一个很好的老式电脑屏幕与模型互动。“这不仅仅是展示。它是一幅开放的画布，将虚拟世界交到潜在用户手中，以提高任务效率，并收集反馈来帮助改进系统。“该模型首次亮相是作为更大的49亿美元重建计划的一部分。空军部正在基地实施几项新技术，作为安装未来倡议的一部分。全息实验室在NDR大楼。NDR部门负责人特拉维斯·莱顿上校说：“我们让全息实验室变得容易访问，因为我们想传播数字孪生如何帮助我们完成今天的任务的知识，并引发关于它如何在未来帮助我们的对话。”最近在廷德尔空军基地开始建造一个新的3250万美元的飞行线弹药储存区。当地小企业EMR获得了该项目的合同，该项目包括开发八栋建筑，以支持未来部署在该基地的三个F-35战斗机中队。

整编内容: 美国数字制造创新机构（MxD）和德雷塞尔大学宣布启动一项新的数字化设计和先进制造劳动力培训项目，旨在为汽车、航空航天、生物医学、海军和制造商等行业专业人员提供培训，使其获得结合当前数字技术的实践经验。该项目由国防后勤局资助，将于今年4月首次交付，培训将采用远程和面授相结合的形式，重点关注数字线索技术，并展示将数字模型与基于仿真的工程、设计优化、先进制造和产品寿命管理联系起来的前沿发展。通过该项目，MxD将与德雷塞尔大学合作创建灵活、可定制的培训模块，并使用 MxD最先进设备进行实践学习，为专业人员和未来劳动力提供所需的技能培训。

源标题: MxD Learn and Drexel University Launch a Workforce Training Program for Digital Design and Advanced Manufacturing
原文:
March 10, 2022 –Drexel Universityand MxD (Manufacturing x Digital) announced today the launch of a new workforce development program. MxD is the nation’s digital manufacturing and cybersecurity institute, located in Chicago.
Managed by theDrexel Solutions Institute, the Drexel Digital Design & Advanced Manufacturing Program (D3-AMP) at MxD will target industry professionals in automotive, aerospace, biomedical, naval and manufacturing companies who are interested in obtaining hands-on experience in combination with current digital technologies. D3-AMP will combine asynchronous and synchronous training, both remote and in-person, with an emphasis on leveraging the digital thread that links all steps of the engineering design process. A first delivery of the D3-AMP is scheduled for April 2022 with funding from the Defense Logistics Agency.
“The advent of Industry 4.0 has created a surge toward rapid integration of technological innovations in manufacturing processes, and therefore there is a pressing need to create flexible and customizable training modules for both professionals and future workforce,” saidAntonios Kontsos, Ph.D., a professor of mechanical engineering and mechanics in Drexel’s College of Engineering, who will serve as director of the D3-AMP Program.
D3-AMP was created by subject-matter experts at Drexel, with input from MxD and its national network of defense manufacturers, in order to demonstrate cutting-edge developments in linking digital models to simulations-based engineering, design optimization, advanced manufacturing, and product life management.
“Drexel University is thrilled to partner with MxD in the creation and launch of the new Drexel Digital Design & Advanced Manufacturing Program,” said Anna Koulas, vice president, Drexel Solutions Institute. “This program will enable its participants to gain invaluable, hands-on learning experiences in an exciting and emerging field. As we see disruptive technologies become more common regardless of industry sector, it will be imperative that academic institutions and businesses work together in order to train and upskill workforces so that individuals remain competitive in the evolving marketplace.”
Kontsos is collaborating with Kris Risi, PhD, associate dean of Corporate, Executive Education and Innovation, and her team in Drexel’s LeBow College of Business.
“MxD is excited to collaborate with Drexel University to offer manufacturers a training course in Industry 4.0 that allows learners the flexibility to learn as their schedule permits while also providing access to hands-on learning with state-of-the-art equipment on MxD’s factory floor,” said Lizabeth Stuck, senior director, MxD Learn. “This program will introduce participants to the future of manufacturing and provide them with the skills necessary to enter an exciting career path in the industry.”
中文原文: 2022年3月10日--德雷塞尔大学和MxD（制造x数字）今天宣布启动一项新的劳动力发展计划。MxD是位于芝加哥的美国数字制造和网络安全研究所。Drexel Digital Design&Advanced Manufacturing Program(D3-AMP)由Drexel Solutions Institute管理，MxD的Drexel Digital Design&Advanced Manufacturing Program(D3-AMP)将面向汽车、航空航天、生物医学、海军和制造公司的行业专业人员，他们有兴趣获得与当前数字技术相结合的实践经验。D3-AMP将结合异步和同步培训，远程和面对面，重点是利用数字线程，连接工程设计过程的所有步骤。D3-AMP的第一次交付定于2022年4月，由国防后勤局提供资金。Drexel工程学院的机械工程和力学教授Dantonios Kontsos博士将担任D3-AMP项目的主任，他说：“工业4.0的到来推动了制造过程中技术创新的快速集成，因此迫切需要为专业人员和未来的劳动力创建灵活和可定制的培训模块。”D3-AMP是由Drexel的主题专家创建的，由MxD及其国防制造商国家网络提供投入，目的是展示将数字模型与基于仿真的工程、设计优化、先进制造和产品寿命管理联系起来的前沿发展。Drexel解决方案学院副院长Anna Koulas说：“Drexel大学很高兴能与MxD合作，创建并启动新的Drexel数字设计和先进制造项目。”“这个项目将使参与者在一个激动人心的新兴领域获得宝贵的实践学习经验。随着我们看到颠覆性技术无论在哪个行业都变得越来越普遍，学术机构和企业必须共同努力，培训和提高劳动力的技能，以便个人在不断发展的市场中保持竞争力。“Kontsos与Drexel's LeBow College of Business的公司、高管教育和创新副院长克里斯·里西博士和她的团队合作。MxD Learn高级总监Lizabeth Stick说：“MxD很高兴能与Drexel大学合作，为制造商提供工业4.0培训课程，让学习者在时间表允许的情况下灵活学习，同时还提供在MxD工厂现场使用最先进设备的动手学习机会。”“该项目将向参与者介绍制造业的未来，并为他们提供进入该行业激动人心的职业道路所需的技能。”

中文标题: 美海军陆战队成立了技术管理和分析局，以推动企业网络现代化
整编内容: 美海军陆战队系统司令部近日成立了技术管理和分析局（TMAD），旨在推动海军陆战队企业网络（MCEN）的现代化。MCEN是一个互连的“网络之网络”，将作战人员、体系结构、流程、物理和逻辑拓扑以及网络操作联系起来，以支撑“兵力设计2030”的最终目标。MCEN允许作战人员在战术环境中与司令部保持联系，以实现强大、无缝和安全的端到端通信的能力，增强自身能力和未来作战杀伤力。技术管理和分析局的任务是采用流程驱动的方法来跟踪MCEN的重大企业级更改，最终对网络的拟议更改进行技术、性能和威胁评估，并确保网络现代化决策得到落实。目前，50多个海军组织和支持机构定期为MCEN提供支持，且经常在对企业网络没有充分了解的情况下实施变革，技术管理和分析局对这些支持或变革的监督是非常重要的。此外，该团队还将数字孪生技术应用于配置管理和架构理解，以提供更好的自动决策；并针对未来的战场空间和威胁，推动未来互操作性、可扩展性的实施路径。海军陆战队系统司令部认为，MCEN的有效实施最终将有助于确保美国海军陆战队保持世界领先的战斗力。
整编机构: 中国电科
源标题: Preparing for future battlefields: MARCORSYSCOM drives Marine Corps Enterprise Network mod
原文:
MARINE CORPS BASE QUANTICO, Va. —
Marine Corps Systems Command recently launched the Technical Management and Analysis Directorate – or TMAD – in a drive to modernize the Marine Corps Enterprise Network, or MCEN. The MCEN is an interconnected “network-of-networks” that links service personnel, architecture, processes, physical and logical topology, and cyber operations. In line with the Commandant of the Marine Corps Gen. David H. Berger’s Planning Guidance – which underscores the need for enterprise IT engineering and the fundamental importance of meeting peer competitors on a complex future battlefield – the move further supports the commandant’s Force Design 2030 goals.
“I would say network modernization is key to achieving a deterrent. That’s our piece in the bigger ‘whole-of-government’ effort, ensuring our ability to project power in future battlefields is unmatched,” said Keegan Mills, MARCORSYSCOM Highly Qualified Expert and the IT and cyber technology lead for TMAD.
“The MCEN allows the warfighter working in a tactical environment to remain connected to garrison. We’re providing them an authoritative data source that they can access in future battles. This increases their capability and their lethality as they fight the future fight,” explained Luis Velazquez, chief technology officer at MARCORSYSCOM’s Systems Engineering & Acquisition Logistics directorate.
Currently, TMAD – previously known as Task Force Aquila – is tasked with undertaking a process-driven approach to track significant, enterprise-level changes to the MCEN, ultimately providing technical, performance and threat evaluations of proposed changes to the network and ensuring that network modernization decisions are satisfactorily informed. More than 50 Department of the Navy organizations and supporting agencies regularly contribute to the MCEN, often implementing changes without having a sound understanding of enterprise network. The oversight that TMAD provides to those contributions or changes is invaluable.
“I’d say we knocked the question of configuration management and architectural understanding of the MCEN out of the park,” said Mills. “The process that our team has developed to maintain the architecture of the network in data is phenomenal.”
Still, with the prospect of a program-specific lab where experiments can be run on the MCEN’s Digital Twin on the horizon, the engineering lead believes his team’s impact will be even greater in the future.
“When thinking about the digital twin, it’s helpful to think of the car you drive,” explained Velazquez. “Imagine that you have a model in a computer that shows all of the parts of your vehicle – including the tires, the battery, the engine, etc.”
“We’re not just modernizing in order to fix what ails us today, we’re making sure we’re prepared to face tomorrow’s challenges.”Luis Velazquez, chief technology officer at MARCORSYSCOM’s Systems Engineering & Acquisition Logistics directorate
“If you wanted to make any changes to your car’s engine, you’d first go to the digital twin and see how the changes would affect your system. After running a simulation, you could find that changing the weight of your engine could change how your brakes respond. In a word, that’s what the digital twin does; it helps make interdependencies apparent and thus provides for a better decision-making process.”
Yet while the team is focused on modernizing the network, it never loses focus on future threats, working to understand the technical risks present in our ever-changing cyber world.
“Although it’s our job to figure out what the future battlespace is going to look like, historically we don’t always get that right. So, what we’re doing is establishing a capability that’s able to adapt to whatever the situation throws at us. It’s about building a deterrence to make sure that we can manage that,” said Mills.
“We’re not just modernizing in order to fix what ails us today, we’re making sure we’re prepared to face tomorrow’s challenges,” said Velazquez. “We’re working towards future interoperability, future extensibility and future expandability. That gives us capacity and capability.”
After all, in an age when battles are won and lost on the strength of a military’s ability to communicate on the battlefield, the ability to maintain robust, seamless and secure end‐to‐end communications – from the supporting establishment to our forward deployed forces – is an invaluable capability.
“We’d like to be able to get to a place where connectivity can be built in real-time for a specific purpose and then torn down once it’s no longer needed,” Mills explained. “The MCEN should ensure that critical messages sent across the network are accurate, haven’t been tampered with, and haven’t been intercepted.”
As the United States continues to face threats – both at home and abroad – network modernization will ultimately help ensure the U.S. Marine Corps remains the world’s preeminent fighting force.
中文原文: 弗吉尼亚州匡提科海军陆战队基地。-海军陆战队系统司令部最近启动了技术管理和分析局--或TMAD--以推动海军陆战队企业网络或MCEN的现代化。MCEN是一个相互连接的“网络中的网络”，将服务人员、架构、流程、物理和逻辑拓扑以及网络操作联系起来。根据海军陆战队司令大卫·H·伯杰将军的规划指导--强调了企业IT工程的必要性以及在复杂的未来战场上与同行竞争对手会面的根本重要性--此举进一步支持了司令的部队设计2030目标。“我想说网络现代化是实现威慑的关键。这是我们在更大的‘整体政府’努力中的一部分，确保我们在未来战场上投射力量的能力是无与伦比的，“MARCORSYSCOM高级专家、TMAD信息技术和网络技术负责人基根·米尔斯（Keegan Mills）表示。“MCEN允许在战术环境中工作的战斗机与驻军保持联系。我们为他们提供了一个权威的数据源，他们可以在未来的战斗中访问。这增加了他们在未来战斗中的能力和杀伤力，“MARCORSYSCOM系统工程和采购物流董事会的首席技术官路易斯·贝拉斯克斯解释说。目前，TMAD（以前被称为Aquila工作组）的任务是采用流程驱动的方法来跟踪MCEN的重大企业级变化，最终对网络的拟议变化提供技术、性能和威胁评估，并确保网络现代化决策得到令人满意的通知。50多个海军部组织和支持机构定期为MCEN做出贡献，通常在对企业网络没有良好理解的情况下实施更改。TMAD为这些贡献或变化提供的监督是无价的。米尔斯说：“我想说，我们把MCEN的配置管理和架构理解的问题排除在公园之外。”“我们的团队开发的在数据中维护网络架构的过程是惊人的。”尽管如此，随着一个特定程序的实验室的前景即将到来，在MCEN的数字孪生系统上进行实验，这位工程负责人相信他的团队在未来的影响将会更大。贝拉斯克斯解释说：“当想到数字孪生时，想想你开的车是有帮助的。”“想象一下，你在电脑里有一个模型，显示你车辆的所有部件--包括轮胎、电池、发动机等。”MARCORSYSCOM系统工程和采购物流部首席技术官路易斯·贝拉斯克斯说：“我们不仅仅是为了解决今天困扰我们的问题而进行现代化，我们还确保我们准备好面对明天的挑战。”“如果你想对你的汽车发动机做任何改变，你首先要去数字孪生系统，看看这些改变会如何影响你的系统。在运行一个模拟，你可以发现改变你的发动机的重量可以改变如何你的刹车反应。总之，这就是数字孪生所做的；它有助于使相互依赖变得明显，从而提供更好的决策过程。“然而，当团队专注于网络现代化时，它从未失去对未来威胁的关注，努力理解我们不断变化的网络世界中存在的技术风险。“尽管我们的工作是弄清楚未来的战场是什么样子，但从历史上看，我们并不总是做对。所以，我们正在做的是建立一种能力，能够适应任何情况向我们扔来的东西。这是关于建立威慑，以确保我们能够做到这一点，“米尔斯说。贝拉斯克斯说：“我们不仅仅是为了解决今天困扰我们的问题而现代化，我们还确保我们准备好面对明天的挑战。”“我们正在努力实现未来的互操作性、未来的可扩展性和未来的可扩展性。这给了我们能力和能力。“毕竟，在一个战争的胜负取决于军队在战场上通信能力的时代，保持强大、无缝和安全的端到端通信的能力--从支持机构到我们的前沿部署部队--是一种无价的能力。米尔斯解释说：“我们希望能够到达一个地方，在那里可以为特定目的实时建立连接，然后一旦不再需要就拆除连接。”“MCEN应该确保通过网络发送的关键信息是准确的，没有被篡改，也没有被拦截。”随着美国继续面临国内外的威胁，网络现代化最终将有助于确保美国海军陆战队仍然是世界上卓越的战斗力量。

中文标题: 美空军寻求开发“转型模式--战斗管理”模型
整编内容: 11月7日，美空军发布“转型模式--战斗管理”（TM-BM）信息征询书。TM-BM旨在通过围绕战斗管理建立精确的界限（即将战斗管理与其他相关和相邻的决策概念区分开来，并通过将其分解为功能和子功能来定义战斗管理），从而阐明战斗管理的持久性和全域性。项目要求该模型必须能够①为所有利益相关者提供明确、量化的战斗管理定义和概念描述，该概念描述必须提供对分布/联合战斗管理系统能力的见解。②提供一种方法，可根据特定作战管理性能对系统和系统要素进行分类和评估。③提出对战斗管理功能和支持体系架构的可跟踪、定量需求，并提供战斗管理系统性能的量化措施。
整编机构: 军事科学院军事科学信息研究中心
源标题: USAF posts TM-BM RFI
原文:
ByLoren BlindeNovember 8, 2022
On November 7, the U.S. Air Force (USAF) posted a request for information (RFI) for Transformational Model – Battle Management (TM-BM). Responses are due by 5:00 p.m. Eastern on December 31.
The Secretary of the Air Force has designated the achievement of operationally-optimized Advanced Battle Management System (ABMS)—the DAF’s contribution to Joint All-Domain Command and Control (JADC2)—as an operational imperative. DoD leadership continues to emphasize the importance of applying modern Systems Engineering principles to capability development, including the use of digital engineering environments and collaborative applications, as well as mission engineering approaches to requirements development. As an element of the Rules-based Approach to Performance Delivery, the ABMS CFT is applying Model-Based Systems Engineering (MBSE) best-practices to develop functional models of C2 concepts using Systems Modeling Language (SysML). The first such model in development is the Transformational Model – Battle Management (TM-BM).
Effective synchronization of JADC2 capability development across nations, departments, and services, requires a common mental model of complex concepts. Battle Management is one such concept that is often subject to conflations and divergent conceptions. In Department of Defense Architecture Framework (DoDAF) artifacts, activity models, and swim-lane diagrams, Battle Management functions are often opaque activities with little if any internally defined structure, or they represent bespoke processes that are unscalable. The TM-BM aims to illuminate the enduring and all-domain nature of Battle Management by establishing a precise boundary around Battle Management, i.e., distinguishing it from other related and adjacent decision-making concepts, and by defining Battle Management through decomposition into functions and subfunctions. To do the work necessary for achieving the goals of JADC2, this model must be able to:
1. Provide an unambiguous, quantitative, and robust definition and conceptual description of Battle Management for all stake holders to share and work from. That conceptual description must provide insight on the ability to distribute and/or federate Battle Management functions to achieve effectiveness, resilience, capacity, and efficiency.
2. Provide a means to categorize and evaluate systems (materiel and non-materiel) and system elements in terms of their performance of specific Battle Management functions.
3. Convey robust, traceable, quantitative requirements for Battle Management functional and supporting architectures (i.e., materiel and non-materiel systems-of-systems solutions) and provide quantitative measures of performance of Battle Management functions within a common contextual (or “pacing”) scenario. (The Pacing Scenario is being developed in collaboration with Joint and Mission Partners, and it will be promulgated for review in a separate forum). The TM-BM must provide a quantitative means to compare different architectures and their performance of Battle Management functions within that contextual scenario.
In partnership with the Department of the Navy and our Allied Partners, the DAF ABMS CFT seeks to understand and improve the ability of the model to accomplish the above with inputs from Industry Partners. This RFI represents an opportunity in incorporate the voices of developers in the MBSE foundation that will generate the requirements for JADC2 solutions.
中文原文: ByLoren BlindeNovember 8,202211月7日，美国空军(USAF)发布了一份关于变革模型-战斗管理（TM-BM）的信息请求(RFI)。回复应于12月31日东部时间下午5点前提交。空军部长已经将实现作战优化的先进战斗管理系统(ABMS)--DAF对联合全域指挥和控制(JADC2)的贡献--指定为作战当务之急。国防部领导继续强调将现代系统工程原则应用于能力开发的重要性，包括使用数字工程环境和协作应用程序，以及对需求开发采用特派团工程方法。作为基于规则的性能交付方法的一个元素，ABMS CFT正在应用基于模型的系统工程(MBSE)最佳实践，使用系统建模语言(SysML)开发C2概念的功能模型。开发中的第一个这样的模型是转换模型-战斗管理（TM-BM）。跨国家、部门和服务的JADC2能力开发的有效同步需要复杂概念的共同心智模型。战斗管理就是这样一个概念，它经常被混杂和不同的概念所左右。在国防部体系结构框架（DoDAF）工件、活动模型和泳道图中，战斗管理功能通常是不透明的活动，几乎没有内部定义的结构，或者它们表示不可伸缩的定制流程。TM-BM旨在通过建立一个精确的边界，即将作战管理与其他相关和相邻的决策概念区分开来，并通过分解为功能和子功能来定义作战管理，从而阐明作战管理的持久性和全域性。为了完成实现JADC2目标所必需的工作，该模型必须能够：1.提供一个明确的，定量的，强有力的定义和概念描述的战斗管理，为所有的利益相关者分享和工作。这种概念描述必须提供关于分配和/或联合作战管理功能以实现有效性、复原力、能力和效率的能力的洞察力。2.提供一种方法来分类和评估系统（材料和非材料）和系统要素的具体作战管理功能的表现。3.传达对作战管理功能和支持体系结构（即，装备和非装备系统解决方案）的可靠、可追踪、定量的需求，并在一个共同的上下文（或“起搏”）场景中提供作战管理功能性能的定量度量。（目前正在与联合伙伴和特派团伙伴合作制定步伐设想方案，并将在另一个论坛上公布供审查）。TM-BM必须提供一种定量的方法来比较不同的体系结构及其在该上下文场景中的战斗管理功能的性能。与海军部和我们的盟国伙伴合作，DAF ABMS CFT寻求理解和提高模型的能力，以实现上述与工业伙伴的投入。这个RFI代表了一个机会，可以在MBSE基金会中整合开发人员的声音，从而产生对JADC2解决方案的需求。
中文源标题: 美国空军邮政TM-BM RFI

中文标题: 俄罗斯针对美国空军的杀手锏武器——S-500
整编内容:
俄罗斯S-500“普罗米修斯”防空导弹系统由阿尔马兹-安泰公司开发，俄官方媒体以及俄罗斯联邦总统弗拉基米尔·普京将其称为本国武器库中最先进的反导系统，甚至是世界上最好的反导系统。今年6月，普京在克里姆林宫向军事学院毕业生发表讲话时称，在完成试验后，俄罗斯军方即将拥有多型尖端武器。
据俄罗斯新闻机构Gazeta.ru报道，普京对毕业生称，包括萨马尔特洲际弹道导弹系统、锆石超音速反舰导弹、S-500普罗米修斯防空导弹系统在内的多型装备即将装备俄军。
S-500实际上并不是用于取代S-400和其他防空系统，而是用于补充俄现有防空体系，向莫斯科地区提供战略防御能力。俄罗斯官员声称，S-500可能是应对包括洛克希德·马丁F-35在内先进隐形飞机的有效武器。据报道，S-500的首次试验已于去年完成，首批装备将于2021年底投入使用，而批量交付则计划于2025年进行。

源标题: How Russia Could Kill the U.S. Air Force: The S-500 Air Defense System
原文:
In Greek mythology, Prometheus was the Titan god of fire, known for his intelligence and even for being a champion of mankind. According to legend, he stole fire from the other gods and gave it to man, thus creating civilization. It is thus ominous yet boastful that Russia’s next-generation air defense system would be named for the Titan.
Developed by the state-owned Almaz-Antey Corporation, Russian S-500 “Prometheus” anti-aircraft missile systems have been described by state media, as well Russian Federation President Vladimir Putin, as the most advanced anti-missile system in its arsenal and even the best in the world. At an address to graduates at the Kremlin’s military institutes in June, Putin said that a number of cutting-edge weapons will be supplied to the Russian military after completing trials.
“Unique systems will soon be put into service, including the Sarmat intercontinental ballistic missile system, the Tsirkon anti-ship hypersonic missile, the S-500 Prometheus anti-aircraft missile system and others,” Putin was quoted to tell the graduates, according to a report from the Russian news outlet Gazeta.ru.
In May, at a meeting with the leadership of the Defense Ministry and defense enterprises, the Russian leader had said that the trials of Prometheus were well underway, while deployment of the new S-400 “Triumf” was also well on schedule.
“Over 70% of surface-to-air missile regiments in the Aerospace Force have been rearmed with advanced S-400 systems,” Putin told attendees, a ccording to Tass. “The S-500 system whose trials are successfully nearing completion is next to be delivered to the troops.”
Silver Bullet to the F-35?
The S-500 wasn’t actually designed to replace the S -400, or even other air-defense systems and complexes, but rather was m eant to complement that system and the stationary A-135, which is used to provide strategic defense to the Moscow Region.
The new Prometheus air-defense platform is certainly meant to be a champion to the Russian people, combining power with intelligence. It can reportedly detect, but also simultaneously attack, up to ten ballistic missile warheads flying at speeds of over four miles per second. Moreover, the anti-missile platform also can utilize several distinct radar systems that are geared toward different targets – and that could include different radars to detect planes, helicopters, drones and missiles at the same time. Almaz-Antey has further claimed that the S-500 could strike low-orbit satellites and certain types of spacecraft in near space.
Russian officials have even made the unsubstantiated claim that the S-500 could be the “silver bullet” against advanced stealth aircraft including the Lockheed Martin F-35 L ightning II.
According to reports, the platform is expected to use the 1N6A(M) battle management radar, a modified 96L6-TsP acquisition radar, as well as the new 76T6 multimode engagement and 77T6 ABM engagement radars.
The S-500 will also employ a variety of missiles in addition to the 77N6 missile series, currently under development for the S-400, as a hit-to-kill interceptor for ballistic missile targets. With a widely expected maximum operating range of 600 km, and a system response time of three to four seconds, the S-500 is around six seconds faster than the S- 400 “Triumf,” which is currently entering service with the Russian military.
Those first trials of the S-500 reportedly took place last year, and the system’s “first samples” will purportedly enter service by the end of 2021, while serial delivery is scheduled for 2025. However, Russia has repeatedly missed deadlines and faced delays with its latest military systems, so it is unclear how optimistic or even realistic this timeline might be.
中文原文: 在希腊神话中，普罗米修斯是泰坦火神，以他的智慧而闻名，甚至是人类的捍卫者。根据传说，他从其他神那里偷火给人类，从而创造了文明。因此，俄罗斯的下一代防空系统将以泰坦命名是不祥的，但也是值得夸耀的。俄罗斯S-500“普罗米修斯”防空导弹系统由国有的阿尔马兹-安泰公司开发，被国家媒体和俄罗斯联邦总统弗拉基米尔·普京描述为其武库中最先进的反导系统，甚至是世界上最好的。今年6月，普京在克里姆林宫军事学院向毕业生发表讲话时表示，一些尖端武器将在完成试验后提供给俄罗斯军方。据俄罗斯新闻媒体Gazeta.ru报道，普京对毕业生说：“独特的系统将很快投入使用，包括萨尔马特洲际弹道导弹系统、齐尔康反舰高超音速导弹、S-500普罗米修斯防空导弹系统和其他。”今年5月，在与国防部和国防企业领导人的一次会议上，俄罗斯领导人表示，普罗米修斯号的试验正在顺利进行，而新型S-400“凯旋”号的部署也在如期进行。“航空航天部队中超过70%的地对空导弹团已经用先进的S-400系统重新武装，”普京告诉与会者，这是塔斯社的一份报告。“试验成功接近完成的S-500系统接下来将交付部队.”F-35的银弹？S-500实际上并不是为了取代S-400，甚至其他防空系统和综合体而设计的，而是为了补充该系统和用于向莫斯科地区提供战略防御的固定式A-135。新的普罗米修斯防空平台无疑是俄罗斯人民的冠军，结合了力量和情报。据报道，它可以探测，但也可以同时攻击，多达10个弹道导弹弹头，飞行速度超过每秒4英里。此外，反导平台还可以利用几个针对不同目标的不同雷达系统--这可能包括同时探测飞机、直升机、无人机和导弹的不同雷达。阿尔马兹-安提进一步声称，S-500可以打击低轨道卫星和临近空间的某些类型的航天器。俄罗斯官员甚至提出了未经证实的说法，S-500可能是对抗包括洛克希德·马丁公司F-35 L ightning II在内的先进隐形飞机的“银弹”。据介绍，该平台预计将使用1N6A(M)战斗管理雷达、一种改进型96L6-TsP捕获雷达，以及新的76T6多模交战和77T6反导交战雷达。除了目前正在为S-400开发的77N6导弹系列之外，S-500还将使用多种导弹，作为弹道导弹目标的命中至杀伤拦截器。广泛预期的最大作战范围为600公里，系统响应时间为3至4秒，S-500比目前正在俄罗斯军方服役的S-400“凯旋”快6秒左右。据报道，S-500的首批试验发生在去年，该系统的“首批样本”据称将于2021年底投入使用，而连续交付计划于2025年进行。然而，俄罗斯一再错过最后期限，并面临最新军事系统的延误，因此不清楚这一时间表有多乐观甚至现实。

中文标题: 印度成功试射增强型“布拉莫斯”巡航导弹
整编内容: 2022年1月20日10时30分，印度布拉莫斯航空航天公司和与国防研究与发展组织（DRDO）团队在奥里萨邦昌迪普尔综合试验场，成功试射了增强型“布拉莫斯”超声速巡航导弹。此次飞行试验由部署在印度东海岸和沿试验航向舰艇上的遥测、雷达和光电跟踪系统等多种靶场设备监控，试验导弹以超声速巡航，经最大射程飞行，并实现了所有试验目标。该导弹较此前试验型号采用了先进的本土技术，配备有微调改进的控制系统，通过优化改进弹道提升了效率，并增强了性能。“布拉莫斯”系列导弹是印度已列装三军的通用化陆、海、空基多平台发射超声速导弹，拥有反舰和对陆攻击不同型号版本，此次试验验证了新技术在弹上的应用，使导弹性能得到进一步提升。
整编机构: 中国航天系统科学与工程研究院
源标题: India successfully test-fires new version of BrahMos supersonic cruise missile off Odisha coast
原文:
India
Times Now Digital
Updated Jan 20, 2022 | 14:48IST
BrahMos, developed by India's DRDO and Russia's NPOM, is a universal long-range supersonic cruise missile system.It can be launched from land, sea, and air. 
BrahMos missile launch (File) | Photo: PIB
Bhubaneswar, Odisha: India on Thursday successfully test-fired a new version of the BrahMos supersonic cruise missile off the coast of Odisha in Balasore, according to the defence sources.
Themissile was equipped with new technological developments which were successfully proven, the sources said.
BrahMos, developed by India's DRDO and Russia's NPOM, is a universal long-range supersonic cruise missile system.It can be launched from land, sea, and air.
Defence Minister Rajnath Singh todaycomplimented Brahmos, DRDO teams and industry for the successful flight test. Dr G Satheesh Reddy, Secretary Departmentof Defence R&D & Chairman DRDO has appreciated scientists and engineers for continuously putting efforts to maximise the weapon systems efficiency.
The system has been designed with two variants for Anti-Ship and Land-Attack roles. BRAHMOS Weapon Systems has been inducted and is operational with the Indian Navy (IN) as well as the Indian Army (IA), according to the DRDO.
Earlier this month, a successfultest of BrahMos supersonic cruise missile was carried outfrom the Indian Navy destroyer INS Vishakhapatnam off the Western coast.
The sea-to-sea variant of the missile was testfired at the maximum range and it hit the target ship with pinpoint accuracy.
"Advanced sea to sea variant of BrahMos Supersonic Cruise missile was tested from INS Visakhapatnam today. The missile hit the designated target ship precisely," the DRDO had said in a tweet.
Multi-role, multi-platform missile for ground, air & sea 
The multi-role and multi-platform supersonic missile system have proven its mettle against the sea, land, as well as air targets and, has been deployed in all three arms of the Indian armed forces.
Launched in 2001, the system has been successfully launched from Sukhoi-30MKI aircraft, various ships of the Indian Navy as well as from mobile autonomous launchers. Its accuracy and ability to integrate with all three services make it one of the most versatile weapon systems in the country.
中文原文: 印度数字时代更新于2022年1月20日14:48IST由印度DRDO和俄罗斯NPOM开发的布拉莫斯是一种通用的远程超音速巡航导弹系统，可以从陆地、海洋和空中发射。布拉莫斯导弹发射（档案）照片：PIB奥迪沙邦布巴内斯瓦尔：据国防消息人士称，印度周四在巴拉索的奥迪沙海岸成功试射了一枚新版本的布拉莫斯超音速巡航导弹。消息人士称，Themissile配备了新的技术开发，并得到了成功的证明。由印度DRDO和俄罗斯NPOM开发的布拉莫斯是一种通用的远程超音速巡航导弹系统，可以从陆地、海洋和空中发射。国防部长拉杰纳特·辛格今天称赞了布拉莫斯、DRDO团队和工业界的成功飞行试验。DRDO国防研发部部长兼主席G Satheesh Reddy博士感谢科学家和工程师们为最大限度地提高武器系统的效率而不断做出的努力。该系统设计了两个变体，用于反舰和对陆攻击。根据DRDO的说法，布拉莫斯武器系统已经加入印度海军(IN)和印度陆军(IA)并投入使用。本月早些时候，一枚成功的布拉莫斯超音速巡航导弹从西海岸的印度海军驱逐舰INS Vishakhapatnam上发射出去。该导弹的海对海变体被测试以最大射程发射，它以精确的精度击中了目标船只。“布拉莫斯超音速巡航导弹的先进海对海变体今天在INS Visakhapatnam进行了测试。导弹精确地击中了指定的目标船只，”DRDO在推特上说。地面、空中和海上多用途、多平台导弹多功能多平台超音速导弹系统已经证明了它对海、陆、空目标的勇气，并已部署在印度武装部队的所有三个兵种。该系统于2001年发射，已经成功地从苏霍伊-30MKI飞机、印度海军的各种船只以及移动自主发射器上发射。它的精确度和与所有三个军种整合的能力使其成为该国最多功能的武器系统之一。

中文标题: 美国2023财年预算扩大制造领域投资以加强供应链
整编内容: 拜登政府在向国会提交的2023财年总统预算中，显著提高了商务部的预算，以通过投资美国制造业加强本土供应链。预算要求提供117亿美元的可自由支配资金支持商务部的关键优先事项，其中：为美国国家标准与技术研究院的制造技术发展计划提供3.72亿美元，比2021年提出的预算增加2.06亿美元，这些资金将在2023财年支持商务部牵头的5个制造创新机构建设；为制造业扩展伙伴关系计划增加1.25亿美元投资，以提升美国中小制造企业的竞争力；为国际经济贸易管理局提供1100万美元，以建立分析能力，满足制造业和服务业对供应链弹性的新要求；为经济分析局提供500万美元，用于开发评估美国在全球供应链竞争力的数据工具。

源标题: Budget Supports Department of Commerce’s Investments in Supporting Economic Growth and Making Communities More Climate Resilient
原文:
The Biden-Harris Administration today submitted to Congress the President’s Budget for fiscal year 2023. The President’s 2023 Budget for the Department of Commerce makes historic investments to strengthen domestic supply chains through domestic manufacturing, help distressed communities recover from the COVID-19 pandemic, uplift minority-owned enterprises, and ensure that we have the tools needed to combat the climate crisis. These critical resources will also complement major investments in broadband internet access and climate resilience being made thanks to President Biden’s Bipartisan Infrastructure Law.
In particular, this budget requests $11.7 billion in discretionary funding to support key Commerce Department priorities, including $372 million for the National Institutes of Standards and Technology’s (NIST) manufacturing programs, more than $150 million in new funding to the Economic Development Administration (EDA) to create jobs and drive growth in economically distressed communities, $110 million to increase services for minority-owned enterprises at the Minority Business Development Agency, and nearly $7 billion in funding for National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA to catalyze wind energy, restore habitats, protect the oceans and coasts, and improve NOAA’s ability to predict extreme weather associated with climate change).
“The President’s budget for the new fiscal year reflects the administration’s unwavering commitment to building a better America,”said Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo. “These historic investments, including $372 million to enhance the Commerce Department’s manufacturing programs and make America’s small and medium manufacturers more competitive, will help to create jobs, build a more resilient workforce and supply chains in the wake of the COVID-19 pandemic, and increase American competitiveness in a 21stcentury global economy.”
“We welcome these new investments to create more targeted advancements in equity and innovation across all sectors of our economy,”said Deputy Commerce Secretary Don Graves. “For example, the Commerce Department’s newly authorized Minority Business Development Agency now has the consequential investments it needs to provide specialized opportunities for businesses and communities that are overlooked far too often. These same communities, which often find themselves on the front lines in dealing with the impacts of climate change, will also benefit greatly from the billions of dollars being provided to NOAA to increase climate resiliency and help us plan for extreme weather events.”
The Budget makes critical investments in the American people that will help lay a stronger foundation for shared growth and prosperity for generations to come. At the Commerce Department, the Budget would:
Strengthens the Nation’s Supply Chains through Domestic Manufacturing.To help ignite a resurgence of American manufacturing, the Budget provides $372 million, an increase of $206 million from the 2021 enacted level, for the National Institutes of Standards and Technology’s (NIST) manufacturing programs. These resources would fund five Manufacturing Innovation Institutes in 2023 as part of the Administration’s growing Manufacturing USA network, which brings together industry, academia, and Government to accelerate manufacturing innovation and commercialization. The Budget also expands the Manufacturing Extension Partnership, providing an increase of $125 million to make America’s small and medium manufacturers more competitive and to ensure that the future is made in all of America by all of America’s workers. The Budget also provides $11 million to the International Trade Administration (ITA) to build analytical capacity in meeting new requirements on supply chain resilience across the manufacturing and services industries, as well as $5 million for the Bureau of Economic Analysis (BEA) to develop new data tools to measure American competitiveness in global supply chains.
中文原文: 拜登-哈里斯政府今天向国会提交了总统2023财年的预算。总统对商务部的2023年预算进行了历史性投资，以通过国内制造业加强国内供应链，帮助贫困社区从新冠肺炎疫情中恢复，提升少数民族拥有的企业，并确保我们拥有应对气候危机所需的工具。由于拜登总统的两党基础设施法，这些关键资源还将补充对宽带互联网接入和气候复原力的重大投资。特别是，该预算要求117亿美元的自由支配资金来支持商务部的关键优先事项，包括3.72亿美元用于美国国家标准和技术研究所(NIST)的制造项目，超过1.5亿美元用于经济发展管理局(EDA)的新资金，以创造就业机会并推动经济困难社区的增长，1.1亿美元用于增加少数族裔商业发展局对少数族裔拥有的企业的服务，以及近70亿美元用于国家海洋和大气管理局(NOAA)的资金，以催化风能，恢复栖息地，保护海洋和海岸，并提高NOAA预测与气候变化相关的极端天气的能力）。商务部长吉娜·雷蒙多（Gina Raimondo）表示：“总统新财年的预算反映了政府对建设一个更美好美国的坚定不移的承诺。”“这些历史性投资，包括3.72亿美元用于加强商务部的制造业项目，并使美国中小型制造商更具竞争力，将有助于创造就业机会，在新冠肺炎疫情后建立更具弹性的劳动力和供应链，并提高美国在21世纪全球经济中的竞争力。”商务部副部长唐·格雷夫斯（Don Graves）表示：“我们欢迎这些新投资，以在我们经济所有部门的公平和创新方面创造更有针对性的进步。”“例如，商务部新授权的少数民族商业发展机构现在有了必要的投资，为经常被忽视的企业和社区提供专门的机会。同样是这些社区，他们经常发现自己处于应对气候变化影响的第一线，也将从向美国国家海洋和大气管理局提供的数十亿美元中受益匪浅，以提高气候弹性，帮助我们应对极端天气事件。“预算对美国人民进行了关键投资，这将有助于为子孙后代的共同增长和繁荣奠定更坚实的基础。在商务部，预算将：通过国内制造加强国家的供应链。为了帮助点燃美国制造业的复苏，预算为美国国家标准和技术研究所(NIST)的制造项目提供了3.72亿美元，比2021年颁布的水平增加了2.06亿美元。这些资源将在2023年资助五个制造业创新机构，作为政府不断增长的美国制造业网络的一部分，该网络将工业界、学术界和政府聚集在一起，以加快制造业创新和商业化。该预算还扩大了制造业延伸伙伴关系，增加了1.25亿美元，以使美国的中小型制造商更具竞争力，并确保未来由美国所有的工人在全美国制造。该预算还向国际贸易管理局(ITA)提供1100万美元，以建设分析能力，满足制造业和服务业对供应链弹性的新要求，并向经济分析局(BEA)提供500万美元，以开发新的数据工具，衡量美国在全球供应链中的竞争力。

中文标题: 俄罗斯和伊朗计划联合生产无人机
整编内容:
据美国《华尔街日报》报道，俄罗斯和伊朗计划在俄罗斯建造一座新工厂，联合生产无人机。
1月初，伊朗一个高级代表团访问了俄罗斯，参观了位于莫斯科以东约600英里的耶拉布加市的计划中的工厂所在地，并敲定了项目启动的细节。预计该工厂每年可生产至少6000架伊朗设计的无人机。两国的目标是制造一种速度更快的无人机，这可能会对乌克兰的防空系统构成新的挑战。俄罗斯此前在乌克兰使用了伊朗提供的无人机，取得了显著效果。
美国官员表示，伊朗已向俄罗斯提供了数百架无人机，用于打击乌克兰的军事和民用目标。拜登政府警告说，俄罗斯和伊朗正在发展“全面的防务伙伴关系”。俄罗斯正在训练伊朗飞行员驾驶俄罗斯喷气式战斗机，目的是在年底前把这些战机送到德黑兰。
伊朗代表团由伊斯兰革命卫队航空航天部队研究与自给自足圣战组织负责人阿卜杜拉·迈赫拉比准将和伊朗圣城航空工业公司首席执行官加塞姆·达马万迪安领导。伊朗圣城航空工业公司是一家重要的军工企业，在伊朗无人机的研制和生产中发挥了重要作用，是研发和制造伊朗无人机的关键制造商。

源标题: Moscow, Tehran Advance Plans for Iranian-Designed Drone Facility in Russia (excerpt)
原文:
Feb. 06, 2023
(Source: Wall Street Journal; published Feb. 05, 2023)
An Iranian delegation has visited Russia and visited locations where it could set up a factory to produce up to 6,000 drones per year, the Wall Street Journal reported. Russia has previously used Iranian-supplied drones to great effect in Ukraine. (WANA news agency photo)
Moscow and Tehran are moving ahead with plans to build a new factory in Russia that could make at least 6,000 Iranian-designed drones for the war in Ukraine, the latest sign of deepening cooperation between the two nations, said officials from a country aligned with the U.S.
As part of their emerging military alliance, the officials said, a high-level Iranian delegation flew to Russia in early January to visit the planned site for the factory and hammer out details to get the project up-and-running. The two countries are aiming to build a faster drone that could pose new challenges for Ukrainian air defenses, the officials said.
Tehran has already provided Moscow with hundreds of drones it has used to hit military and civilian targets in Ukraine, U.S. officials have said. And the Biden administration has warned that Russia and Iran are developing a “full-fledged defense partnership.” The White House says Moscow was training Iranian pilots to fly Russian jet fighters, with the intent of sending Tehran those jets by year’s end.
In December, the White House warned that Moscow and Tehran were considering whether to build a joint drone-production line in Russia.
Now, the U.S.-aligned officials said, the talks have morphed into concrete plans with the Jan. 5 visit to the Russian town of Yelabuga, about 600 miles east of Moscow. They toured the empty site where leaders from the two nations are planning to build a new factory that can produce at least 6,000 drones in the coming years, they said.
The officials said the Iranian delegation was led by Brig. Gen. Abdollah Mehrabi, head of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps Aerospace Force Research and Self-Sufficiency Jihad Organization, and Ghassem Damavandian, the chief executive of Iran’s Quds Aviation Industry, a key defense manufacturer that the U.S. says is central to developing and building the country’s drones.

源标题: Second Successful Flight for DARPA Hypersonic Air-breathing Weapon Concept (HAWC)
原文:
April 05, 2022
DARPA and its U.S. Air Force partner recently completed a free flight test of the Lockheed Martin version of the Hypersonic Air-breathing Weapon Concept (HAWC). The vehicle, after release from a carrier aircraft, was boosted to its Aerojet Rocketdyne scramjet engine ignition envelope. From there, it quickly accelerated to and maintained cruise faster than Mach 5 (five times the speed of sound) for an extended period of time. The vehicle reached altitudes greater than 65,000 feet and flew for more than 300 nautical miles.
This is the second successful flight in DARPA’s HAWC program. Last September, a different vehicle configuration from another contractor team also reached hypersonic flight.
"This Lockheed Martin HAWC flight test successfully demonstrated a second design that will allow our warfighters to competitively select the right capabilities to dominate the battlefield,” said Andrew "Tippy" Knoedler, HAWC program manager in DARPA's Tactical Technology Office. “These achievements increase the level of technical maturity for transitioning HAWC to a service program of record.”
Air-breathing vehicles utilize air captured from the atmosphere to achieve sustained propulsion. The speed and maneuverability of such hypersonic cruise missiles allow both evasion of defenses and quick strikes. Their kinetic energy can effectively destroy targets even without high explosives.
“We are still analyzing flight test data, but are confident that we will provide the U.S. Air Force and Navy with excellent options to diversify the technology available for their future missions,” said Knoedler.
中文原文: 2022年4月05日DARPA及其美国空军合作伙伴最近完成了洛克希德·马丁公司版本的高超音速吸气武器概念(HAWC)的自由飞行测试。该飞行器从舰载机释放后，被提升到其Aerojet Rocketdyne超燃冲压发动机点火包线。从那里，它迅速加速到并保持巡航速度超过5马赫（五倍音速）延长一段时间。飞行器的高度超过65000英尺，飞行了300多海里。这是DARPA的HAWC计划中的第二次成功飞行。去年9月，另一个承包商团队的不同飞行器配置也达到了高超音速飞行。“洛克希德·马丁公司的HAWC飞行试验成功地展示了第二种设计，这将使我们的战斗机有竞争力地选择正确的能力来主导战场，”DARPA战术技术办公室的HAWC项目经理安德鲁·蒂皮·克诺德勒说。“这些成就提高了将HAWC过渡到有记录的服务项目的技术成熟度。”吸气飞行器利用从大气中捕获的空气来实现持续推进。这种高超音速巡航导弹的速度和机动性使其既能规避防御，又能快速打击。它们的动能即使在没有烈性炸药的情况下也能有效摧毁目标。克诺德勒说：“我们仍在分析飞行测试数据，但相信我们将为美国空军和海军提供出色的选择，使其未来任务可用的技术多样化。”

源标题: General Dynamics Receives US National Security Agency Contract for Ethernet Encryptor
原文:
May 30, 2022ByAdmin
General Dynamics Mission Systems announced today that it has been awarded a contract from the U.S. National Security Agency to design, develop, test and deliver a certifiable 400Gbps high-assurance encryption solution that is compliant with the Ethernet Data Encryption Cryptographic Interoperability Specification (EDE-CIS). The winning solution includes the modular TACLANE? E-Series Adaptable Security Platform (ASP) and the TACLANE-ES400 Cryptographic Module. Each module supports throughput ranging from 20Gbps to 400Gbps. When the TACLANE-ASP is fully populated with two ES400 modules, the solution supports aggregate speeds of 1.6 Tbps, more than eight times faster than any other certified encryptor today. The high-speed, fault tolerant solution is engineered to efficiently scale power needs while maintaining performance. Its modular architecture allows customers to right-size their encryption solution to meet specific needs through the application of user-swappable hardware components, crypto modules, and software upgrades.
“General Dynamics Mission Systems is known for providing the most widely deployed high assurance encryptors in the world. With the development of the ASP and TACLANE-ES400 cryptographic modules, we are continuing to advance our encryption portfolio to address our customers’ need for high performance processing and speed with uncompromised data security and efficient power consumption,” said Brian Morrison, vice president for the Cyber Systems line of business with General Dynamics Mission Systems. “This win demonstrates our commitment to our customers who require the highest of speeds. It also validates our unique modular approach, fully aligned with NSA’s vision of Crypto as IT (CIT). We will deliver a future-proof TACLANE E-Series portfolio, which will ensure that our customer’s investments can be re-used as speeds increase.”
TACLANE Adaptable Security Platform (ASP)
The design of the TACLANE E-Series ASP reduces the equipment footprint while balancing power and cooling needs. Its redundant design for power and failover eases maintenance and sustainability requirements, increasing operational availability and reducing downtime to keep mission critical networks working. As with all TACLANE products, the TACLANE ASP and the ES400 Crypto Module are supported by the GEM? One Encryptor Manager with the new Key Management Infrastructure Delivery Only Client feature to simplify operations and facilitate easier management and configuration. In addition to this feature, GEM One provides the ability to rapidly assess overall network health and to quickly isolate and recover from failures, eliminating downtime. When bandwidth and security needs grow, the design of the TACLANE E-Series ASP allows for end-users to add functionality and capability without infrastructure changes.
General Dynamics Mission Systems, a business unit of General Dynamics, provides mission-critical solutions to defense, intelligence and cyber-security customers across all domains. Headquartered in Fairfax, Virginia, General Dynamics Mission Systems employs more than 12,000 people worldwide. General Dynamics Mission Systems integrates secure communication and information systems and technology. General Dynamics Mission Systems has core manufacturing in secure communications networks; radios and satellite technology for the defense, cyber, public safety, and intelligence communities. General Dynamics Mission Systems was formed in January 2015 when General Dynamics combined the company’s C4 Systems and Advanced Information Systems. General Dynamics C4 Systems was originally owned by GTE and operated as GTE Government Systems. General Dynamics acquired GTE Government Systems in 1999.
