源标题: A concept for the Canadian used nuclear fuel repository (Image: NWMO)
原文:
One-year delay in Canadian repository site selection
15 August 2022
Canada's Nuclear Waste Management Organization (NWMO) has said that, due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, it now does not expect to identify a preferred site for a deep geological repository until late-2024. It had previously expected to make the decision next year.
The NWMO is charged with implementing Canada's plan for the safe, long-term management of used fuel, known as Adaptive Phased Management, and launched the site selection process in 2010. The selected site must have the support of "informed and willing" hosts and NWMO is working to ensure that the chosen location will be safe and secure.
By 2012, 22 communities had expressed an interest in learning about the project and exploring their potential to host it. Eleven of those communities went forward to the second phase of the NWMO's preliminary assessment process. By the end of 2019, the list of potential host communities had been narrowed down to two: the Revell Site, some 43 km northwest of the town of Ignace, and 21 km southeast of the Wabigoon Lake Ojibway Nation; and the South Bruce Site, about 5 km northwest of Teeswater in the Municipality of South Bruce.
"With a project of such complexity and generational scope, we have always anticipated that we will need to adapt over the course of the process, while also keeping an eye on the long view," NWMO said. "Like all organisations and businesses, several provincial lockdowns associated with the COVID-19 pandemic impacted our work.
"In reviewing our rolling five-year implementation plan and considering the impacts of the pandemic, we have made the decision to shift the timing for site selection. We now anticipate we will identify a preferred site by fall 2024."
NWMO Vice-President of Site Selection Lise Morton said the organisation experienced a significant loss of time for face-to-face engagement and interaction, especially in communities exploring their potential to host the project. "Making this small adjustment in timing also gives us and the potential host communities additional time to review and absorb new information as they consider if hosting the project aligns with their vision and priorities."
Once the final site selection has been made, its safety will be confirmed through a rigorous regulatory review of the repository design and safety case. The regulatory and licensing process is expected to take approximately 10 years to complete.
NWMO said it does not expect the shift in timing in selecting the preferred site to impact the overall schedule for Canada's plan. It noted construction of the repository is still expected to begin in 2033, and operation of the repository is expected to begin in the early-2040s.
中文原文: 加拿大储存库选址延迟一年2022年8月15日加拿大核废料管理组织(NWMO)表示，由于新冠肺炎疫情的影响，它现在预计要到2024年底才能确定深层地质处置库的首选地点。该公司此前预计将于明年做出决定。NWMO负责实施加拿大关于使用过的燃料的安全、长期管理的计划，称为适应性分阶段管理，并于2010年启动了选址进程。选定的地点必须得到“知情和自愿”的东道主的支持，西北气象组织正在努力确保选定的地点是安全和有保障的。到2012年，已有22个社区表示有兴趣了解该项目并探讨其主办该项目的潜力。其中11个社区进入了西北气象组织初步评估进程的第二阶段。截至2019年底，潜在的东道社区名单已缩小到两个：位于伊格纳斯镇西北约43公里处的Revell遗址和位于瓦比贡湖Ojibway国家东南21公里处的Wabigoon Lake Ojibway Nation；南布鲁斯遗址位于南布鲁斯市提斯沃特西北约5公里处。NWMO说：“对于一个如此复杂和具有一代人规模的项目，我们一直预计我们需要在这个过程中进行适应，同时也要着眼于长远。”“像所有组织和企业一样，与新冠肺炎疫情相关的几个省级封锁影响了我们的工作。“在审查我们的滚动五年实施计划并考虑到疫情的影响时，我们决定改变选址的时间。我们现在预计，到2024年秋季，我们将确定一个首选地点。”NWMO负责选址的副总裁莉斯·莫顿（Lise Morton）表示，该组织经历了面对面接触和互动的大量时间损失，尤其是在探索主办该项目潜力的社区。“在时间上做出这一小小的调整也给了我们和潜在的东道社区更多的时间来审查和吸收新的信息，因为他们认为主办项目是否符合他们的愿景和优先事项。”一旦最终选址完成，其安全性将通过对储存库设计和安全案例的严格监管审查得到确认。监管和许可程序预计需要大约10年才能完成。NWMO表示，预计选择首选地点的时间变化不会影响加拿大计划的总体时间表。它指出，储存库的建设预计仍将于2033年开始，储存库的运营预计将于20世纪40年代初开始。

源标题: Saab Celebrates U.S. Expansion with Opening of New Facility
原文:
Oct 13 2021
Saab announced the grand opening of its new facility located in West Lafayette, Indiana on October 13, 2021. This purpose-built facility represents a major step in both Saab’s global expansion strategy and growth and investment in the U.S.
Saab announced in May 2019 that West Lafayette would be the location for its expansion in the U.S. aerospace sector and construction of the facility began in 2020. It has been completed on-time and on-budget and will start by being the site for domestic production of Saab’s aft airframe section for the T-7A Red Hawk trainer program. It will also support research and development in autonomy, artificial intelligence and advanced manufacturing.
“This opening marks a historic moment for Saab. This high-tech facility and its growing workforce are a result of Saab’s continued investment in the United States. Just as the T-7A Red Hawk will train the next generation of fighter and bomber pilots, we look forward to welcoming and training the next generation of aerospace engineers and other skilled employees,” said President and Group CEO of Saab Micael Johansson. “As a trusted local partner, Saab is committed to investing in both our West Lafayette community and the research and development for a more sustainable world to keep people and society safe.”
“Indiana is a natural home for Saab, and it’s exciting to be here today to celebrate the opening of this fantastic facility,” said Indiana Governor Eric J. Holcomb. “Saab is putting Hoosiers to work in aerospace and defense, and that’s something we can all be proud of. I’m thrilled that Indiana and Purdue University are helping to redefine the future of aerospace with the T-7A Red Hawk program in West Lafayette,” said Eric J. Holcomb, Governor of Indiana.
By 2027, Saab expects to hire up to 300 employees for this facility, including assemblers, engineers, system administrators, and more. The West Lafayette facility will also work collaboratively with Purdue on research and development in sensor systems, artificial intelligence and more. Saab plans to export products and technology from this facility.
“We are thrilled by the internship and employment opportunities this relationship will bring to Purdue University students and alumni,” said Mitch Daniels, President of Purdue University. “It is a privilege to house the new Saab facility in Purdue’s Discovery Park District, and to collaborate with a world-renowned company like Saab in protecting the security of Americans.”
“This new facility is our seventh U.S. location - as Saab, Inc., we’re proud to be an American-run company selling American-made products,” said Erik Smith, President and CEO of Saab, Inc. “With our deep understanding of the mission of the U.S. military and a culture that drives us to work swiftly, efficiently and collaboratively with customers, we couldn’t be more excited about the opportunities ahead to help keep Americans safe at home and abroad.”
The T-7A Red Hawk is an all-new, advanced pilot training system designed and manufactured through a Saab-Boeing partnership for the U.S. Air Force to train the next generation of fighter and bomber pilots. Saab’s site in West Lafayette will build an aft section with installed subsystems that extends from behind the cockpit to the end of the aircraft, and supply them to Boeing’s final assembly line in St. Louis for joining with the front section, wings, fins and tail.
The T-7A Red Hawk has been named as an ode to the Tuskegee Airmen, the first African-American military aviators in the U.S. Army Air Corps, which eventually became the U.S. Air Force. In World War II, these aviators frequently painted their planes with a red-tailed color scheme, and the T-7A has been officially named the Red Hawk in their honor.
中文原文: 2021年10月13日2021年10月13日，萨博宣布其位于印第安纳州西拉斐特的新工厂盛大开业。这一专门建造的设施代表了萨博全球扩张战略以及在美国的增长和投资的重要一步。萨博在2019年5月宣布，西拉斐特将是其在美国航空航天领域扩张的地点，该设施于2020年开始建设。它已经按时、按预算完成，并将作为萨博T-7A红鹰教练机项目后机身部分的国内生产基地开始。还将支持自主、人工智能、先进制造等方面的研发。“这一开放标志着萨博的一个历史性时刻。这一高科技设施及其不断增长的劳动力是萨博在美国持续投资的结果。正如T-7A红鹰将培养下一代战斗和轰炸机飞行员一样，我们期待着欢迎和培养下一代航空航天工程师和其他熟练员工，“萨博总裁兼集团首席执行官米凯尔·约翰逊说。“作为一个值得信赖的当地合作伙伴，萨博致力于投资于我们的西拉斐特社区，并为一个更可持续的世界进行研发，以确保人们和社会的安全。”印第安纳州州长埃里克·J·霍尔科姆（Eric J.Holcomb）说：“印第安纳州是萨博的天然家园，今天能在这里庆祝这一奇妙的设施的开放令人兴奋。”“萨博正在让山地人在航空航天和国防领域工作，这是我们都可以自豪的事情。印第安纳州州长埃里克·J·霍尔科姆（Eric J.Holcomb）表示：“我很高兴印第安纳州和普渡大学正在帮助西拉斐特的T-7A红鹰计划重新定义航空航天的未来。”到2027年，萨博预计将为该设施雇佣多达300名员工，包括装配工、工程师、系统管理员等。西拉斐特工厂还将与普渡在传感器系统、人工智能等方面进行合作研发。萨博计划从该设施出口产品和技术。普渡大学校长米奇·丹尼尔斯说：“我们很高兴这种关系将给普渡大学的学生和校友带来实习和就业机会。”“很荣幸能在普渡的探索公园区建造新的萨博设施，并与萨博这样的世界知名公司合作保护美国人的安全。”萨博公司总裁兼首席执行官埃里克·史密斯（Erik Smith）表示：“这一新设施是我们在美国的第七个地点--作为萨博公司，我们为成为一家销售美国制造产品的美国人经营的公司感到自豪。”“由于我们对美国军方使命的深刻理解，以及推动我们与客户快速、高效和合作的文化，我们对未来帮助保护美国人国内外安全的机会感到非常兴奋。”T-7A红鹰是一种全新的、先进的飞行员培训系统，通过萨博-波音合作伙伴关系为美国空军设计和制造，以培训下一代战斗机和轰炸机飞行员。萨博在西拉斐特的工厂将建造一个尾部部分，安装了从驾驶舱后面延伸到飞机尾部的子系统，并将它们提供给波音在圣路易斯的总装线，用于与前部、机翼、鳍和尾翼连接。T-7A红鹰被命名为塔斯基吉空军的颂歌，塔斯基吉空军是美国陆军航空队中第一批非裔美国军事飞行员，最终成为美国空军。在第二次世界大战中，这些飞行员经常给他们的飞机涂上红尾的配色方案，T-7A被正式命名为红鹰，以示对他们的敬意。

中文标题: BAE系统公司获得DARPA射频混合模式集成电路第二阶段合同
整编内容: 国防高级研究计划局（DARPA）近日授予BAE系统公司一份价值500万美元的合同，以开展“混合模式超大规模集成电路”（T-MUSIC）项目第二阶段的研制任务。本项目最终将为通信、雷达和电子战应用提供宽频覆盖、高分辨率、大动态范围和高信息处理带宽的晶片。该任务将基于项目第一阶段射频混合模式电路设计的目标，继续开发先进电子能力，提供集成射频模拟和数字电子产品，为美国防部在先进射频传感器和高容量通信方面提高能力奠定基础。
整编机构: 中国电科
源标题: BAE Secures Phase 2 Contract for DARPA’s Integrated RF Electronics Program
原文:
BAE Systems’ research and development arm will continue developing radio frequency mixed-mode circuit designs for the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency under a Phase 2 award worth $5 million.
The company said Wednesday its FAST Labs will work on integrated RF analog and digital electronics for the second phase of the Technologies for Mixed-mode Ultra Scaled Integrated Circuits program.
R&D work under the T-MUSIC initiative is aimed at producing wafers capable of providing wide spectral coverage, high resolution, large dynamic range and high information processing bandwidth for communications, radar and electronic warfare applications.
“Building on the success of Phase 1, in Phase 2 we’ll continue to develop the advanced electronics capabilities that could serve as the foundation for greatly enhanced Department of Defense capabilities in advanced RF sensors and high capacity communication,” said Chris Rappa, product line director for RF, EW and advanced electronics at FAST Labs.
BAE will perform work at its facilities in Merrimack, New Hampshire; Lexington, Massachusetts; and Manassas, Virginia.
中文原文: BAE系统公司的研发部门将继续为国防高级研究计划局开发射频混合模式电路设计，获得价值500万美元的第二阶段奖励。该公司周三表示，其快速实验室将为混合模式超大规模集成电路项目的第二阶段开发集成射频模拟和数字电子技术。T-MUSIC计划下的研发工作旨在生产能够为通信、雷达和电子战应用提供宽光谱覆盖、高分辨率、大动态范围和高信息处理带宽的晶圆。FAST实验室射频、电子战和先进电子产品线总监克里斯·拉帕（Chris Rappa）表示：“在第一阶段成功的基础上，在第二阶段，我们将继续开发先进的电子能力，这可能是大大增强国防部在先进射频传感器和高容量通信方面能力的基础。”BAE将在新罕布什尔州梅里马克的设施中工作；马萨诸塞州列克星敦；和弗吉尼亚州的马纳萨斯。

中文标题: 美国开发出可用于植物的可穿戴设备
整编内容: 近日，美国化学学会的研究人员开发了一种可用于植物的可穿戴设备。智能手表用紧贴在皮肤上的电极来监测佩戴者心脏活动，因此医生可以远程监控和评估患者的健康状况。同样，植物可穿戴设备也可以帮助农民远程监控植物的健康状况。此前，研究人员已经开发了一种金属电极，但该电极收集的数据非常不准确。为此，研究人员开发了两种类型的新电极，一种由镍沉积而成，具有窄而弯曲的图案，另一种是从涂有蜡膜的纸上切割下来的。当用透明胶带将两个电极贴在分离的大豆叶子上时，镍基电极表现得非常好，随着叶子变干，它可以产生更强的信号。这种新型可穿戴设备在节约资源的同时还促进了植物产量的增加。
关键词: 植物可穿戴设备 负电容 节约资源 产量
整编机构: 国家工业信息安全发展研究中心
源标题: A new wearable technology—for plants
原文:
Plants can't speak up when they are thirsty. And visual signs, such as shriveling or browning leaves, don't start until most of their water is gone. To detect water loss earlier, researchers reporting in ACS Applied Materials & Interfaces have created a wearable sensor for plant leaves. The system wirelessly transmits data to a smartphone app, allowing for remote management of drought stress in gardens and crops.
Newer wearable devices are more than simple step-counters. Some smart watches now monitor the electrical activity of the wearer's heart with electrodes that sit against the skin. And because many devices can wirelessly share the data that are collected, physicians can monitor and assess their patients' health from a distance.
Similarly, plant-wearable devices could help farmers and gardeners remotely monitor their plants' health, including leaf water content—the key marker of metabolism and drought stress. Previously, researchers had developed metal electrodes for this purpose, but the electrodes had problems staying attached, which reduced the accuracy of the data. So, Renato Lima and colleagues wanted to identify an electrode design that was reliable for long-term monitoring of plants' water stress, while also staying put.
The researchers created two types of electrodes: one made of nickel deposited in a narrow, squiggly pattern, and the other cut from partially burnt paper that was coated with a waxy film. When the team affixed both electrodes to detached soybean leaves with clear adhesive tape, the nickel-based electrodes performed better, producing larger signals as the leaves dried out.
The metal ones also adhered more strongly in the wind, which was likely because the thin squiggly design of the metallic film allowed more of the tape to connect with the leaf surface. Next, the researchers created a plant-wearable device with the metal electrodes and attached it to a living plant in a greenhouse.
The device wirelessly shared data to a smartphone app and website, and a simple, fast machine learning technique successfully converted these data to the percent of water content lost. The researchers say that monitoring water content on leaves can indirectly provide information on exposure to pests and toxic agents.
Because the plant-wearable device provides reliable data indoors, they now plan to test the devices in outdoor gardens and crops to determine when plants need to be watered, potentially saving resources and increasing yields.
中文原文: 植物口渴时说不出话来。而视觉上的迹象，如枯萎或褐变的叶子，直到它们的大部分水分消失后才开始出现。为了更早地检测水分流失，研究人员在ACS应用材料与接口杂志上报道了一种可穿戴的植物叶片传感器。该系统将数据无线传输到智能手机应用程序，允许远程管理花园和作物的干旱压力。较新的可穿戴设备不仅仅是简单的计步器。一些智能手表现在通过贴着皮肤的电极来监测佩戴者心脏的电活动。由于许多设备可以无线共享收集的数据，医生可以从远处监测和评估病人的健康。同样，植物可穿戴设备可以帮助农民和园丁远程监测他们的植物健康，包括叶片含水量--代谢和干旱胁迫的关键标志。此前，研究人员为此开发了金属电极，但电极在保持连接时存在问题，这降低了数据的准确性。因此，雷纳托·利马和他的同事们想要找到一种电极设计，这种设计既能可靠地长期监测植物的水分胁迫，又能保持不变。研究人员创造了两种类型的电极：一种是由镍制成的，沉积在狭窄的、弯曲的图案中，另一种是由部分燃烧的纸切割而成的，纸上涂有蜡膜。当研究小组用透明胶带将两个电极固定在分离的大豆叶片上时，镍基电极表现更好，当叶片干燥时产生更大的信号。金属薄膜在风中也粘附得更强，这可能是因为金属薄膜薄薄的弯曲设计允许更多的胶带与叶子表面连接。接下来，研究人员用金属电极制造了一种植物可穿戴设备，并将其连接到温室中的一株活体植物上。该设备将数据无线共享到智能手机应用程序和网站，一种简单、快速的机器学习技术成功地将这些数据转换为水分损失的百分比。研究人员说，监测树叶上的水分含量可以间接提供接触害虫和毒剂的信息。由于植物可穿戴设备在室内提供可靠的数据，他们现在计划在室外花园和作物中测试该设备，以确定植物何时需要浇水，这可能节省资源并提高产量。

中文标题: 英国研究称俄对乌打击导弹应用了美国技术
整编内容: 1月10日，英国皇家三军联合研究所（RUSI）发布简报称，虽然美对俄有严格的出口管制，但俄部分导弹配装有美国与其他西方国家研发、生产的武器部件。RUSI依据乌克兰收集的击落武器残骸，对俄罗斯武器进行了广泛评估，发现其中存在大量西方部件。RUSI认为，俄罗斯通过美国模拟器件公司（ADI）、德州仪器公司（TI）及其他国家一些公司进行了技术走私。自俄乌冲突以来，美国实施了大规模出口管制，以防美国技术流入俄罗斯。近期，美国与德国均已承诺向乌克兰提供“爱国者”防空系统。
整编机构: 北京海鹰科技情报研究所
源标题: Russian Missiles Used Against Ukraine ‘Absolutely Filled’ With US Tech
原文:
Remains of a Russian missile Ukrainian forces reportedly shot down in the southern region of the country on Nov. 15, 2022. Photo from the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine via Facebook.
For months now, Ukraine has faced a barrage of Russian missile and drone attacks, straining its Soviet-era air defenses. But as the U.S. and its allies work to provide Ukraine with upgraded technology to defend against those strikes, an open-source intelligence analysis has found the Russian missiles have plenty of U.S. technology of their own.
In a Jan. 10 briefing, analysts from the Royal Institute of Strategic Studies, detailed how many of Russia’s missiles have American and other Western components, despite export controls in place.
“All of these pieces of equipment were absolutely filled with Western components,” James Byrne, the Director of the Open Source Intelligence and Analysis Research Group at RUSI, said. “For us, it’s very interesting, very surprising. Nearly everything that we found in those systems was manufactured, designed by American companies.”
Bryne said RUSI was able to conduct its extensive assessments in part because Ukraine has offered up weapons it has shot down, captured, or collected the wreckage of, for inspection by analysts. 
“As the course of the war progressed, a lot of the components that we saw in these platforms and that we have since seen in these platforms are relatively new,” Byrne said. “The Russians have been doing it for a really long time, and they’re still doing it now.” 
Byrne said the two largest suppliers of tech it found in Russian weapons were the U.S.-based Analog Devices and Texas Instruments—much of that technology has non-military applications, making a crackdown on their export harder. And according to the British think tank, Russia has various schemes to smuggle technology into the country, including front companies in third countries. 
The U.S. has put in place expansive export controls to prevent American technology and goods from heading to Russia since Moscow’s renewed invasion begin in February 2022. That’s on top of other steps the U.S. took after the original Russian invasion of Ukraine in 2014, including the strengthening of export controls on weapons technology. 
However, according to RUSI, some of the weapons used by Russia in Ukraine have been made in the past year. 
“It’s always been the case that there was a huge interest in acquiring American technology,” Byrne said. “Despite Russian efforts to sort of build this sort of domestic homegrown semiconductor industry, despite the propaganda, despite the discussion about import substitution, they haven’t succeeded in doing that. I personally don’t think they will ever really be able to succeed in doing that. And so it leaves them really critically dependent on foreign technology.” 
The Department of Commerce did not immediately reply to a request for comment from Air & Space Forces Magazine on the effectiveness of U.S. export controls. 
As Russia has continued to pummel Ukrainian infrastructure this winter, the U.S. and its allies have sought to provide Ukraine with an integrated, modern air and missile defense network. Most recently, both the U.S. and Germany have pledged to give the Ukrainians one of its more advanced systems: the PATRIOT air defense system.
On Jan. 10, Pentagon press secretary Brig. Gen. Patrick S. Ryder announced that Ukrainian soldiers will begin training to operate the PATRIOT at Fort Sill, the same place American troops are trained on the system, as soon as next week.
Doing so will require Ukraine to pull some troops off the front lines; Training on a U.S. PATRIOT battery takes several months, though it could be expedited by skipping some steps deemed nonessential. 
“The longer those troops are off the line, they’re not actually engaged in combat, and so [we’re] trying to work with the Ukrainians to see what we can do to accelerate the training timeline,” Ryder said. “In terms of what that training will look like, it will consist of training in the classrooms, it will consist of training on the PATRIOT systems, and then of course, in a simulation lab as well before they actually deploy the capability on the battlefield.” 
Ryder said Ukraine plans to send soldiers already trained in air defense to Fort Sill, where the Ukrainian troops will be instructed by the same teachers used for U.S. and allied troops who operate the system. Around 90 Ukrainians will be trained, which is the same number of troops the U.S. uses to operate its PATRIOT batteries. 
Ryder also stressed the importance of not cutting too many corners in the training process, citing lessons learned from watching the Russians struggle with combined arms maneuvers due to poor training and techniques, leaving their advanced equipment less useful.
“My understanding is that nothing will be done that would prevent this from being employed to the maximum, most effective way possible,” Ryder said. “If give you a piece of equipment, I’m simply giving you a piece of equipment, but if I give you the equipment and I give you the training, I now give you a capability. So that’s really essential here to ensuring that not only do the Ukrainians have the equipment they need to fight, but also the training that’s going to enable them to operate it on the frontline.”
中文原文: 据报道，2022年11月15日，乌克兰军队在该国南部地区击落了一枚俄罗斯导弹的残骸。照片来自乌克兰武装部队总参谋部通过脸书。几个月来，乌克兰一直面临俄罗斯导弹和无人机的接二连三的袭击，使其苏联时代的防空紧张。但随着美国及其盟友努力向乌克兰提供升级的技术来防御这些袭击，一项开源情报分析发现，俄罗斯导弹拥有大量自己的美国技术。在1月10日的一次简报中，皇家战略研究所的分析师详细说明了俄罗斯有多少导弹拥有美国和其他西方部件，尽管实施了出口管制。“所有这些设备都绝对充满了西方组件，”RUSI开源情报和分析研究组主任詹姆斯·伯恩说。“对我们来说，这非常有趣，非常令人惊讶。我们在这些系统中发现的几乎所有东西都是由美国公司制造和设计的。“布莱恩说，RUSI能够进行广泛的评估，部分原因是乌克兰提供了它击落、捕获或收集的武器，供分析师检查。伯恩说：“随着战争进程的进展，我们在这些平台上看到的许多组件以及我们后来在这些平台上看到的许多组件都是相对较新的。”“俄罗斯人已经做了很长时间了，他们现在还在做。”伯恩说，它在俄罗斯武器中发现的两个最大的技术供应商是总部位于美国的模拟器件和德克萨斯仪器公司--这些技术中的许多都有非军事应用，这使得对它们出口的打击更加困难。根据英国智库的说法，俄罗斯有各种向该国走私技术的计划，包括第三国的幌子公司。自2022年2月莫斯科开始再次入侵以来，美国已经实施了广泛的出口管制，以防止美国技术和商品流向俄罗斯。这是美国在2014年俄罗斯最初入侵乌克兰后采取的其他措施之一，包括加强对武器技术的出口控制。不过，按照鲁西的说法，俄罗斯在乌克兰使用的一些武器是过去一年制造的。伯恩说：“一直以来，人们对获得美国技术有着巨大的兴趣。”“尽管俄罗斯努力建立这种国内本土半导体产业，尽管宣传，尽管关于进口替代的讨论，但他们没有成功做到这一点。我个人认为他们永远不会真正成功做到这一点。因此，这使得他们非常严重地依赖外国技术。“美国商务部没有立即回复《空军与太空部队》杂志就美国出口管制的有效性发表评论的请求。随着俄罗斯今年冬天继续轰炸乌克兰的基础设施，美国及其盟友寻求为乌克兰提供一个一体化的现代空中和导弹防御网络。最近，美国和德国都承诺给乌克兰人一个更先进的系统：爱国者防空系统。1月10日，五角大楼新闻秘书帕特里克·赖德准将宣布，乌克兰士兵最早将于下周开始在希尔堡训练操作爱国者，希尔堡是美国军队在该系统上接受训练的地方。这样做将要求乌克兰从前线撤出一些军队；在美国爱国者电池上的训练需要几个月的时间，尽管可以通过跳过一些被认为不重要的步骤来加快训练。赖德说：“这些部队离开线的时间越长，他们实际上就没有参与战斗，所以（我们）正试图与乌克兰人合作，看看我们能做些什么来加快训练时间表。”“就训练的样子而言，它将包括在教室里的训练，它将包括在爱国者系统上的训练，当然，在他们在战场上实际部署能力之前，也包括在模拟实验室里的训练。”赖德说，乌克兰计划向希尔堡派遣已经接受过防空训练的士兵，在那里乌克兰军队将接受操作该系统的美国和盟军军队使用的相同教师的指导。大约90名乌克兰人将接受训练，这与美国用来操作爱国者电池的军队人数相同。赖德还强调了在训练过程中不要偷工减料的重要性，他引用了从观察俄罗斯人因训练和技术差而在联合武器机动中挣扎中吸取的教训，这使得他们的先进设备不太有用。赖德说：“我的理解是，没有什么能阻止这一点得到最大限度、最有效的利用。”“如果给你一块等分

中文标题: 韩国地面站运营商订购其对地观测卫星
整编内容: 韩国卫星地面站服务提供商康泰克公司（Contec）采购了来自纳米航空航天电子公司（NanoAvionics）的一颗对地观测卫星。该卫星用于图像收集，检测城市、植被、沿海地区和未经授权建筑的一系列变化等。纳NanoAvionics将提供尺寸为16U的模块化卫星平台，搭载商康泰克公司的激光通信终端，及南非西梅拉感知公司（Simera Sense）的综合成像仪。该卫星将于2023年下半年搭载SpaceX公司的“猎鹰”-9火箭发射。商康泰克公司正在建立一个端到端的卫星基础设施，为客户提供地面站服务和卫星图像预处理，以及卫星图像应用程序。目前在韩国首尔和济州岛运营着2个地面站，另外还有10个正在建设中，其中一个在韩国港口城市釜山，9个在海外地点，分别位于爱尔兰、阿拉斯加、瑞典、芬兰、阿曼、南非、马来西亚、澳大利亚和拉丁美洲。这10个在建设施将在2022年7月前全面投入运营，形成一个可覆盖全球的网络，高效地交付卫星数据。
整编机构: 中国航天系统科学与工程研究院
源标题: South Korean ground station operator orders its first EO satellite
原文:
SEOUL, South Korea — Contec, a ground station services provider here, has signed a contract with smallsat mission integrator NanoAvionics for an Earth observation satellite that will launch in the second half of 2023 aboard a SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket.
Under the dealannounced Oct. 27, the U.S.-based NanoAvionics will provide a modular 16U satellite bus that will consist of Contec’s laser communication terminal (LCT) and an integrated imager with 1.5-meter resolution, supplied by South Africa’s Simera Sense.
The deal marks the Korean startup’s effort to diversify its business portfolio ahead of its Series C funding round next year. Contec, established in 2015 as a spin-off from Korea Aerospace Research Institute, raised about 13.6 billion won ($11.47 million) in the two previous funding rounds. Its investors include South Korea’s major lenders such as Shinhan Financial Group, Korea Development Bank, Industrial Bank of Korea and antenna makerIntellian Technologies.
Contec currently operates two ground stations in South Korea (Seoul and Jeju Island) with 10 others under construction — one in South Korea’s port city of Busan and nine in overseas locations, each in Ireland, Alaska, Sweden, Finland, Oman, South Africa, Malaysia, Australia and Latin America. The 10 under-construction facilities will be fully operational no later than July 2022, making a globe-spanning network for efficient delivery of satellite data, according to Contec.
“We are trying to build an end-to-end satellite infrastructure where we can provide clients with ground station services and satellite imagery pre-processing, as well as satellite imagery applications,” Contec CEO Lee Sung-hee toldSpaceNews. “While we have technological capacity to do the first two things [ground station services and satellite imagery pre-processing] on our own, we have had to rely on outsourced satellite images for application services because we have no satellites in orbit. The deal with NanoAvionics was the very first step toward having our own satellites in orbit. Once in orbit, the nanosatellite will enable us to produce customized satellite imagery.”
Images collected by the satellite will be used to detect changes of urban, vegetation, coastal areas and unauthorized construction, just to name a few, according to the CEO. “Some local governments have already shown interest in the service,” he said.
Lee said Contec will acquire additional EO nanosatellites to strengthen its competitiveness in satellite imagery applications.
“We will place an order for another nanosatellite next year,” he said. “We can choose NanoAvionics again, but there are other makers under consideration, including domestic satellite startup NARA Space Technology.”
Lee said his company’s long-term mission is having an ability to produce satellites on its own. And NanoAvionics will play a key role in realizing it by sharing its satellite manufacturing technologies with Contec, he said.
“NanoAvionics is a win-win partner for us,” Lee said. “Contec will learn how to manufacture satellites from NanoAvionics. And in return, we will help NanoAvionics explore business opportunities here. To that end, it’s possible [for the two companies] to establish a joint venture here.”
中文原文: 韩国首尔--这里的地面站服务提供商康泰克（Contec）与smallsat任务集成商纳米航空电子公司（NanoAvionics）签署了一份地球观测卫星合同，该卫星将于2023年下半年搭载SpaceX猎鹰9号火箭发射。根据10月27日宣布的协议，总部位于美国的纳米航空电子公司将提供一个模块化的16U卫星总线，该总线将由康泰克的激光通信终端(LCT)和一个由南非Simera Sense提供的1.5米分辨率的集成成像器组成。这笔交易标志着这家韩国初创公司在明年C轮融资之前努力实现业务组合多样化。康泰克成立于2015年，是韩国航空航天研究所的副产品，在前两轮融资中筹集了约136亿韩元（1147万美元）。它的投资者包括韩国主要银行，如新韩金融集团、韩国产业银行、韩国工业银行和天线makerIntellian Technologies。Contec目前在韩国运营两个地面站（首尔和济州岛），另有10个正在建设中--一个在韩国港口城市釜山，9个在海外，每个在爱尔兰、阿拉斯加、瑞典、芬兰、阿曼、南非、马来西亚、澳大利亚和拉丁美洲。根据Contec的说法，10个在建设施将不迟于2022年7月全面投入运营，成为一个有效交付卫星数据的全球网络。“我们正试图建立一个端到端的卫星基础设施，在那里我们可以为客户提供地面站服务和卫星图像预处理，以及卫星图像应用，”康迪泰克首席执行官李成熙告诉SpaceNews。“虽然我们有技术能力独自完成前两件事（地面站服务和卫星图像预处理），但我们不得不依赖外包的卫星图像提供应用服务，因为我们在轨道上没有卫星。与纳米航空电子设备的交易是我们在轨道上拥有自己的卫星的第一步。一旦进入轨道，纳米卫星将使我们能够制作定制的卫星图像。“这位首席执行官说，卫星收集的图像将用于检测城市、植被、沿海地区和未经授权的建筑的变化，仅举几例。“一些地方政府已经对这项服务表现出兴趣，”他说。李说，康迪泰克将收购更多的EO纳卫星，以加强其在卫星图像应用方面的竞争力。“我们明年将订购另一颗纳米卫星，”他说。“我们可以再次选择纳米航空电子，但也有其他制造商在考虑之中，包括国内卫星初创企业奈良空间技术。”李说，他的公司的长期任务是拥有自己生产卫星的能力。他说，纳米航空电子公司将通过与康迪泰克公司分享其卫星制造技术，在实现这一目标方面发挥关键作用。“纳米航空电子对我们来说是一个双赢的合作伙伴，”李说。“康泰克将学习如何从纳米航空电子设备中制造卫星。作为回报，我们将帮助纳米航空电子在这里探索商机。为此，（两家公司）有可能在这里建立合资企业。“

中文标题: 莱斯大学开发出显著简化石墨烯合成的新模型
整编内容:
两年前，美国莱斯实验室发现了一种加速石墨烯合成的工艺，该工艺可利用各种碳源制造石墨烯，有望实现更环保的回收利用。
在《先进材料》（Advanced Materials）的一篇论文中，研究人员公布了能够适应变量和优化程序的机器学习模型，机器学习算法具有可扩展功能，能够加速闪光加热过程，而且不会对石墨烯产品的性能产生负面影响。未来，闪光加热参数可能会原料的差异而进行调整，因此可以根据想要的类型制造石墨烯。因为闪光加热制造石墨烯的过程仅为数百毫秒，所以很难梳理出化学过程的细节。因此，该团队决定将机器学习融入其日常研究当中。
事实证明，机器学习和闪光焦耳加热具有非常好的协同作用。闪光焦耳加热是一种兼容性强的技术，但其中的一些变量很难控制，例如反应过程中的电流放电速率，这就是机器学习可以真正发挥作用的地方。即使不可能对参数空间进行完整搜索，但它也是查找多个变量之间关系的绝佳工具。
研究人员使用其定制的优化模型对四种原始材料（炭黑、塑料热解灰、热解橡胶轮胎和焦炭）的石墨烯结晶进行优化，经过173次以上的试验，使用拉曼光谱来表征原始材料和石墨烯产品。然后，他们将20000多个光谱结果输入模型，并要求它预测哪些初始材料可以提供最佳的石墨烯产量。该模型还会将电荷密度、试样质量以及材料类型等因素纳入考量范围。
整编机构: 中国航发航材院
源标题: New model can streamline graphene synthesis in a flash
原文:
Scientists at Rice University are using machine-learning techniques to streamline the process of synthesizing graphene from waste through flash Joule heating.
The process, discovered two years ago by the Rice lab of chemist James Tour, has expanded beyond making graphene from various carbon sources to extracting other materials like metals from urban waste, with the promise of more environmentally friendly recycling to come. It is the same for all of these applications – blasting a jolt of high energy through the source material to eliminate all but the desired product – but the details for flashing each feedstock are different.
In a paper in Advanced Materials, the researchers report how machine-learning models that can adapt to variables and optimize procedures are helping them push forward. “Machine-learning algorithms will be critical to making the flash process rapid and scalable without negatively affecting the graphene product’s properties,” Tour said.
“In the coming years, the flash parameters can vary depending on the feedstock, whether it’s petroleum-based, coal, plastic, household waste or anything else. Depending on the type of graphene we want – small flake, large flake, high turbostratic, level of purity – the machine can discern by itself what parameters to change.”
Because flashing makes graphene in hundreds of milliseconds, it’s difficult to tease out the details of the chemical process. So Tour and company took a clue from materials scientists who have worked machine learning into their everyday process of discovery.
“It turned out that machine learning and flash Joule heating had really good synergy,” said Rice graduate student and lead author Jacob Beckham. “Flash Joule heating is a really powerful technique, but it’s difficult to control some of the variables involved, like the rate of current discharge during a reaction. And that’s where machine learning can really shine. It’s a great tool for finding relationships between multiple variables, even when it’s impossible to do a complete search of the parameter space.
“That synergy made it possible to synthesize graphene from scrap material based entirely on the models’ understanding of the Joule heating process. All we had to do was carry out the reaction – which can eventually be automated.”
The researchers used their custom optimization model to improve graphene crystallization from four starting materials – carbon black, plastic pyrolysis ash, pyrolyzed rubber tires and coke – over 173 trials, using Raman spectroscopy to characterize both the starting materials and the graphene products. They then fed more than 20,000 spectroscopy results to the model and asked it to predict which starting materials would provide the best yield of graphene. The model also took the effects of charge density, sample mass and material type into account in its calculations.
中文原文: 莱斯大学的科学家正在使用机器学习技术来简化通过闪光焦耳加热从废物中合成石墨烯的过程。化学家詹姆斯·图尔（James Tour）的莱斯实验室（Rice lab）两年前发现的这一过程，已经从各种碳源制备石墨烯扩展到从城市废物中提取金属等其他材料，并有望实现更环保的回收利用。在所有这些应用中都是一样的--通过源材料发射高能震动以消除除所需产品之外的所有产品--但每个原料闪光的细节是不同的。在《先进材料》的一篇论文中，研究人员报告了能够适应变量和优化过程的机器学习模型是如何帮助他们向前推进的。Tour说：“机器学习算法对于使闪存过程快速和可扩展而不对石墨烯产品的性能产生负面影响至关重要。”“在未来几年，闪光参数可能会因原料而异，无论是石油基、煤、塑料、家庭垃圾还是其他任何东西。根据我们想要的石墨烯类型--小片、大片、高透平、纯度水平--机器可以自己识别要改变什么参数。“因为闪光在几百毫秒内就能制造出石墨烯，所以很难弄清楚化学过程的细节。因此，Tour和company从材料科学家那里获得了一条线索，他们将机器学习纳入了日常发现过程。赖斯的研究生和主要作者雅各布·贝克汉姆说：“事实证明，机器学习和闪光焦耳加热有很好的协同作用。”“闪光焦耳加热是一种非常强大的技术，但很难控制其中的一些变量，比如反应过程中的电流放电速率。而这正是机器学习真正发光的地方。它是寻找多个变量之间关系的一个很好的工具，即使在不可能对参数空间进行完整搜索的情况下也是如此。“这种协同作用使得完全基于模型对焦耳加热过程的理解，从废料中合成石墨烯成为可能。我们所要做的就是进行反应--最终可以自动化。“研究人员使用他们自定义的优化模型，从四种起始材料--炭黑、塑料热解灰、热解橡胶轮胎和焦炭--进行了173次试验，使用拉曼光谱来表征起始材料和石墨烯产品。然后，他们向该模型输入了20，000多个光谱结果，并要求它预测哪些起始材料将提供最佳的石墨烯产率。该模型在计算中还考虑了电荷密度、样品质量和材料类型等因素的影响。
中文源标题: 新模型可使石墨烯合成在瞬间流线型化

中文标题: 俄技集团测试可重复使用运载火箭新点火系统的试验零件
整编内容:
俄罗斯国家技术集团（Rostec）旗下的技术动力控股公司（Technodinamika）向俄罗斯国家航天集团公司（俄罗斯JSC格罗莫夫飞行研究院、俄罗斯化工自动化设计局 KBKhA）提供了RD-0177火箭发动机点火装置的点火系统元件。
该点火系统的元件是一个集成在发动机点火装置中的特殊火花塞以及一个点火单元。其主要特点是增加了结构强度和可重复使用的可能性。这些装置是为“阿穆尔”-SPG（Amur-SPG）火箭和其他空间运载火箭的可回收发动机设计的。
技术动力控股公司的总经理伊戈尔·纳辛科夫对此表示，要用于运载火箭可回收发动机，点火系统必须可以重复使用，发动机火花塞以及点火单元针对这一指标进行了测试，测试中点火装置成功启动了8次。
这些产品是由技术动力控股公司旗下的UNPP Molniya研制的。该公司开发的点火系统曾被用于“能源”号超重型火箭，该运载火箭于1988年将“暴风雪”号航天飞机送入轨道。
（中国航发研究院 谭米）
整编机构: 中国航空发动机研究院
源标题: Rostec Tested Parts of a New Ignition system for Reusable Space Rockets
原文:
Rostec State Corporation’s Technodinamika holding has supplied elements of the ignition system for the ignition device of the RD-0177 engine to the Roscosmos enterprise (JSC KBKhA).
The devices are designed for engines of the return stages of Amur-SPG rockets and other space launch vehicles.
“To be used in the engines of the return stages of launch vehicles, the ignition system must be reusable. The engine igniter plug, as well as the ignition unit, created by Technodinamika, were also tested for this parameter - as part of the test program, it was successfully switched on eight times,” Igor Nasenkov, General Director of the Technodinamika holding said.
The elements of the ignition system are a special spark plug integrated into the ignition device of the engine, as well as an ignition unit. Their main feature is increased structural strength and the possibility of reusable use.
The products were created by the Ufa research and production enterprise Molniya of the Technodinamika holding. Ignition systems developed by UNPP Molniya were used in the Energia launch vehicle, which in 1988 launched the Buran reusable spacecraft into orbit.
中文原文: Rostec国营公司的Technodinamika控股公司向Roscosmos企业（JSC KBKhA）提供了RD-0177发动机点火装置的点火系统元件。该装置是为阿穆尔-SPG火箭和其他空间运载火箭的返回级发动机设计的。“要用于运载火箭返回级的发动机，点火系统必须是可重复使用的。Technodinamika控股公司的总经理伊戈尔·纳森科夫（Igor Nasenkov）表示：“Technodinamika开发的发动机点火器插头和点火单元也对这一参数进行了测试--作为测试计划的一部分，它成功地打开了八次。”点火系统的元件是集成在发动机点火装置中的特殊火花塞，以及点火单元。它们的主要特点是增加了结构强度和可重复使用的可能性。该产品是由Ufa研究和生产企业Molniya的Technodinamika控股公司创造的。能源运载火箭使用了UNPP Molniya开发的点火系统，该运载火箭于1988年将Buran可重复使用的航天器送入轨道。

整编内容:
俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京在VTB Capital投资论坛Russian Calling的全体会议上表示，明年俄罗斯将有新型海基高超声速武器开始执行战斗任务。
普京强调，俄罗斯已经成功实验了马赫数为9的新型海基高超声速导弹。乌克兰境内的攻击系统打击莫斯科需要七到十分钟，而高超声武器的打击时间则是五分钟。
整编机构: 北京航天情报与信息研究所
源标题: Russia to have sea-based hypersonic weapons as of 2022 — Putin
原文:
MOSCOW, November 30. /TASS/. A new sea-based hypersonic missile will enter combat duty in Russia as of next year, Russian President Vladimir Putin said at the plenary meeting of the VTB Capital’s investment forum Russia Calling! on Tuesday. 
"We have carried out a test, and a successful one. As of next year, we will have another sea-based missile, a hypersonic one. Mach 9. The time of approach to those who issue orders will be five minutes," Putin said.
He stressed that should attack systems emerge in Ukrainian territory, their time of approach to Moscow would be seven-ten minutes, and hypersonic weapons’ approach time - five minutes.
On November 18, Russia’s Defense Ministry said it had successfully test-launched a Tsirkon hypersonic missile from the Northern Fleet’s frigate The Admiral Gorshkov to hit a surface target in the White Sea. Earlier, a source told TASS that Tsirkon missiles would begin to undergo government certification tests in November. More launches would follow in December. A total of five missiles will be fired at naval and coastal targets. Two launches of Tsirkon missiles from the nuclear-powered submarine The Severodvinsk on October 4 paved the way for testing the missiles from a surface ship.
The Defense Ministry concluded a contract for purchasing the Tsirkon missiles at the Army-2021 weapons show on August 24.
中文原文: 本报莫斯科11月30日电。/塔斯社/。俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京在VTB资本投资论坛的全体会议上表示，一种新型海基高超音速导弹将于明年在俄罗斯进入战斗状态！星期二。“我们已经进行了一次测试，并取得了成功。从明年开始，我们将有另一枚海基导弹，一枚高超音速导弹。9马赫。接近那些发布命令的人的时间将是五分钟，”普京说。他强调，如果攻击系统出现在乌克兰领土上，它们接近莫斯科的时间将是7-10分钟，高超音速武器的接近时间是5分钟。11月18日，俄罗斯国防部表示，它成功地从北方舰队护卫舰戈尔什科夫海军上将号上试射了一枚齐尔康高超音速导弹，击中了白海的一个水面目标。此前有消息人士告诉塔斯社，齐尔康导弹将于11月开始接受政府认证测试。更多的发射将在12月进行。总共将向海军和沿海目标发射5枚导弹。10月4日，从核动力潜艇Severodvinsk上发射了两枚齐尔康导弹，为从水面舰艇上测试导弹铺平了道路。国防部于8月24日在军队-2021武器展上签署了购买齐尔康导弹的合同。
中文源标题: 俄罗斯将于2022年拥有海基高超音速武器--普京

中文标题: 美国空军启动“橙旗22-2”演习
情报来源: 美国空军试验中心网站
整编内容: 6月23日，由美国空军试验中心主导的“橙旗22-2”演习在加利福尼亚州爱德华兹空军基地拉开帷幕。此次演习动用41架飞机，计划开展23项独立试验科目，主要聚焦先进技术、杀伤网集成和分析。除美国空军外，美国海军、海军陆战队、太空军和多个研发机构均参与其中，F-35战斗机的三个型别也全部参演。（航空工业信息中心 廖南杰 供稿 金钰 审核）
整编机构: 航空工业信息中心
源标题: Orange Flag executes largest all-domain test focused on infrared spectrum
原文:
28 JUNE 2022
Orange Flag, Air Force Test Center’s all-domain, large force test series focused on advanced technology, kill-web integration and analysis, returned for its second iteration this year at Edwards Air Force Base, Calif. June 23. Forty-one airborne participants used the R-2508 Range and Sea Test Range to execute simultaneous participant objectives, comprising 23 separate test events.
AFTC’s Multi-Domain Test Force is leading the effort to resource, organize, and align the Test Flag Enterprise, to include Orange Flag, Emerald Flag, and Black Flag.
“It was perhaps the most complex Orange Flag ever, because we executed in two separate ranges comprising around 30,000 square nautical miles of airspace. The team did an outstanding job despite having a complex experimental design, extremely limited resources, and no formal institutional manning,” said Maj. Daniel Harp, Orange Flag director.
The U.S. Air Force, U.S. Navy, U.S. Marine Corps, United States Space Force and multiple civilian Research and Development agencies participated. Every fighter mission design series in the USAF also participated, to include all three variants of the F-35.
"Orange Flag's significance goes well beyond meeting single platform requirements,” said Maj. Joshua Rountree, Orange Flag mission commander, and director of operations, Emerging Technologies Combined Test Force. “During this event we were able to provide mature platforms environments in which to experiment, provide burgeoning technologies the opportunity to test with fielded joint and multi-domain capabilities they normally have limited access to, as well as meet traditional programmatic test requirements. All in a single day event.”
中文原文: 2022年6月28日橙旗，空军测试中心的全领域，大型部队测试系列，侧重于先进技术，杀死网络集成和分析，今年在加利福尼亚州爱德华兹空军基地进行了第二次迭代。6月23日。41名机载参与者使用R-2508靶场和海上测试靶场同时执行参与者目标，包括23个单独的测试事件。AFTC的多领域测试力量正在领导资源、组织和调整测试旗帜企业的努力，包括橙色旗帜、祖母绿旗帜和黑色旗帜。“这可能是有史以来最复杂的橙色旗帜，因为我们在两个独立的范围内执行，包括大约3万平方海里的空域。尽管有复杂的实验设计，极其有限的资源，没有正式的机构人员，但该团队做了出色的工作，“橙旗主任丹尼尔·哈普少校说。美国空军、美国海军、美国海军陆战队、美国太空军和多个民用研究和开发机构参加了会议。美国空军的每一个战斗机任务设计系列也参加了，包括F-35的所有三个变种。“橙旗的意义远远超出了满足单一平台需求，”橙旗任务指挥官、新兴技术联合测试部队作战主任约书亚·朗特里少校说。“在这次活动中，我们能够提供成熟的平台环境进行实验，为新兴技术提供机会，以测试它们通常有限的野外联合和多领域能力，并满足传统的编程测试需求。所有这些都在一天的活动中进行。”

中文标题: 美智库报告提出增强人类军事行动表现的方法
整编内容: 11月23日，兰德公司发布报告《人类效能增强的技术方法》，研究了产生人类效能增强（HPE）的三种模式——基因改造、人工智能、人体互联网，概述了三种模式在HPE方面的潜力、使能技术现状及相关挑战（包括技术和道德层面）。报告认为，三种技术可在不同时间段用于增强人类效能；基因改造在用于HPE之前，还需要几十年的研究，基因分析可帮助了解人类的能力；人工智能对认知和假肢产生有意义的影响预计需五到十年；物联网将变得更加复杂和强大，正在成为信号的来源和网络攻击的目标。报告建议：不断监测新兴技术的突破性进展与挑战；持续关注与新兴技术项目有关的政府拨款、合同授予等信息；监测HPE相关系统收集、使用数据的种类，还需警惕新兴通信方式遭受的新型网络漏洞攻击。
整编机构: 军事科学院军事科学信息研究中心
源标题: Technological Approaches to Human Performance Enhancement
原文:
Human performance enhancement (HPE) will have implications for military and intelligence operations. A variety of HPE could be of potential military and intelligence operational value. Some examples are increased strength, speed, endurance, and intelligence; others are reduced sleep needs and reaction times. This report provides an examination of three possible modalities for generating HPE: (1) genetic modifications, (2) artificial intelligence (AI), and (3) Internet of Bodies (IoB) approaches in which devices implanted in or worn by a human are connected to a network. For each modality, this report provides an overview of its potential for HPE, the state of the enabling technologies, and the associated challenges (both technical and ethical). The report also features a discussion of the countries where the capabilities or the associated foundational research are being most actively pursued.
Each of these HPE realms relies at some point on digital signals. In addition to any HPE, per se, the emission, storage, and manipulation of this digital information might pose risks and opportunities for military and intelligence operations. Some of the technologies discussed are embryonic, but the pace of development is difficult to predict, and this report provides a snapshot in time of the state of the technology domain.
Key Findings
The three technology categories considered in this report have the potential to be used to enhance human performance, but at different points in time
A much-hyped area is gene manipulation, which is the most nascent—research focuses on the potential to alleviate disease, and decades of research will be required before meaningful application to HPE should be expected. That said, some forms of genetic analysis can be helpful in understanding capabilities of people as they are today.
AI also has long been associated with hype, and although related technologies are steadily improving, meaningful impacts on cognitive and other prostheses are expected to take five to ten years. These new prostheses will provide new channels of communication, along with associated vulnerabilities.
The IoB is already having an effect today; it will become more complex and capable over time. It is becoming both a source of signals and a target for cyberattacks.
Recommendations
Understanding when and where breakthroughs or setbacks have occurred—and when and where novel and even surprising applications have emerged—will require monitoring.
Relevant program launches or terminations, awards of government grants or contracts, joint ventures and acquisitions, conferences and trade shows, patents, and publications are among the indicators to watch.
It will also be important to monitor the kinds of data that are intentionally and unintentionally collected, used, or emitted by HPE-related systems. The benefits of emerging forms of communications will be offset by new kinds of cyber vulnerabilities.
中文原文: 人类性能增强(HPE)将对军事和情报行动产生影响。各种HPE可能具有潜在的军事和情报作战价值。一些例子是增加力量、速度、耐力和智力；其他的是减少睡眠需求和反应时间。本报告提供了三种可能的产生HPE的方式：（1）基因修饰，(2)人工智能(AI)和（3）人体互联网(IoB)方法，在这种方法中，植入或佩戴的设备连接到网络上。对于每一种模式，本报告都概述了其在HPE方面的潜力、使能技术的现状以及相关的挑战（包括技术和伦理方面的挑战）。报告还讨论了最积极开展能力或相关基础研究的国家。这些HPE领域中的每一个都依赖于数字信号。除了任何HPE本身，这种数字信息的发射、存储和操纵可能会给军事和情报行动带来风险和机会。所讨论的一些技术尚处于萌芽阶段，但发展速度难以预测，本报告提供了该技术领域的最新情况。主要调查结果本报告所述的三个技术类别都有可能用于提高人类的绩效，但在不同的时间点一个被大肆宣传的领域是基因操作，这是最新生的--研究集中在缓解疾病的潜力上，在有意义的应用于HPE之前，需要几十年的研究。也就是说，一些形式的基因分析可以帮助理解今天人们的能力。人工智能长期以来也与炒作联系在一起，尽管相关技术正在稳步提高，但对认知和其他假肢的有意义的影响预计需要五到十年。这些新的假肢将提供新的沟通渠道，以及相关的脆弱性。国际奥委会今天已经产生了影响；随着时间的推移，它将变得更加复杂和有能力。它正成为信号来源和网络攻击的目标。建议了解何时何地出现了突破或挫折--以及何时何地出现了新颖甚至令人惊讶的应用--将需要监测。相关项目的启动或终止、政府拨款或合同的授予、合资企业和收购、会议和贸易展览、专利和出版物都是值得关注的指标。监控HPE相关系统有意或无意收集、使用或发射的数据种类也很重要。新兴通信形式的好处将被新类型的网络漏洞所抵消。
中文源标题: 提高人类绩效的技术途径

中文标题: 美海军与MZA公司合作开发反无人机激光武器系统
整编内容:
总部设在新泽西州阿尔伯克基的MZA公司的激光武器专家正在为美军提供专业知识，目的是开发能够拦截侵犯美国军事基地或其他敏感空域的无人机。
美国海军研究办公室周三宣布，与MZA公司签订1870万美元的合同，用于开发反无人机高能激光武器系统。MZA的工程师将使用最新的可用商业组件，设计、开发、交付、集成、测试和演示一种紧凑、便携、低成本和可靠的反无人机高能激光武器系统。
同时，雷声公司也正在向位于俄亥俄州赖特-帕特森空军基地的美国空军研究实验室提供反无人机高能激光武器，该公司在2019年末获得了美国空军的1310万美元订单。
整编机构: 北京航天情报与信息研究所
源标题: Navy taps MZA Associates to develop portable laser weapons for counter-UAV operations on land and sea
原文:
ARLINGTON, Va. – Laser weapons experts at MZA Associates Corp. in Albuquerque, N.M., are adding their expertise to U.S. military efforts to develop portable high-energy lasers to damage or destroy unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) that are violating the airspace of military bases or other sensitive installations.
Officials of the U.S. Office of Naval Research (ONR) in Arlington, Va., announced an $18.7 million contract Wednesday to MZA Associates to develop the counter unmanned aerial vehicle (C-UAS) High Energy Laser Weapon System (HELWS).
MZA engineers will design, develop, deliver, integrate, test, and demonstrate a compact, portable, low-cost and reliable C-UAS HELWS using the latest available commercial components.
Such a system potentially could enable U.S. Marines on the ground or sailors aboard surface warships to destroy, disable, or discourage potentially hostile UAVs flying too closely to Marine ground units, ships, or forward-deployed bases.
MZA Associates specializes in modeling, analysis, design, development, integration, and testing of high-energy laser and advanced optical systems in support of advanced beam- control systems, atmospheric characterization, and optical systems engineering.
MZA provides expertise in wave-optics modeling; adaptive optics; and scientific data acquisition, analysis, and management. The company developed the WaveTrain wave- optics analysis tool for the analysis of optical atmospheric propagation and adaptive optics systems.
MZA joins the Raytheon Technologies Corp. Intelligence & Space segment in McKinney, Texas, in efforts to develop portable and mobile laser weapons for anti-UAV warfare.
Raytheon is providing the U.S. Air Force Research Laboratory at Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, with counter-UAV high-energy laser weapons for counter-drone operations. The company won a $13.1 million order in late 2019 to build a HELWS for six months of in-field evaluation against enemy UAVs.
中文原文: 弗吉尼亚州阿灵顿。-位于新墨西哥州阿尔伯克基的MZA Associates Corp.的激光武器专家正在为美国军方开发便携式高能激光器的努力增加他们的专业知识，以损坏或摧毁侵犯军事基地或其他敏感设施领空的无人机。弗吉尼亚州阿灵顿的美国海军研究办公室(ONR)官员周三宣布，与MZA Associates签订了一份价值1870万美元的合同，开发反无人机高能激光武器系统(HELWS)。MZA工程师将设计、开发、交付、集成、测试和演示一个紧凑、便携、低成本和可靠的C-UAS HELWS使用最新的商业组件。这样一个系统可能会使美国地面海军陆战队或水面战舰上的水手摧毁、禁用或阻止潜在的敌对无人机，这些无人机飞得离海军陆战队地面部队、船只或前沿部署的基地太近。MZA联合公司专门从事高能激光和先进光学系统的建模、分析、设计、开发、集成和测试，以支持先进的光束控制系统、大气表征和光学系统工程。MZA在波动光学建模方面提供专业知识；自适应光学；以及科学的数据获取、分析和管理。该公司开发了用于分析光学大气传播和自适应光学系统的WaveTrain波光学分析工具。MZA加入了位于德克萨斯州麦金尼的雷神技术公司情报和空间部门，致力于开发用于反无人机战争的便携式和移动式激光武器。雷神公司正在为俄亥俄州赖特-帕特森空军基地的美国空军研究实验室提供反无人机高能激光武器，用于反无人机行动。该公司在2019年底赢得了一份1310万美元的订单，用于针对敌方无人机进行为期六个月的现场评估。
中文源标题: 海军利用MZA联合公司开发便携式激光武器，用于陆地和海上反无人机作战

中文标题: 柯林斯宇航公司将为美海军核指控飞机提供甚低频指挥和控制套件
整编内容: 美海军航空系统司令部近日授予雷声公司旗下柯林斯宇航公司1350万美元合同，为E-6B“水星”核指控飞机提供2套现代化甚低频（VLF）高功率发射套件。该合同包括63个备件、10个生产支持资产和技术数据，预计将于2023年12月完成改装工作。E-6B由波音707客机改装而成，用于美国战略司令部全球作战中心的备份，在地面站点无法完成指控任务时开始工作，可执行在核对抗时期的多功能指挥和控制任务。甚低频无线电信号在大气噪声、全球覆盖和海水穿透性能方面性能良好，甚至能在核爆炸中使用，是最耐用和最可靠的军用通信模式之一。美军甚低频无线电系统由位于全球10个站点的高功率多频道MSK固定VLF站点和多频道低频站点组成，工作频率为14-60 kHz。E-6B可作为机载发射控制系统，将发射代码直接传送到陆基洲际导弹站点，指挥洲际导弹发射。目前，E-6B机队驻扎在俄克拉荷马州廷克空军基地。
整编机构: 中国电科
源标题: Navy picks Collins Aerospace to provide Very Low Frequency (VLF) command-and-control for nuclear forces
原文:
Feb. 6, 2023
The E-6B Mercury, a modified Boeing 707, is a backup to the U.S. Strategic Command Global Operations Center should the ground-based site go down.
PATUXENT RIVER NAS, Md. –U.S. nuclearcommand-and-controlexperts needed a means to communicate with submerged nuclear ballistic missile submarines and with national command authorities in wartime. They found their solution from Collins Aerospace in Cedar Rapids, Iowa.
Officials of the U.S. Naval Air Systems Command at Patuxent River Naval Air Station, Md., announced a $13.5 million order Thursday to Collins Aerospace, a Raytheon Technologies company, for two modernizedVery Low Frequency (VLF)High Power Transmit Set production kits for the E-6B Mercury aircraft.
The E-6B Mercury is a modified Boeing 707 jetliner serves as a backup to the U.S. Strategic Command Global Operations Center should the ground-based site be unable to fulfill its mission. The order includes 63 spares, 10 production support assets, and technical data.
VLF communications are among the most durable and reliable communications modes for military use. Although VLF sends data relatively slowly, it is designed to survive and operate throughnuclearexplosions.
Command authorities also communicate with submerged submarines using the Take Charge and Move Out (TACAMO) aircraft, which uses a long trailing-wire antenna to transmit messages to submerged submarines.
VLF radios transmit a 50 baud submarine command-and-control broadcast which is the backbone of the submarine broadcast system, Navy officials say.
VLF radio signals provide good performance in atmospheric noise, global coverage, and seawater-penetrating properties. The submarine VLF broadcasts operates frequencies from 14 to 60 kHz and consist of high-powered multi-channel MSK Fixed VLF sites and multi-channel LF sites located at 10 sites worldwide.
The E-6B Mercury has a crew of 22, including pilots, communications operators, and battle staff personnel. The aircraft is designed to be a versatile command-and control aircraft in times of nuclear confrontation.
Acting as the Airborne Command Post, it can serve as the Airborne Launch Control System with its ability to communicate launch codes directly to land-based ICBM sites. The E-6B aircraft could command ICBM launch if the launch control centers are unable to perform their missions.
The E-6B, in addition to its ability to communicate with land-based ICBM sites, also can communicate with deployed U.S. Navy ballistic missile submarines in the aircraft's additional role as the Take Charge and Move Out (TACAMO) communications relay.
As the TACAMO aircraft, the E-6B can deploy a 2.5-mile trailing wire antenna to give orders to submerged submarines over the vessels' very-low-frequency/low-frequency (VLF/LF) communications systems, which can receive information through the water at very slow data rates.
The E-6B aircraft also can communicate over UHF and EHF military satellite links. The E-6B fleet is based at Tinker Air Force Base, Oklahoma.
On this order Collins Aerospace will do the work in Richardson, Texas, and should be finished by December 2023.
中文原文: 2023年2月6日E-6B水星是波音707的改进型，如果地面基地倒塌，它是美国战略司令部全球作战中心的备份。帕塔克森特河纳斯，马里兰州。-美国核指挥和控制专家需要一种手段，在战时与水下的核弹道导弹潜艇和国家指挥当局进行沟通。他们从爱荷华州锡达拉皮兹的柯林斯航空航天公司找到了解决方案。马里兰州帕塔森特河海军航空站的美国海军航空系统司令部官员周四宣布，向雷神技术公司柯林斯航空航天公司（Collins Aerospace）订购1350万美元的订单，为E-60亿水星飞机提供两套现代化的甚低频(VLF)大功率发射装置生产套件。E-6B水星是一架改装的波音707喷气式客机，如果地面基地无法完成任务，它将作为美国战略司令部全球行动中心的备份。该订单包括63个备件、10个生产支持资产和技术数据。甚低频通信是军事上最耐用、最可靠的通信方式之一。尽管VLF发送数据的速度相对较慢，但它被设计成通过核结构存活和操作。指挥当局还使用负责和移动(TACAMO)飞机与水下潜艇通信，该飞机使用一个长的尾随线天线向水下潜艇发送信息。海军官员说，甚低频无线电发射50波特的潜艇指挥和控制广播，这是潜艇广播系统的骨干。甚低频无线电信号在大气噪声、全球覆盖和海水穿透性能方面提供了良好的性能。海底甚低频广播的频率从14到60千赫，包括位于全世界10个地点的大功率多通道MSK固定甚低频站点和多通道低频站点。E-6B水星号有22名机组人员，包括飞行员、通信操作员和战斗参谋人员。这种飞机的设计目标是在核对抗时期成为一种多功能的指挥和控制飞机。作为机载指挥所，它可以作为机载发射控制系统，有能力直接向陆基洲际弹道导弹场地传达发射代码。如果发射控制中心无法执行任务，E-6B飞机可以指挥洲际弹道导弹发射。E-6B除了与陆基洲际弹道导弹基地通信的能力之外，还可以与部署的美国海军弹道导弹核潜艇通信，作为负责和转移(TACAMO)通信中继。作为塔卡莫飞机，E-6B可以部署2.5英里的尾随线天线，通过船只的甚低频/低频（VLF/LF）通信系统向水下潜艇下达命令，该系统可以以非常慢的数据速率通过水中接收信息。E-6B飞机还可以通过超高频和超高频军事卫星链路进行通信。E-6B机队驻扎在俄克拉荷马州的廷克空军基地。根据这份订单，柯林斯航空航天公司将在德克萨斯州的理查森完成这项工作，应该在2023年12月完成。

中文标题: 美参议院拨款3500万美元支持缅因大学建设“未来工厂”
整编内容: 在美国参议院拨款委员会发布的2022财年拨款法案中，缅因大学获得了3500万美元的拨款，将用于建设一个新的数字化研究设施，以支持下一代先进制造研究。该“未来工厂”将在缅因大学先进结构与复合材料中心（ASCC）扩建完成，面积达8547平方米。通过该工厂，研究人员能够使用先进的数字化技术推进大规模、基于生物的增材制造；该工厂还将实现多台大型3D打印机、多机器人的协同工作，全部制造过程均由人工智能和先进机器人来完成，将有助于推动新技术开发以及清洁能源、建筑、造船等多个行业的创新发展。
整编机构: 兵器210所
源标题: $57.5M to support UMaine Research included in draft Senate Appropriations bills
原文:
October 19, 2021
The Fiscal Year 2022 Appropriations bills were officially released from the Senate Appropriations Committee on Monday, October 18. U.S. Sen. Susan Collins, a senior member of the Senate Appropriations Committee, announced $57,537,000 in funding to support research and initiatives at the University of Maine and the University of Maine System.
Included in the bill is $35 million in funding for the Factory of the Future, a new digital research facility to be built at UMaine’s Advanced Structures and Composites Center. The facility will enable researchers to advance large-scale, bio-based additive manufacturing using advanced technologies. Collaborative arrays of large 3D printers will drive innovation and new technology development in affordable housing, clean energy, construction, transportation, boatbuilding, and furniture industries.
“As Maine’s public research university, UMaine works closely with our system universities and our state and industry partners to deliver innovation and discovery that provide new economic opportunities for Maine and its students,” said Joan Ferrini-Mundy, President of the University of Maine and University of Maine System Vice Chancellor for Research and Innovation.
“Federal investment in the research enterprise we are expanding across all of our universities is driving the growth and impact of our work,” continued Ferrini-Mundy. “We are extremely grateful for the support of Maine’s Congressional Delegation and the leadership Senator Collins has provided through her role on the Appropriations Committee. We will be monitoring developments in the federal budget process closely, partnering with our elected leaders whenever we can to bring new opportunities home to Maine.”
中文原文: 2021年10月19日10月18日星期一，参议院拨款委员会正式发布了2022财年拨款法案。参议院拨款委员会高级成员、美国参议员苏珊·柯林斯（Susan Collins）宣布拨款57,537,000美元，支持缅因大学和缅因大学系统的研究和倡议。该法案包括3500万美元的未来工厂资金，这是一个新的数字研究设施，将在乌梅因的先进结构和复合材料中心建设。该设施将使研究人员能够利用先进技术推进大规模的生物基础增材制造。大型3D打印机的协同阵列将推动经济适用房、清洁能源、建筑、交通、造船和家具行业的创新和新技术发展。缅因州大学校长兼缅因州大学系统研究和创新副校长琼·费里尼-蒙迪（Joan Ferrini-Mundy）表示：“作为缅因州的公立研究型大学，UMaine与我们的系统大学以及我们的州和行业合作伙伴密切合作，提供创新和发现，为缅因州及其学生提供新的经济机会。”费里尼-芒迪继续说：“联邦政府对我们在所有大学扩大的研究事业的投资推动了我们工作的增长和影响。”“我们非常感谢缅因州国会代表团的支持和柯林斯参议员通过她在拨款委员会中的作用所提供的领导。我们将密切监测联邦预算进程的发展，尽可能与我们当选的领导人合作，为缅因州带来新的机会。“

中文标题: 美国陆军“会聚工程-2022”将演练地面和水面自主能力
情报来源: 美国陆军阿伯丁试验场官网
整编内容: 美国陆军“会聚工程-2022”演习将于10月-11月在太平洋、亚利桑那州尤马试验场、加州彭德尔顿和圣贝纳迪诺县的国家训练中心对地面和水面自主能力进行试验。美国陆军UH-60“黑鹰”无人直升机及美英澳三国的空中和地面机器人等参演平台将演练UH-60“黑鹰”无人直升机运载能力，空中和地面自主机器人的数据回传能力，以及由一名操作员控制多架无人机的“蜂群”能力等。“会聚工程-2022”参演军种和平台包括太空军在内的美国六个军种、英澳部队、驻扎在太平洋的航母打击群和美国海军第三舰队以及在日澳区域部署的传感器。演习设计了太平洋环境下的海上和远程作战以及地面作战两个试验阶段，并围绕三个演训目标进行一系列实验：通过防护防御火力建立综合防空反导；使用联合进攻火力远距离打击目标；审查阻碍联合作战部队发挥作战能力的环节和相关策略。此外，各军事部门还强调每个军种指挥所之间建立适当的通信。

源标题: WASHINGTON — The experiments will be held at locations in the Pacific and at Yuma Proving Ground, Arizona, in October and November. JADC2 is the Defense Department’s concept for joint warfighting.
原文:
“Autonomous capability is at the forefront of what we believe our next operating concept will be based on,” McKean said during the Defense One State of the Army conference on Sept. 7. “Why do you need a Black Hawk? Think of the capacity that a Black Hawk provides in the sense of carry capabilities. It really will help us provide commanders options.”
In addition to the autonomous Black Hawk, the service will deploy air and ground robotic vehicles from the U.S., United Kingdom and Australia during tests at Yuma Camp Pendleton, California, and the National Training Center in San Bernardino County.
“This is convergence,” McKean said. “How do we pass the data from those robotic vehicles back to the command post so commanders can make sense and act on what those systems are providing? This is going to be a great learning opportunity to see just where we are.”
In addition, the Army will test its ability to “swarm” using a group of drones controlled by a Soldier.
This year the experiments will include participation from all six military branches including the Space Force as well as the British and Australian militaries. Carrier strike groups and the U.S. Navy’s Third Fleet elements will be stationed in the Pacific and sensors will be placed in areas from Japan to Australia.
McKean said that Project Convergence 2021 set the foundation for this fall’s iteration, allowing the Army to build greater levels of integration with other military branches.
First the services will operate in a Pacific environment; engaging under maritime conditions and long distances. Then, the experiments will move to land-dominant scenarios. There will also be an additional combat simulation at Yuma, where the Army is working with industry solutions to develop battlefield dynamics with feedback from military representatives.
McKean said the scenarios revolve around three objectives. First the militaries will establish an integrated air and missile defense through the development of protective and defensive fires. Second, participants will be employing joint, offensive fires and the ability to hit targets and great distances.
Finally the Army will examine which authorities and policies hinders its ability to fight as a joint combat force. The military branches will also focus on establishing proper communications between each service’s command post.
中文原文: “自主能力是我们认为我们下一个行动概念的基础，”麦基恩在9月7日的国防一国陆军会议上说。“你为什么需要黑鹰？想一想黑鹰在运载能力方面所提供的能力。这真的会帮助我们为指挥官提供选择。“除了自主黑鹰之外，该服务还将在加州彭德尔顿的尤马营地和圣贝纳迪诺县的国家培训中心进行测试，部署来自美国、英国和澳大利亚的空中和地面机器人车辆。“这是趋同，”麦基恩说。“我们如何将这些机器人车辆的数据传递回指挥所，这样指挥官就可以对这些系统提供的东西有意义并采取行动？这将是一个很好的学习机会，看看我们在哪里。“此外，陆军将测试其使用由一名士兵控制的一组无人机“蜂群”的能力。今年的实验将包括所有六个军事分支的参与，包括太空部队以及英国和澳大利亚军队。航母战斗群和美国海军第三舰队将驻扎在太平洋，传感器将放置在从日本到澳大利亚的地区。麦基恩说，2021项目融合为今年秋天的迭代奠定了基础，允许军队与其他军事分支建立更高水平的集成。首先，这些服务将在太平洋环境中运作；在海上条件和远距离条件下交战。然后，实验将转移到陆地占主导地位的场景。在尤马还将有一个额外的战斗模拟，陆军正在与行业解决方案合作，根据军方代表的反馈来开发战场动态。麦基恩说，这些场景围绕三个目标。首先，军队将通过发展保护性和防御性火力来建立一体化的空中和导弹防御系统。第二，参与者将使用联合进攻火力和打击目标和远距离的能力。最后，陆军将审查哪些当局和政策阻碍了其作为联合作战部队作战的能力。军事分支机构还将侧重于在每个军种的指挥所之间建立适当的通信。

中文标题: 英国向乌克兰提供新的军事援助
整编内容: 8月24日，英国首相鲍里斯·约翰逊在乌克兰独立日访问基辅时宣布，英国将向乌克兰提供新的军事援助。新的援助计划计划包括850架手动发射的黑黄蜂微型无人机、巡飞弹、无人监视系统、M270多管火箭发射系统、硫磺石反坦克导弹、星光防空导弹、炮弹、标枪反坦克导弹、反电池雷达系统和 GPS-干扰设备和其他设备。英国政府的一份声明表示，乌克兰的一揽子计划包括总共2000架无人机和巡飞弹，以提升乌克兰远程监视和防御目标的能力。此外，英国还准备向乌克兰提供扫雷系统，以帮助在其沿海水域探测俄罗斯的地雷，预计乌克兰有关军队将在英国水域接受有关扫雷设备的培训。自2月俄乌冲突开始以来，英国提供的军事和财政援助金额超过23亿英镑。（航空工业信息中心 余浩 供稿 刘天易 审核）

源标题: New British aid package for Ukraine includes micro-drones
原文:
LONDON — Britain is to supply a further package of weapons to Ukraine, including target-spotting micro-drones, outgoing U.K. Prime Minister Boris Johnson announced during a surprise visit to Kyiv.
Ukraine’s Independence Day on Aug. 24 saw Johnson reveal the planned delivery of unmanned surveillance systems, anti-tank loitering missiles and other equipment, adding to a long list of weapons contributed by the British government since Russia invaded its neighbor six months ago.
Johnson made the announcement on his third visit to Ukraine since the Russian invasion began Feb. 24. Johnson, who was forced from office in July, is effectively a caretaker prime minister while the ruling Conservative Party prepares to elect a new leader in early September.
This ?54 million (U.S. $64 million) package of weapons may be small compared with the latest announcement by U.S. President Joe Biden of new contributions worth roughly $3 billion, but it still makes Britain a leading donor.
London’s latest commitment brings the amount given in military and financial aid to more than ?2.3 billion since the war began in February.
The British announcement was light on details of what exactly is being donated, beyond saying 850 hand-launched Black Hornet micro-drones, primarily used in urban warfare, are included in the package.
The Norwegian Defence Ministry, which partnered with Britain on the Black Hornet deal, said Oslo contributed upward of $9 million to the transaction. According a ministry statement, Norway’s contributions to the British-led fund in support of Ukraine total roughly $41 million.
The micro-drones, made in Norway by American firm Teledyne FLIR, were originally developed by Norwegian company Prox Dynamics, now part of the U.S.-based sensor specialist. The company advertises the drone, which resembles a thin helicopter that can fit in the palm of a hand, for its stealthy operations as it scouts for nearby threats.
A British government statement said the Ukraine package includes a total of 2,000 drones and loitering munitions. “This package of unmanned air systems will be a step up in the Ukrainian’s current capability, improving their long range surveillance and defensive targeting ability,” the government said.
Johnson urged European nations to “stay the course” despite rising living costs across the region. He said that while European energy bills were high, “the people of Ukraine are paying in their blood.”
Today’s military aid package comes as the U.K. also prepares to give mine-hunting systems to Ukraine to help detect Russian mines in the waters off its coast.
Ukrainian personnel will receive training on the mine-hunting equipment in British waters in the coming weeks.
The long list of weapons supplied by the U.K. also includes M270 multiple launch rocket systems, Brimstone anti-tank missiles, StarStreak anti-air missiles, unmanned logistics drones, artillery rounds, Javelin anti-tank missiles, counter-battery radar systems and GPS-jamming equipment.
The British are also hosting thousands of Ukrainian recruits for training over the next few weeks supported by expertise and trainers from eight other countries including New Zealand, Norway, Denmark and Canada.
中文原文: 伦敦--即将离任的英国首相鲍里斯·约翰逊（Boris Johnson）在对基辅的突然访问中宣布，英国将向乌克兰提供进一步的一揽子武器，包括目标探测微型无人机。8月24日乌克兰独立日，约翰逊透露了无人监视系统、反坦克游荡导弹和其他设备的计划，这是自俄罗斯六个月前入侵邻国以来英国政府提供的一长串武器的又一个补充。约翰逊是自2月24日俄罗斯入侵开始以来第三次访问乌克兰时宣布这一消息的。约翰逊于7月被迫下台，实际上是一名看守总理，而执政的保守党准备在9月初选举新领导人。与美国总统乔·拜登最近宣布的价值约30亿美元的新捐款相比，5400万英镑（6400万美元）的一揽子武器可能很小，但它仍然使英国成为主要的捐助者。伦敦的最新承诺使自2月份战争开始以来的军事和财政援助总额超过23亿英镑。英国的声明没有透露捐赠的具体细节，只是说包中包括850架主要用于城市战争的手动发射的黑大黄蜂微型无人机。与英国在黑大黄蜂交易上合作的挪威国防部表示，奥斯陆为这笔交易贡献了900万美元以上。根据外交部的一份声明，挪威对英国领导的支持乌克兰基金的捐款总额约为4100万美元。这些微型无人机由美国公司Teledyne FLIR在挪威制造，最初由挪威公司Prox Dynamics开发，现在是美国传感器专家的一部分。该公司为这种无人机做广告，它类似于一架可以放在手掌中的薄直升机，以其在侦察附近威胁时的秘密行动。英国政府的一份声明称，乌克兰的一揽子计划包括总共2000架无人机和游荡弹药。“这套无人驾驶空中系统将是乌克兰目前能力的一个进步，提高他们的远程监视和防御目标能力，”政府表示。约翰逊敦促欧洲国家“坚持到底”，尽管该地区的生活成本不断上升。他说，虽然欧洲的能源账单很高，“乌克兰人民正在用他们的血支付。”今天的军事援助计划出台之际，英国还准备向乌克兰提供猎雷系统，以帮助探测俄罗斯在其沿海水域的水雷。乌克兰人员将在未来几周内接受英国水域猎雷设备的培训。英国提供的一长串武器还包括M270多管火箭系统、硫磺反坦克导弹、星连防空导弹、无人后勤无人机、火炮炮弹、标枪反坦克导弹、反电池雷达系统和全球定位系统干扰设备。英国还将在未来几周接待数千名乌克兰新兵进行培训，这些新兵由来自包括新西兰、挪威、丹麦和加拿大在内的其他八个国家的专业知识和培训师提供支持。

中文标题: SpaceX在静点火测试台上安装新的星舰原型机
整编内容:
SpaceX星基地目前正专注于首飞用的超重B7和星舰S24原型机的测试，但同时仍继续生产和测试新的原型机。1月中旬，SpaceX将星舰S25原型机再次从工厂运输到发射台，计划开展一系列测试。
星舰S25原型机于2022年10月19日首次出现在SpaceX的南德克萨斯州发射和测试设施。在接下来约三周时间进行了一次气动验证测试和三次低温验证测试，据推测还可能包括几次模拟推力测试。在2022年10月28日的气动测试中，验证了贮箱的可靠性，以及能够承受约6-8.5bar的飞行压力。2022年11月1日、2日和7日进行了三次低温验证试验。2022年11月8日，S25从SpaceX的星舰测试台上移除，被运回星舰工厂。2023年1月14日配有6台发动机的S25返回发射场，1月17日，S25被提升到星基地唯一的星舰静点火测试台（B发射台）上。迄今为止，只有两枚星舰原型机完成了完整的六台猛禽发动机的联合静点火试车，并且都是先通过小规模联试后逐渐实现六台联试。如果S25跳过小规模联试，立即进行六台联试，就表明SpaceX对当前星舰的设计有较强信心。
据信，S25将与超重B9原型机配对，后者于2022年12月15日首次出现在发射场上，在12月21日和29日完成了两次部分低温测试，在此期间，它可能装载了大约一千吨液氮，以模拟液氧和甲烷推进剂。B9随后于2023年1月10日返回工厂。SpaceX在B9的设计上进行了重大改进和升级，其中最重要的是改进了用于操纵发动机的推力矢量控制(TVC)。B9的13个中央猛禽发动机将由电动操纵，而不是此前使用的栓在超重一侧的复杂的管道和液压动力装置网络。这使得B9可以移除那些动力装置，并减少发动机燃料、控制、动力和转向所需的管道系统。SpaceX数月前已在麦格雷戈开发设施中对电动猛禽TVC进行了测试。此外，SpaceX还需要针对新系统供电电池的性能开展测试。在峰值应力期间，电动TVC可能需要每秒多次快速重定向超过3000吨(~ 660万磅)的推力。因此，电池所需的峰值功率可能是巨大的。超重B9的静点火试车必须等到星基地唯一的轨道发射架(目前由“超重B7/星舰S24”组合体占用)腾空后才能开始，这个过程可能还需要几个月的时间。据推测，首次轨道试飞不太可能在2023年3月之前发生，因此B9和S25仍有足够的时间开展其他地面测试。
整编机构: 北京航天长征科技信息研究所
源标题: SpaceX installs new Starship on static fire test stand
原文:
By Eric Ralph 
Posted on January 17, 2023 
SpaceX may be focused on preparing Starship S24 and Super Heavy Booster 7 for their potentially imminent orbital launch debut, but the rest of the company’s Starship factory isn’t just sitting around.
The laser focus on carefully testing Ship 24 and Booster 7 may have limited the effectiveness of Starbase rocket production, but the factory has continued to produce new ships and boosters. SpaceX has even conducted some limiting testing of a pair of prototypes meant to follow in the footsteps of S24 and B7. In mid-January, that process entered a new and more active phase as SpaceX transported Starship S25 from the factory to the launch pad.
The trip is not Ship 25’s first. Starship S25 first headed to SpaceX’s South Texas launch and test facilities on October 19th, 2022, shortly after the vehicle was fully assembled. Around three weeks of testing followed, and now Ship 25 is back for more.
Starship S25 rolled out for the first time almost three months ago. 
The first round of tests was thorough and put Ship 25 through a pneumatic proof test, multiple cryogenic proof tests, and likely a few simulated thrust tests using six hydraulic rams. 
“Ship 25 was removed from SpaceX’s other Starship test stand on November 8th, it was rolled back to Starbase’s Starship factory. Ship 25 first rolled to the launch site on October 19th and has since completed four visible tests. On October 28th, Ship 25 survived a pneumatic proof test that showed that its tanks were leak-free and capable of surviving flight pressures (roughly 6-8.5 bar or 90-125 psi). Three cryogenic proof tests followed on November 1st, 2nd, and 7th. The first cryoproof was likely just that – a test that pressurized Ship 25’s tanksandfilled them with cryogenic liquid nitrogen (LN2) or a combination of liquid oxygen and LN2. The next two tests likely took advantage of the customized test stand, which has been semi-permanently outfitted with a set of hydraulic rams that allow SpaceX to simulate the thrust of six Raptor engines while Starship’s structures are chilled to cryogenic temperatures and loaded with roughly 1000 tons (~2.2M lb) of cryogenic fluids. If a Starship can survive those stresses on the ground, the assumption is that it will likely survive similar stresses in flight.” Teslarati.com – October 20th, 2022
As usual, SpaceX didn’t comment on the development or indicate how that initial proof testing had gone, but Ship 25’s January 14th, 2023 return to the launch site all but guaranteed that that testing had gone more or less according to plan. On January 17th, SpaceX lifted Ship 25 onto Starbase’s only Starship static fire test stand, further confirming that Ship 25 proof testing went to plan.
Ship 25 has now been lifted onto Pad B for its Static Fire campaign. Full Stack B7/S24 closing in on the milestone of a WDR, although no evacuation notice yet. Likely more prop tests first (lots of prop tanker deliveries ongoing)https://t.co/e3xbqPnwZ5 pic.twitter.com/0omvUEBtRC
— Chris Bergin – NSF (@NASASpaceflight) January 17, 2023
Soon after its November 2022 return to Starbase’s build site, six Raptor engines were moved into the High Bay and installed on Ship 25. The Starship’s aft was then likely buttoned up with a heat shield before it headed to the test site to begin its static fire test campaign. That campaign could tell us a lot about the status of Starship prototypes. To date, only two Ships have completed full six-Raptor static fire tests, and both took days, weeks, or months to build up to those six-engine milestones with multiple smaller tests. If Ship 25 were to skip those preliminary tests and immediately conduct a six-engine static fire, it would be a sign that SpaceX is significantly more confident in the current Starship design.
Booster 9
Ship 25 is believed to be paired with Super Heavy Booster 9, which recently finished its own round of proof tests. About two months behind Ship 25, Booster 9 rolled out of its Starbase assembly bay and headed to the launch site on December 15th, 2022. The Super Heavy prototype ultimately completed two partial cryogenic proof tests on December 21st and 29th, during which it was likely loaded with around a thousand tons of liquid nitrogen to simulate explosive liquid oxygen and methane propellant. Booster 9 then returned to Starbase’s factory on January 10th, 2023.

In mid-January, that process entered a new and more active phase as SpaceX transported Starship S25 from the factory to the launch pad.
The trip is not Ship 25’s first. Starship S25 first headed to SpaceX’s South Texas launch and test facilities on October 19th, 2022, shortly after the vehicle was fully assembled. Around three weeks of testing followed, and now Ship 25 is back for more.
A few more Starship 25 rollout photos. Go SpaceX!! 10/19/22 https://t.co/lqMPEMv9n7https://t.co/qn7TnVhnTh pic.twitter.com/UwzTQlRNlq
— Starship Gazer (@StarshipGazer) October 20, 2022
Starship S25 rolled out for the first time almost three months ago. 
Ship 25
The first round of tests was thorough and put Ship 25 through a pneumatic proof test, multiple cryogenic proof tests, and likely a few simulated thrust tests using six hydraulic rams. 
“Ship 25 was removed from SpaceX’s other Starship test stand on November 8th, it was rolled back to Starbase’s Starship factory. Ship 25 first rolled to the launch site on October 19th and has since completed four visible tests. On October 28th, Ship 25 survived a pneumatic proof test that showed that its tanks were leak-free and capable of surviving flight pressures (roughly 6-8.5 bar or 90-125 psi). Three cryogenic proof tests followed on November 1st, 2nd, and 7th. The first cryoproof was likely just that – a test that pressurized Ship 25’s tanksandfilled them with cryogenic liquid nitrogen (LN2) or a combination of liquid oxygen and LN2. The next two tests likely took advantage of the customized test stand, which has been semi-permanently outfitted with a set of hydraulic rams that allow SpaceX to simulate the thrust of six Raptor engines while Starship’s structures are chilled to cryogenic temperatures and loaded with roughly 1000 tons (~2.2M lb) of cryogenic fluids. If a Starship can survive those stresses on the ground, the assumption is that it will likely survive similar stresses in flight.” Teslarati.com – October 20th, 2022
As usual, SpaceX didn’t comment on the development or indicate how that initial proof testing had gone, but Ship 25’s January 14th, 2023 return to the launch site all but guaranteed that that testing had gone more or less according to plan. On January 17th, SpaceX lifted Ship 25 onto Starbase’s only Starship static fire test stand, further confirming that Ship 25 proof testing went to plan.
Ship 25 has now been lifted onto Pad B for its Static Fire campaign. Full Stack B7/S24 closing in on the milestone of a WDR, although no evacuation notice yet. Likely more prop tests first (lots of prop tanker deliveries ongoing)https://t.co/e3xbqPnwZ5 pic.twitter.com/0omvUEBtRC
— Chris Bergin – NSF (@NASASpaceflight) January 17, 2023
Soon after its November 2022 return to Starbase’s build site, six Raptor engines were moved into the High Bay and installed on Ship 25. The Starship’s aft was then likely buttoned up with a heat shield before it headed to the test site to begin its static fire test campaign. That campaign could tell us a lot about the status of Starship prototypes. To date, only two Ships have completed full six-Raptor static fire tests, and both took days, weeks, or months to build up to those six-engine milestones with multiple smaller tests. If Ship 25 were to skip those preliminary tests and immediately conduct a six-engine static fire, it would be a sign that SpaceX is significantly more confident in the current Starship design.
Booster 9
Ship 25 is believed to be paired with Super Heavy Booster 9, which recently finished its own round of proof tests. About two months behind Ship 25, Booster 9 rolled out of its Starbase assembly bay and headed to the launch site on December 15th, 2022. The Super Heavy prototype ultimately completed two partial cryogenic proof tests on December 21st and 29th, during which it was likely loaded with around a thousand tons of liquid nitrogen to simulate explosive liquid oxygen and methane propellant. Booster 9 then returned to Starbase’s factory on January 10th, 2023.
Assuming those tests went well, Raptor engine installation could begin at any moment. However, thanks to significant design changes and upgrades present on Booster 9, outfitting and testing this Super Heavy could take longer than usual. Many smaller changes are present, but the most significant by far is the addition of an upgraded version of Raptor. The engine’s combustion-related hardware is likely the same as the Raptor V2 engines present on Booster 7, Ship 24, and Ship 25. But the hardware used to steer each engine – called thrust vector control (TVC) – has been completely changed.
Instead of using a complex web of plumbing and hydraulic power units bolted to the side of Super Heavy, Booster 9’s 13 central Raptors will be electrically steered. That has allowed SpaceX to remove those power units (streamlining Booster 9’s exterior) and reduce the already rats nest of plumbing required to fuel, control, power, and steer dozens of high-performance rocket engines on one booster. SpaceX has been testing electric Raptor TVC for months at its McGregor, Texas development facilities, but it’s unclear if the new technology has progressed to the point that 13 upgraded engines are ready to be installed on Booster 9. In the meantime, SpaceX may install Booster 9’s fixed outer ring of 20 Raptor V2 engines – none of which gimbal or need new electric TVC hardware. 
Once all 33 engines are installed, it’s likely that Booster 9 will be thoroughly tested to ensure that all 13 electrically-steered engines work well together before, during, and after numerous static fire tests. SpaceX will also need to verify that the batteries likely powering those new systems function as expected. During the peak stresses they will likely experience, the electric TVC could need to rapidly redirect more than 3000 tons (~6.6 million lbf) of thrust multiple times per second. The peak power required from Super Heavy’s batteries will likely be immense as a result.
For now, the start of Super Heavy B9’s own static fire test campaign could be months away and will have to wait until Starbase’s only orbital launch mount – currently occupied by Booster 7, Ship 24, and Starship’s first orbital launch campaign – is vacated. With that orbital launch debut unlikely to happen before March 2023, Booster 9 has plenty of time to relax inside Starbase’s Wide Bay while Ship 25 begins static fire testing at a separate stand.

中文标题: 外媒披露印度现代化的T-90S主战坦克的首张照片
整编内容:
The Dead District在推特上发布了印度现代化的T-90S主战坦克的首张照片。印度陆军在乌拉尔运输机械制造设计局的协助下进行了T-90S主战坦克的现代化改造。该坦克配备辅助动力装置和空调系统，这是应对印度气候的“必备”设备。此外，作为现代化计划的一部分，该坦克还安装了激光传感器。
2001年，印度从俄罗斯购买了310辆T-90S坦克，其中124辆已完成交付，186辆将使用不同阶段交付的套件进行组装，重点是将生产转向国产化。印度之所以采购T-90，是因为T-90是在T-72的基础上开发的，印度具有T-72的生产经验，T-72坦克60%的零件与T-90具有通用性，从而能够简化T-90的训练与维护。
2020年2月，俄罗斯和印度签署了一项协议，将T-90S主战坦克的许可制造延长至2028年。印度国防采办委员会已经批准生产464辆T-90S主战坦克，并在2021年2月举行的会议上做出重要决策，有望为大约3000辆坦克和装甲车配备“战利品”主动防护系统。
T-90S主战坦克是俄罗斯T-90主战坦克的增强型，以满足亚洲国家的作战需求。印度制造的T-90被称为T-90“毗湿摩”，是根据印度陆军的要求建造的，配备了法国泰勒斯公司制造的凯瑟琳-FC热瞄准具以及俄罗斯的“接触”-5爆炸反应装甲。
T-90S的主要武器包括一门125毫米2A46M双轴稳定型滑膛炮，该炮配有热套管和自动装弹机，最高射速达每分钟7至8发，还能够发射9M119“映射”反坦克导弹（北约代号AT-11“狙击手”），射程为100米到4400米。该炮无需在炮塔内拆卸即可更换炮管。
整编机构: 北方科技信息研究所
源标题: First pictures of Indian modernized T-90S Bhishma MBT Main Battle Tank
原文:
Monday, 07 February 2022 12:35 
Pictures tweeted by The Dead District show Indian Army' T-90S MBTs modernized with the assistance of Ural Transport Machine Construction Bureau (UK BTM). The tank is equipped with an auxiliary power unit (APU) and an air conditioning system (AC), a "must" for the Indian climate.
Notice the absence of the IR dazzlers of the Shtora (allowing ERA coverage of the spots). However, a tweet posted by Kunal Biswas on October 26 showed a model of Rafael’s Trophy APS (Active Protection System) adapted to an Indian army T-90S Bhishma main battle tank. Some 3,000 tanks and other armored vehicles might be fitted with this APS following a major decision taken during a (Defense Acquisition Council) DAC meeting held in February 2021. Laser sensors are there, though, as part of the modernization program.
Army Recognition reported that, according to a news published on March 16, 2020, by TASS, India had taken the decision to purchase 400 T-90S Russian main battle tanks (MBT), a tank which is already manufactured under license in India, said Head of Russia’s Federal Service for Military and Technical Cooperation Dmitry Shugayev during an interview with Rossiya-24 TV channel.
In February 2020, Russia and India signed a deal extending the licensed manufacturing of T-90S Bhishma (local name) main battle tanks until 2028: "In 2019, a deal was signed with India to extend the licensed manufacturing of T-90S tanks until 2028, and as we know, the Defence Acquisition Council approved the production of 464 T-90S main battle tanks.
In 2001, India purchased 310 T-90S tanks from Russia, of which 124 were delivered complete and 186 were to be assembled from kits delivered in various stages of completion with an emphasis on shifting production to domestic means. The T-90 was selected because it is a direct development of the T-72 that India already manufactures with 60% parts commonality with T-90, simplifying training and maintenance.
The T-90 manufactured in India is called T-90 Bhishma, this version was built based on requests of the Indian army, equipped with the French Thales-built Catherine-FC thermal sights, and is fitted with Russian Kontakt-5 explosive reactive armor (ERA).
The T-90S is an enhanced version of the Russian-made T-90 Main Battle Tank (MBT) to meet the operational requirements of countries in Asia. The main armament of the T-90S MBT includes one 125 mm 2A46M smoothbore gun, stabilized in two axes and fitted with a thermal sleeve. The gun tube can be replaced without dismantling inside the turret. The gun's automatic loader will feed both ordnance and missiles offering a high rate of fire (up to 7 to 8 rounds per minute). The T-90S is also able to fire the 9M119 Refleks (NATO designation AT-11 Sniper) anti-tank guided missile system with a range from 100 m to 4,400 m.

中文标题: 美国空军研究实验室开发固体推进剂行为模型
整编内容:
美国空军研究实验室的火箭推进部门正在利用“分离式霍普金森压杆”系统测量高应变率下的应力，研究材料在恶劣条件下的行为，以便于针对固体推进剂进行测试并收集数据，开发固体推进剂行为模型。
“分离式霍普金森压杆”系统被安装在空军研究实验室的现场化学实验室中，能以子弹冲击、破片冲击和殉爆反应产生的应变率测试固体推进剂。空军研究实验室计划使用该系统在高应变率下测试推进剂和空间约束材料，量化火箭发动机的材料特性，包括采用共振声混合技术和增材制造等先进工艺技术制造的材料，开发结构模型，预测其在真实环境下的失效行为，从而进一步设计改进火箭发动机和卫星。

源标题: USAF Research Lab to Develop Behavior Models for Solid Propellant with New Equipment
原文:
Our Bureau05:20 PM, August 30, 2021
The U.S. Air Force Research Laboratory’s Rocket Propulsion Division has a new capability, a Split-Hopkinson Pressure Bar system that measures stress at high strain rates and helps analyze material behavior under severe conditions.
“This system will give AFRL a capability to test and gather data from any solid propellant we can manufacture,” said Dr. Timothy Miller, senior materials research engineer within AFRL’s Propellant Branch.
Installed in AFRL’s on-site chemistry lab, the system tests solid propellant at strain rates that correspond to threats from bullet impact, fragment impact and sympathetic detonations. The latter occur when unwanted detonation of a missile issues a shock wave that initiates detonation in a nearby missile.
“AFRL plans to use the system to test both propellant and space-bound materials at high-strain rates so that structural models can be developed that will predict behavior, especially failure, in real-world conditions,” said Miller.
Ultimately, these models will aid in designing improved rocket motors and satellites. This new capability will also help AFRL to investigate other occurrences such as space debris impact, which can disable satellites, and in some cases, can compromise structures and render them useless.
Miller explained how “every solid rocket motor tested has the potential for defects that cannot be seen during manufacturing, and even in the absence of defects, can be susceptible to damage due to external events.”
“Data from high strain rate tests is key to preventing [unintentional damage] and AFRL will use this system to quantify material properties related to all rocket motors, including those made with advanced manufacturing processes such as Resodyn mixing and additive manufacturing,” he said.
中文原文: 我局2021年8月30日下午05:20美国空军研究实验室的火箭推进部门有一种新的能力，一种分裂霍普金森压杆系统，可以在高应变率下测量应力，并帮助分析恶劣条件下的材料行为。AFRL推进剂分部的高级材料研究工程师蒂莫西·米勒博士说：“这个系统将使AFRL有能力测试和收集我们能制造的任何固体推进剂的数据。”该系统安装在AFRL的现场化学实验室，测试固体推进剂的应变率与子弹撞击、碎片撞击和共鸣引爆的威胁相对应。后者发生在导弹不想要的爆炸产生冲击波，引发附近导弹的爆炸。米勒说：“AFRL计划使用该系统在高应变率下测试推进剂和空间材料，以便开发结构模型，预测现实世界条件下的行为，尤其是失效。”最终，这些模型将有助于设计改进的火箭发动机和卫星。这种新的能力还将帮助非洲空间研究中心调查其他事件，如空间碎片撞击，这可能使卫星失效，在某些情况下，可能危及结构并使其无用。米勒解释说，“每一个测试的固体火箭发动机都有潜在的缺陷，这些缺陷在制造过程中看不到，即使没有缺陷，也容易因外部事件而损坏。”他说：“高应变率测试的数据是防止（无意损坏）的关键，AFRL将使用这一系统来量化与所有火箭发动机相关的材料性能，包括那些采用先进制造工艺制造的发动机，如Resodyn混合和增材制造。”
