中文标题: 美国将硅基技术应用到量子计算中
整编内容: 近日，美国普林斯顿大学研究人员将硅基技术应用到了量子计算中。研究人员使用一种名为双量子点的硅基结构捕获两个电子，使它们产生相互作用，每个电子的自旋状态都可以作为量子位，并利用电子间相互作用纠缠量子位，实现了高达99%的保真度。这是迄今为止半导体中双量子位器件实现的最高保真度。这种硅自旋量子位比其他类型的量子位更有优势，因为其他量子位系统在可扩展性方面存在较多物理限制。此外，硅自旋量子位是由单个电子构成的，因此整个设备只有大约100纳米宽。该研究有望加速硅基量子技术的应用，以作为其他量子计算技术的替代方案。
关键词: 量子计算 硅基技术 自旋量子位 保真度
整编机构: 国家工业信息安全发展研究中心
源标题: In race to build quantum computing hardware, silicon begins to shine
原文:
Research conducted by Princeton University physicists is paving the way for the use of silicon-based technologies in quantum computing, especially as quantum bits—the basic units of quantum computers. This research promises to accelerate the use of silicon technology as a viable alternative to other quantum computing technologies, such as superconductors or trapped ions.
In research published in the journal Science Advances, Princeton physicists used a two-qubit silicon quantum device to achieve an unprecedented level of fidelity. At above 99 percent, this is the highest fidelity thus far achieved for a two-qubit gate in a semiconductor and is on par with the best results achieved by competing technologies. Fidelity, which is a measure of a qubit's ability to perform error-free operations, is a key feature in the quest to develop practical and efficient quantum computing.
Researchers around the world are trying to figure out which technologies—such as superconducting qubits, trapped ions or silicon spin qubits, for example—can best be employed as the basic units of quantum computing. And, equally significant, researchers are exploring which technologies will have the ability to scale up most efficiently for commercial use.
"Silicon spin qubits are gaining momentum [in the field]," said Adam Mills, a graduate student in the Department of Physics at Princeton University and the lead author of the recently published study. "It's looking like a big year for silicon overall."
By using a silicon device called a double quantum dot, the Princeton researchers were able to capture two electrons and force them to interact. The spin state of each electron can be used as a qubit and the interaction between the electrons can entangle these qubits. This operation is crucial for quantum computation, and the research team, led by Jason Petta, the Eugene Higgins Professor of Physics at Princeton, was able to perform this entangling operation at a fidelity level exceeding 99.8 percent.
A qubit, in simplest terms, is a quantum version of a computer bit, which is the smallest unit of data in a computer. Like its classical counterpart, the qubit is encoded with information that can have the value of either one or zero. But unlike the bit, the qubit is able to exploit the concepts of quantum mechanics so that it can perform tasks classical bits cannot.
"In a qubit you can encode zeros and ones, but you can also have superpositions of these zeros and ones," said Mills. This means that each qubit can be simultaneously a zero and a one. This concept, called superposition, is a fundamental quality of quantum mechanics and one that allows qubits to do operations that seem amazing and otherworldly. In practical terms, it allows the quantum computer a greater advantage over conventional computers in, for example, factoring very large numbers or isolating the most optimal solution to a problem.
The "spin" in spin qubits is the electron's angular momentum. It is a quantum property that manifests as a tiny magnetic dipole that can be used to encode information. A classical analog is a compass needle, which has north and south poles, and rotates to align with Earth's magnetic field. Quantum mechanically, the spin of the electron can align with the magnetic field generated in the lab (spin-up), or be oriented anti-parallel to the field (spin-down), or be in a quantum superposition of spin-up and spin-down. Spin is the property of the electron harnessed in silicon-based quantum devices; conventional computers, by contrast, work by manipulating an electron's negative charge.
Mills asserted that in general, silicon spin qubits have advantages over other qubit types. "The idea is that every system is going to have to scale up to many qubits," he said. "And right now, the other qubit systems have real physical limitations to scalability. Size could be a real problem with these systems. There's only so much space you can cram these things into."
In comparison, silicon spin qubits are made from single electrons and are extremely small.
"Our devices are just about 100 nanometers across, while a conventional superconducting qubit is more like 300 microns across, so if you want to make many on a chip, it's going to be difficult using a superconducting approach," Petta said.
The other advantage of silicon spin qubits, Petta added, is that conventional electronics today are based on silicon technology. "Our feeling is that if you really want to make a million or ten million qubits that are going to be required to do something practical, that's only going to happen in a solid-state system that can be scaled using the standard semiconductor fabrication industry."
Still, operating spin qubits—like other types of qubits—with a high fidelity has been a challenge for researchers.
"One of the bottlenecks for the technology of spin qubits is that the two-qubit gate fidelity up until very recently has not been that high," Petta said. "It's been well below 90 percent in most experiments."
But it was a challenge that Petta and Mills and the research team believed could be achieved.
To perform the experiment, the researchers first had to capture a single electron—no small task.
"We're trapping a single electron, a very small particle, and we need to get it into a specific region of space and then make it dance," said Petta.
To do this, Mills, Petta and their colleagues needed to construct a "cage." This took the form of a wafer-thin semiconductor made primarily out of silicon. At the top of this the team patterned little electrodes, which creates the electrostatic potential used to corral the electron. Two of these cages put together, separated by a barrier, or gate, constituted the double quantum dot.
"We have two spins sitting in adjacent sites next to each other," said Petta. "By adjusting the voltage on these gates, we can momentarily push the electrons together and cause them to interact. This is called a two-qubit gate."
The interaction causes each spin qubit to evolve according to the state of its neighboring spin qubits, which leads to entanglement in quantum systems. The researchers were able to perform this two-qubit interaction with a fidelity exceeding 99 percent. To date, this is the highest fidelity for a two-qubit gate that has thus far been achieved in spin qubits.
Petta said that the results of this experiment place this technology—silicon spin qubits—on an equal footing with the best results achieved by the other major competing technologies. "This technology is on a strongly increasing slope," he said, "and I think it's just a matter of time before it overtakes the superconducting systems."
"Another important aspect of this paper," Petta added, "is that it's not just a demonstration of a high fidelity two-qubit gate, but this device does it all. This is the first demonstration of a semiconductor spin qubit system where we have integrated performance of the entire system—the state preparation, the read out, the single qubit control, the two-qubit control—all with performance metrics that exceed the threshold you need to make a larger-scale system work."
In addition to Mills and Petta, the work also included the efforts of Princeton graduate students Charles Guinn and Mayer Feldman, as well as University of Pennsylvania assistant professor of electrical engineering Anthony Sigillito. Also contributing to the paper and research were Michael Gullans, Department of Physics, Princeton University and the Center for Quantum Information and Computer Science at NIST/University of Maryland, and Erik Nielsen of the Sandia National Laboratories, Albuquerque, New Mexico.
中文原文: 普林斯顿大学物理学家进行的研究为在量子计算中使用硅基技术铺平了道路，尤其是作为量子比特--量子计算机的基本单位。这项研究有望加速硅技术的使用，作为其他量子计算技术的可行替代方案，如超导体或俘获离子。在发表在《科学进展》杂志上的研究中，普林斯顿物理学家使用一个两量子比特的硅量子设备实现了前所未有的保真度。在99%以上，这是迄今为止在半导体中实现的两个量子比特门的最高保真度，与竞争技术实现的最佳结果持平。保真度是量子比特执行无差错操作能力的一个度量，是发展实用高效量子计算的一个关键特征。世界各地的研究人员正试图找出哪些技术--例如超导量子比特、囚禁离子或硅自旋量子比特--可以最好地用作量子计算的基本单元。同样重要的是，研究人员正在探索哪些技术将有能力最有效地扩大规模用于商业用途。普林斯顿大学物理系研究生亚当·米尔斯（Adam Mills）是最近发表的研究的主要作者，他说：“硅自旋量子比特（在这个领域）正在获得势头。”“对硅来说，这看起来是一个重要的一年。”通过使用一种叫做双量子点的硅器件，普林斯顿大学的研究人员能够捕获两个电子并迫使它们相互作用。每个电子的自旋态都可以作为一个量子比特，电子之间的相互作用可以使这些量子比特纠缠在一起。这一操作对量子计算至关重要，由普林斯顿尤金·希金斯物理学教授杰森·佩塔领导的研究小组能够以超过99.8%的保真度执行这种纠缠操作。量子比特，用最简单的术语来说，是计算机比特的量子版本，计算机比特是计算机中数据的最小单位。像它的经典对应物一样，量子比特被编码的信息可以有一个值或零值。但与比特不同的是，量子比特能够利用量子力学的概念，从而能够执行经典比特无法完成的任务。“在一个量子比特中，你可以编码零和1，但你也可以有这些零和1的叠加，”米尔斯说。这意味着每个量子比特可以同时是一个零和一个。这个概念被称为叠加，是量子力学的一个基本性质，它允许量子比特进行看似惊人和超凡脱俗的操作。在实际应用中，它使量子计算机比传统计算机具有更大的优势，例如，在分解非常大的数或分离一个问题的最优解方面。自旋量子比特中的“自旋”是电子的角动量。它是一种量子特性，表现为一个微小的磁偶极子，可以用来编码信息。一个经典的模拟是罗盘针，它有南北两极，并旋转以与地球磁场对齐。在量子力学上，电子的自旋可以与实验室产生的磁场对齐（自旋向上），也可以与磁场反平行（自旋向下），或者处于自旋向上和自旋向下的量子叠加中。自旋是硅基量子器件中电子的特性；相比之下，传统的计算机是通过操纵电子的负电荷来工作的。米尔斯断言，总的来说，硅自旋量子比特比其他量子比特类型有优势。“这个想法是，每个系统都必须扩展到许多量子比特，”他说。“现在，其他量子比特系统在可伸缩性方面有真正的物理限制。尺寸可能是这些系统的一个真正问题。你只能把这些东西塞进这么多空间。”相比之下，硅自旋量子比特是由单电子制成的，非常小。佩塔说：“我们的设备只有大约100纳米宽，而传统的超导量子比特更像是300微米宽，所以如果你想在芯片上制造很多，使用超导方法将是困难的。”Petta补充说，硅自旋量子比特的另一个优势是，今天的传统电子学是基于硅技术的。“我们的感觉是，如果你真的想制造一百万或一千万个量子比特，而这些量子比特是做一些实际工作所必需的，那只能在一个可以使用标准半导体制造行业进行缩放的固态系统中实现。”然而，像其他类型的量子比特一样，高保真地操作自旋量子比特对研究人员来说是一个挑战。“自旋量子比特技术的瓶颈之一是，直到最近，两个量子比特的门保真度还没有那么高，”佩塔说。“远低于90%

中文标题: 美陆军将对单信道地面和机载无线电系统作战网络进行现代化改造
整编内容: 美陆军近日授予泰勒斯防务和安全公司和L3哈里斯技术公司一份价值总额为61亿美元的合同，旨在对其服役30多年的“单信道地面和机载无线电系统”（SINCGARS）作战网络进行现代化改造，使其与美国国家安全局的密码现代化要求保持一致。该项工作基于现有设备安全语音和数据通信，通过集成新的跳频方法、波形和加密增强能力进行现代化升级，以适应现代化作战安全通信的要求。升级后的设备将部署在地面和空中平台上，同时新的波形将基于车载和便携式单兵无线电的跳频功能实现在竞争环境安全传输数据。SINCGARS现代化改造是陆军现代化六个优先事项（远程精确打击、下一代战车、未来垂直起降、网络、防空反导、单兵杀伤力）之一的“网络”的重要组成部分，对未来美陆军构建一体化战术网络具备重要意义。该项目将于2032年3月完成。
整编机构: 中国电科
源标题: US Army picks L3Harris, Thales for $6.1B SINCGARS combat radio upgrade effort
原文:
The US Army has selected Thales Defense and Security and L3Harris Technologies for the modernization of its ageing Single Channel Ground and Airborne Radio System (SINCGARS) combat-net radios.
The two companies will compete for each order of the $6.1 billion hybrid contract that will see the SINCGARS radios to align them with the National Security Agency crypto modernization requirements.
According to a US Army contract announcement, the effort is expected to be completed by March 2032.
SINCGARS has been in service for over three decades and has provided US soldiers with a secure method for voice and data communication.
The service announced the radio modernization contraction after releasing a request for information in 2020 to evaluate new radio solution or upgrades to SINCGARS. The RFI noted that upgrades to SINCGARS would have to include new frequency hopping capabilities and cryptographic enhancements for secure communications.
SINCGARS is integrated in ground and aviation platforms and the new waveform will include frequency hopping capabilities for use in mounted vehicle radios and the portable manpack radio to securely transmit data within contested environments.
The SINCGARS upgrade is part of the service’s efforts to get all of the radios within a tactical network to be “as effective as smartphones.” This is one of the Army’s six modernization priorities, along with long-range precision fires, next generation combat vehicle, future vertical lift, air and missile defense and soldier lethality.
中文原文: 美国陆军已经选择泰勒斯防务与安全公司和L3Harris技术公司对其老化的单通道地面和机载无线电系统(SINCGARS)战斗网无线电进行现代化改造。这两家公司将争夺价值61亿美元的混合合同的每一个订单，该合同将使SINCGARS无线电符合国家安全局的加密现代化要求。根据美国陆军合同公告，这项工作预计将于2032年3月完成。SINCGARS已经服役超过30年，为美国士兵提供了一种安全的语音和数据通信方法。该服务在2020年发布信息请求以评估新的无线电解决方案或SINCGARS的升级后，宣布了无线电现代化收缩。RFI指出，SINCGARS的升级必须包括新的跳频能力和安全通信的加密增强。SINCGARS集成在地面和航空平台中，新的波形将包括跳频能力，用于车载无线电和便携式手提式无线电，以在有争议的环境中安全地传输数据。SINCGARS升级是该部门努力让战术网络中的所有无线电“像智能手机一样有效”的一部分这是陆军六个现代化优先事项之一，还有远程精确火力、下一代战斗车辆、未来垂直升降、空中和导弹防御以及士兵杀伤力。

中文标题: 首尔称朝鲜发射疑似多管火箭炮
整编内容:
韩国参谋长联席会议表示，韩国军方于7月10日下午18时21分至18时37分左右发现了疑似朝鲜多管火箭炮的飞行轨迹，但没有进一步披露共检测到多少条轨迹。美、韩官员警告称，朝鲜正准备进行第七次核试验。美进一步警告称，此举将引发“迅速而有力”的反应。
上个月，韩国国防部长李钟燮表示，首尔将加强其防御能力，以及与华盛顿和东京的安全合作，以应对来自平壤的核威胁。
上周，共有六架美国顶级F-35A战斗机抵达韩国，进行为期10天的盟军演习，持续到7月14日，这是自2017年底以来美国隐形战机在该国的首次公开部署。

源标题: North Korea Fires Suspected Rocket Launchers: Seoul
原文:
North Korea fired what appeared to be multiple rocket launchers Sunday, Seoul said, the latest in a series of provocations by the nuclear-armed nation to heighten tensions in the region.
The South Korean military detected “flight trajectories” that were suspected to be shots from North Korean artillery, Seoul’s Joint Chiefs of Staff said.
“Our military spotted flight trajectories that are suspected to be North Korea’s multiple rocket launchers from around 18:21 to 18:37 pm today,” said the Joint Chiefs of Staff in a text message to reporters.
“Our military has strengthened surveillance and vigilance, and maintained a thorough readiness posture while keeping close US-South Korea cooperation,” it added, without further details.
Seoul authorities did not share how many trajectories were detected in total.
The presidential National Security Office held a meeting over the North’s firing, and said it was “closely monitoring” the situation in case of additional launches by Pyongyang.
North Korea has carried out a blitz of sanctions-busting weapons tests this year, including firing an intercontinental ballistic missile at full range for the first time since 2017.
Washington and Seoul officials have also warned that the isolated regime is preparing to carry out what would be its seventh nuclear test – a move that the US warned would provoke a “swift and forceful” response.
Last month, South Korean Defence Minister Lee Jong-sup said Seoul would “strengthen” its defense capabilities, as well as its security cooperation with Washington and Tokyo, to counter the nuclear threat from Pyongyang.
A total of six US top-of-the-line F-35A fighters arrived in the South last week for a 10-day allied exercise running until July 14, in the first public deployment of American stealth warplanes in the country since late 2017.

中文标题: 波音公司提议为乌克兰提供“陆射小直径炸弹”
整编内容:
路透社11月28日发布消息称，波音公司向美国国防部提交建议书，向乌克兰提供“陆射小直径炸弹”。
“陆射小直径炸弹”由美国波音公司和瑞典萨伯公司联合研制，使用波音公司的GBU-39B“小直径炸弹”I和洛克希德?马丁公司与迪尔BGT防务公司制造的M270A1多管火箭炮的M26火箭发动机。GBU-39B“小直径炸弹”是一种增程型115千克级制导弹药，为作战飞机开发，依靠全球定位系统提供导航，其小尺寸允许增加飞机载弹量，以实现每架次多次杀伤并减少附带毁伤。M26是一种非制导火箭弹，由M270多管火箭炮发射，由固体燃料火箭发动机提供动力。
“陆射小直径炸弹”采用先进抗干扰GPS辅助惯性导航系统，圆概率误差小于1米；配装侵彻/破片杀伤多用途战斗部和可编程电子引信，可穿透厚约1.8米的混凝土结构；配用固体火箭发动机，从“海玛斯”火箭炮发射，射程可达150千米，而“海玛斯”火箭炮发射标准制导火箭弹的射程仅为70千米。截至9月底，美国已向乌克兰交付16套“海玛斯”火箭炮系统。

源标题: Boeing from US proposes new guided artillery rocket GLSDB for Ukrainian HIMARS ranging 150 km
原文:
POSTED ONTUESDAY, 29 NOVEMBER 2022 10:45
According to information published by the International press agency Reuters on November 28, 2022, the American company Boeing submitted a proposal to the United States Department of Defense to supply Ukraine Ground-Launched Small Diameter Bomb (GLSDB), a guided rocket artillery ammunition that will increase firing range ofM142 HIMARSrocket launcher vehicles up to 150 km. Using a standard guided rocket, the HIMARS has a maximum firing range of 70 km.
The GLSDB (Ground-Launched Small Diameter Bomb) is a new generation of precision-guided ammunition that was jointly developed by the Swedish company SAAB and the American company Boeing using Boeing’s GBU-39B SDB I bomb and M26 rocket motor of theM270A1Multiple Launch Rocket System (MLRS) manufactured by Lockheed Martin and Diehl BGT Defence.
The GBU-39B Small Diameter Bomb, or SDB, is an extended range all-weather, day or night 115 kg class, guided munition that was developed as a weapon system for combat aircraft. The SDB relies on the Global Positioning System to provide navigation to the target. Additionally, its small size allows increased aircraft loadout to achieve multiple kills per sortie and inherently reduces the probability of collateral damage.
The M26 is an unguided rocket that was designed to be launched by theM270MLRS. The rocket is powered by a solid-fuel rocket motor.
GLSDB has the ability to fly non-ballistic trajectories and maneuvers to strike targets that cannot be reached by conventional direct-fire weapons, such as reverse slope engagement. GLSDB offers land forces a truly mobile capability to hit targets that before have been out of their range. The rocket offers high lethality, increased range, and high maneuverability. It has the ability to defeat soft and hard skin threats, targets behind the launcher, as well as hard-to-reach targets.
Citing open source information, the GLSDB can be launched by the American-madeM142 HIMARS, an MLRS (Multiple Launch Rocket System) that the United States has delivered to the Ukrainian armed forces. The HIMARS has two rocket pods and can load up to six rockets according to the pod.
One of the main advantages of the GLSDB, it can be launched from hidden or protected rocket-launching sites to avoid detection by the enemy forces, engage targets at 360°, and is accurate to strike targets within 1 m.
The GLSDB has a weight of around 115 kg and is equipped with an Advanced Anti-Jam GPS System-aided Inertial Navigation System, combined with a multipurpose, penetrating blast-and-fragmentation warhead and programmable electronic fuze. The rocket has a firing range of up to 150 km while the standard HIMARS rockets can reach a maximum firing range of 70 km. It can be used to destroy static and mobile targets with a high level of accuracy during day and night and in all weather conditions.
As of late September, the US had delivered 16 launchers to Ukraine.（Jane's Defence Weekly，18-Nov-2022）
中文原文: 发布于2022年11月29日星期二10:45据国际新闻社路透社2022年11月28日发布的信息，美国波音公司向美国国防部提交了一份向乌克兰供应地面发射小直径炸弹(GLSDB)的建议，这是一种制导火箭炮弹药，将M142 HimarsRocket Launcher车辆的射程提高到150公里。使用标准制导火箭，HIMARS的最大射程为70公里。GLSDB（地面发射小直径炸弹）是由瑞典萨博公司和美国波音公司联合开发的新一代精确制导弹药，使用波音公司的GBU-39B SDB I型炸弹和洛克希德·马丁公司和迪尔BGT Defence公司生产的270A1多管火箭系统(MLRS)的M26火箭发动机。GBU-39B小直径炸弹，或称SDB，是一种增程全天候、白天或夜间115公斤级制导弹药，是作为战斗机的武器系统开发的。康体局依靠全球定位系统向目标提供导航。此外，它的小尺寸允许增加飞机装载量，以实现每架次多次杀伤，并内在地降低了附带伤害的概率。M26是一种非制导火箭，设计由270MLRs发射。火箭由固体燃料火箭发动机提供动力。GLSDB有能力飞行非弹道弹道和机动打击常规直射武器无法到达的目标，如反坡交战。GLSDB为陆军提供了一种真正的机动能力，可以打击以前超出其射程的目标。这种火箭具有高杀伤力、增加射程和高机动性。它有能力击败软硬皮肤威胁、发射器后面的目标，以及难以到达的目标。引用开源信息，GLSDB可以由美国madeM142 HIMARS发射，这是一种MLRS（多管火箭发射系统），美国已经交付给乌克兰武装部队。HIMARS有两个火箭吊舱，根据吊舱最多可以装载六枚火箭。GLSDB的一个主要优点是，它可以从隐蔽或受保护的火箭发射场发射，以避免被敌军发现，在360度打击目标，并精确打击1米内的目标。GLSDB重约115公斤，配备了先进的抗干扰GPS系统辅助惯性导航系统，结合了多用途、穿透性爆炸破片弹头和可编程电子引信。该火箭的射程可达150公里，而标准HIMARS火箭的最大射程可达70公里。它可以用来摧毁静态和移动目标，在白天和晚上，在所有天气条件下，以高精度水平。截至9月下旬，美国已经向乌克兰交付了16枚发射器。(《简氏防务周刊》，2022年11月18日）

中文标题: 俄罗斯直升机公司将在Army-2021上展示多种军事装备
整编内容:
Rostec 国家公司的俄罗斯直升机公司将在Army-2021国际军事技术论坛上展示多种军用直升机。
展品包括Mi-28NE攻击直升机、Mi-35M和Mi-35P战斗运输直升机等，这些战机配备了广泛的制导和非制导导弹武器，配备了最新的航空电子设备。此外还有现代化的军用运输直升机Mi-171SH，其特点是由于使用了凯夫拉尔装甲板，从而增加了对机组人员和着陆力的保护，直升机配备多种武器以有效支持空降突击行动。另一个展品展示内容包括全新外观的Ka-226T轻型直升机，机身采用现代轻质材料制造，控制系统和电气系统都进行了现代化改造，安装了抗震防事故燃油系统，满足更高的安全要求，适用于解决高空条件下的任务。
直升机公司的BAS-200无人机也将首次亮相，该机的最大起飞重量为200公斤，可以达到160公里/小时的速度，能够运输商业负载高达50公斤，可以在3900米的高度飞行4小时。此外还配备一个地面控制综合体（该装置长3.9米，高1.2米），可以实现在100公里范围内与无人机进行通信。
作为在库宾卡机场举行的博览会的一部分，世界上最大的系列直升机现代化Mi-26T2B、运输伞兵Mi-38T和民用Ansat Aurus直升机等也将亮相。

源标题: Russian Helicopters to Display BAS-200 Drone at Army 2021 Show
原文:
The first ever drone developed by Russian Helicopters, BAS-200 will be displayed in the static area at Army 2021 event in Moscow starting Monday.
BAS-200 will be presented at the "Army" forum and placed in the aviation exposition area at "Kubinka" airfield. The maximum take-off weight of the device is 200 kilograms. It can reach speed up to 160 km/h and is capable of transporting commercial load up to 50 kilograms. The BAS-200 is capable of flying up to 4 hours at altitudes of up to 3,900 meters. There also presents a ground control complex to provide communication with the drone at a range of up to 100 kilometers. The device is 3.9 meters long and 1.2 meters high. The BAS-200 project is being developed by the National Helicopter Center "Mil & Kamov" of "Russian Helicopters" Holding Company.
The company will also display attack helicopter Mi-28NE, as well as transport-combat Mi-35M and Mi-35P. These aircraft are loaded with a wide range of guided and unguided missiles, and the most up-to-date avionics allow them to carry out missions at any time of the day or night. Also, in the "Patriot" park will be presented an upgraded military transport helicopter Mi-171Sh. It is characterized by increased protection of the crew and troops through the use of kevlar armor plates. The helicopter will also have an expanded armament to effectively support the paratroopers from the air.
Another aircraft presented at the static display will be a light helicopter Ka-226T in a new design, adapted to meet the high mountain requirements. The helicopter's fuselage ?is made with the use of modern lightweight materials, the control and the electrical helicopter systems have been modernized, an impact-resistant crashproof fuel system has been installed, which meets the increased safety requirements. At the same time, the volume of fuel tanks has been increased because of centralized refueling support. The helicopter is also equipped with a new complex of pilot navigation and radio communication equipment.
As part of the holding's exposition at the Kubinka airfield, the world's largest serial helicopter, the modernized Mi-26T2B, as well as transport-paratroopers Mi-38T and civil Ansat Aurus helicopter, will also be presented.

中文标题: 英国国防部寻求舰艇混合动力推进技术
整编内容:
英国“国防与安全加速器”机构开展市场调研，向供应商寻求技术成熟度5-9级的舰艇混合动力推进技术。
该机构计划到2030年将英国海军的碳排放降低40%，到2050年前实现净零排放，为实现上述目标，舰艇混合动力推进技术以电力推进、储能技术为核心。该机构对供应商提交的技术方案提出以下要求：一是能集成到现役舰艇；二是需标明当前技术成熟度和预计投入应用的时间；三是技术成熟度大于7级的技术方案需给出系统研发成本、安装成本的大致范围；四是推进系统不得使用核动力，必须兼容标准柴油和未来可能的新型燃料（但密度较低的氨、氢燃料除外）；五是应充分考虑轮机舱空间和以下三个应用场景。
应用场景一：排水量65000吨，航速高于25节，推进系统输出功率为4×20兆瓦。
应用场景二：排水量6900吨，航速高于26节，推进系统输出功率为2×20兆瓦。
应用场景三：排水量7350吨，航速高于32节，推进系统输出功率为2×21.5兆瓦。

源标题: Powering Royal Navy ships with hybrid-electric engines
原文:
DASA is exploring solutions for innovations in hybrid powertrain technologies that could power Royal Navy vessels and reduce carbon emissions
The Defence and Security Accelerator (DASA) is pleased to launch a new Market Exploration called Hybridisation of the Naval Fleet, which aims to identify hybrid powertrain technologies for Royal Navy (RN) and Royal Fleet Auxiliary (RFA) ships.
This Market Exploration is being run on behalf of the UK Ministry of Defence (MOD) Naval Ships Support Central Engineering Team and seeks hybrid powertrain technologies to explore options that will implemented by 2030, to aid the defence environmental sustainability strategy to reduce carbon emissions by 2050. Proposals submitted to this Market Exploration should be at Technology Readiness Levels (TRLs) 5-9.
Do you have an innovative solution? Read the full Market Exploration now and submit your idea
Using hybrid engines to reduce the emissions of Royal Navy and Auxiliary ships hybrid powertrain solutions for RN and RFA ships could reduce emissions by 20-40% by 2030. We want to understand the hybrid powertrain market for ships that meet the capability requirements for Defence Equipment and Support (DE&S), as solutions will be retrofitted to ships.
We are seeking solutions per vessel, based around electrification (AC as well as DC) and electrical storage. Solutions will be able to be retrofitted to current vessels and will not have a negative impact on their individual operational capability. Preferable solutions will be weight saving or neutral.
What kind of ships will solutions need to be implemented on?
mass of 65,000 Tonnes at a speed of no less than 25 Knots
mass of 6,900 Tonnes at a minimum of 26 Knots
mass of 7,350 Tonnes at a minimum speed requirement of 32 Knots
Do you have an in-depth understanding of emerging capabilities, technologies, initiatives and novel approaches that may help better our understanding of the hybrid powertrain market? Submit an idea and help inform UK Ministry of Defence (MOD) Naval Ships Support Central Engineering Team in methods for reducing carbon emissions in the Royal Navy.
1.Background
This Market Exploration exercise aims to find a Hybrid Powertrain potential solution for use in Royal Navy (RN) and Auxiliary ships. This is to aid the defence environmental sustainability strategy, to reduce carbon emissions to net zero by no later than 2050. Through prior research it has been found that hybrid engines have the potential to significantly reduce the overall emissions of RN and Auxiliary ships. By conducting a Market Exploration it is hoped that this technology can be taken further and implemented into active service.
2.What we want
We are interested in current or soon to be introduced Hybrid Powertrain potential solutions for use on RN and Auxiliary vessels in order to achieve a 20-40% emissions reduction by 2030. Potential solutions are sought around electrification (AC as well as DC) and electrical storage. Carbon reduction targets are set at point of use and exclude the manufacturing process. Analysis of potential hybrid solution for disposal or recycling should be provided with any proposals. It is important to note that we are looking for different potential solutions per vessel as they each have different use cases and requirements. Potential solutions must be able to fit into existing engine spaces. The Market Exploration will need to explore potential solutions capable of propelling ships such as:
Mass of 65,000 Tonnes at a speed of no less than 25 Knots. Length – 280m, Beam – 39/73m, Draught – 11m. Propulsion output is 4x 20MWMass of 6,900 Tonnes at a minimum of 26 Knots. Length – 150m, Beam – 21m. Power output is 2x 20MWMass of 7,350 Tonnes at a minimum speed requirement of 32 Knots. Length – 280m, Beam – 39/73m. Power output is 2x 21.5MW
These potential solutions need to be retrofittable into current vessels and have no negative impact on their individual operational capability. It is desired that the current TRL and “maturity time” for each potential solution is declared so that this can be taken into consideration. Potential solutions should be weight neutral or better. Rough order of magnitude for costs of the system, system installation and any development costs from TRL 7 onwards. We are not looking for fully costed proposals at this time. Details must be given of any infrastructure required to support the potential solution. Certification basis will be in line with current practice, highlighting any additional risks.
3.What we don’t want
We are not interested in literature reviews, paper-based studies, consultancy, non-technical potential solutions or marginal improvements to existing capabilities. Potential solutions cannot only run on standard diesel and must have the adaptability to run with future fuels. There is no interest in pursuing alternative low-density fuels such as ammonia or hydrogen. Potential solutions should not negatively impact the operational capability of RN and auxiliary vessels. Nuclear options will not be considered.
This is not a competition and therefore we are not asking for fully costed proposals at this stage. This is a market engagement request for information exercise, and we do not commit to subsequently launch a formal DASA competition. Potential solutions that address less than the minimum propulsion requirements are not required.
4.How to submit a Market Exploration Submission to DASA
Responses to this Market Exploration must be submitted via theDASA submission service, for which you will need to register. We recommend you use a Google Chrome browser to access the DASA submission service. You will be asked for a title and short summary of your innovation, along with questions related to your organisation, your idea and technology maturity. We are seeking to understand what and how much further development is required for a complete potential solution to meet requirements, or whether a combination of separate potential solutions is required. The information you provide will assist in developing a statement of requirements for potential future activities.
Submissions must be submitted by midday (GMT) on 27 January 2022. Unfortunately we are unable to accept any submissions after this point.
Please only provide details of one product/capability per submission. If you have a number of potential solutions, then please submit multiple forms.
If you have any questions then please emailaccelerator@dstl.gov.ukwith “Hybridisation of the Naval Fleet” in the subject line.
5.How we use your information
Information you provide to us in a Market Exploration Submission, that is not already available to us from other sources, will be handled in-confidence. By submitting a Market Exploration Submission you are giving us permission to keep and use the information for our internal purposes, and to provide the information onwards, in-confidence, within UK Government. The Defence and Security Accelerator will not use or disclose the information for any other purpose, without first requesting permission to do so.

中文标题: 美空军在“ACE REAPER”演习中测试敏捷作战部署概念
整编内容: 9 月中旬~10 月初，美空军举行名为“ACE REAPER”演习测试，验证了其敏捷作战部署概念，证明其可以利用有限的地面支援设备和非专业地面人员在太平洋地区操作MQ-9“死神”进行远程飞行。演习期间，第556试验与评估中队利用MQ-9“显著改进的自动起飞和着陆能力”，使其从内华达州克里奇空军基地飞往夏威夷海军陆战队基地。新系统在实地行动之前只利用图像，未进行任何标准的调查。在海军陆战队基地，MQ-9进行5架次本地模式飞行，并用于训练6组以前未接受过“死神”地面作战训练的地面人员。556中队指挥官称，敏捷作战部署小组仅利用五名精通武器、飞机维护和通信的多能力飞行员进行了三次快速加油，平均时间只有20分钟（传统需3小时）。MQ-9随后飞往关岛安德森空军基地。这次飞行验证了其 “利用减少的卫星带宽”进行中转并从一颗卫星迁移到另一颗卫星的能力。MQ-9“不需要任何设备”来进行发射和回收操作。试验最终表明利用MQ-9作战可以减少近90%的人力维护， 95%的设备维护，100%的发射和回收设备。下一步将把MQ-9作战形式应用到“勇敢之盾2022”演习中，以增加战区的战略与作战能力。
整编机构: 军事科学院军事科学信息研究中心
源标题: Air Force Demos Reaper Operations in Pacific Flights with Non-Expert Troops, Limited Gear
原文:
Dec. 7, 2021 | ByJohn A. Tirpak
The Air Force demonstrated it can operate the remotely-pilotedMQ-9 Reaperin long-range flights in the Pacific using limited ground support gear and non-specialist ground personnel. The demonstration provided a boost for its agile combat employment concept, the service said Dec. 7.
The tests and exercises, called ACE REAPER, were conducted mid-September to early October, but the Air Force is announcing them only now.
The 556th Test and Evaluation Squadron flew anMQ-9from Creech Air Force Base, Nev., to Marine Corps Base Hawaii using a “significantly modified Auto Takeoff and Landing Capability,”the unit said. The new system uses “imagery alone, without any standard surveys conducted prior” to field operations. While at the Marine Corps base, the MQ-9 flew five local pattern sorties and was used in training six sets of ground crews not previously trained in Reaper ground operations, certifying those crews to train other non-specialists in MQ-9 operations for future sorties.
The agile combat employment team “conducted three rapid refuels utilizing only five multi-capable airmen who were proficient between weapons, aircraft maintenance, and communications,” 556th commander Lt. Col. Michael Chmielewski said in a press release. Although refueling, rearming, and regenerating a Reaper typically takes three hours, the commander reported an average time of just 20 minutes.
The MQ-9 then flew on to Andersen Air Force Base, Guam. The flight validated its ability to make the transit “on reduced satellite bandwidth” and migrating from one satellite to another.
The 556th proved the MQ-9 “does not require any … equipment” to conduct launch and recovery operations, Chmielewski said.
A pilot on the ground at Andersen used a Ruggedized Aircraft Maintenance Test Station as an ersatz cockpit to control the MQ-9 to a landing once it was within line of sight. As at Marine Corps Base Hawaii, “this landing was conducted without any MQ-9 operations or runway surveys being physically conducted prior to first landing at Guam,” the 556th said in a press release.
The entire logistics footprint included seven personnel and a half-pallet of equipment, while a generator, light cart, and fuel were already in place, Chmielewski said. Another sortie was generated within seven hours of the equipment arriving to Guam.
Collectively, the experiment showed that MQ-9 operations could be conducted with “a nearly 90 percent reduction in maintenance manpower, 95 percent reduction in maintenance equipment, and a 100 percent reduction in launch and recovery equipment,” he added.
The experiments verified aspects of USAF’s hub-and-spoke concept for island operations in the Pacific, conducting minor maintenance, rapid refueling, and rapid re-arming at austere locations. “This capability will move its logistics team out from other large footprints and remain closer to the fight to maximize its combat effectiveness,” the 556th said.
“From maintenance to communications to operations, our team did a phenomenal job across the spectrum to innovate new tactics from existing capabilities on a near-impossible timeline … to start validating the MQ-9’s ability to be agile,” said Chmielewski. He acknowledged the support of the 432nd Wing and 49th Wing in the tests.
The next step will be employing the MQ-9 in its new lean format into the Valiant Shield 2022 exercise to “increase strategic and operational success in the theater,” he said.
中文原文: 2021年12月7日约翰·蒂尔帕克空军展示了它可以使用有限的地面支持装备和非专业地面人员在太平洋操作遥控驾驶DMQ-9 Reaperin远程飞行。该服务于12月7日表示，该演示为其敏捷战斗就业概念提供了推动。这次被称为ACE收割者的测试和演习是在9月中旬到10月初进行的，但空军现在才宣布。该部队表示，第556测试和评估中队使用“显著改进的自动起飞和着陆能力”，将ANMQ-9从内华达州克里奇空军基地飞往夏威夷海军陆战队基地。新系统在实地行动前“仅使用图像，而不进行任何标准调查”。在海军陆战队基地期间，MQ-9飞行了五次当地模式的架次，并用于训练六组以前没有接受过收割者地面行动训练的地面工作人员，证明这些工作人员在未来的架次中训练其他非专业人员。第556指挥官Michael Chmielewski中校在一份新闻稿中说，敏捷战斗雇佣小组“仅利用五名精通武器、飞机维护和通信的多能力飞行员进行了三次快速加油”。虽然加油、重新武装和再生收割者通常需要三个小时，但指挥官报告说平均时间只有20分钟。MQ-9随后飞往关岛的安徒生空军基地。这次飞行验证了它“在减少卫星带宽的情况下”过境和从一颗卫星迁移到另一颗卫星的能力。Chmielewski说，第556次证明MQ-9“不需要任何……设备”来进行发射和回收操作。安德森地面的一名飞行员使用一个加固的飞机维修试验站作为代用驾驶舱，一旦MQ-9在视线范围内，就控制它着陆。第556部队在一份新闻稿中说，就像在夏威夷海军陆战队基地一样，“这次着陆是在第一次在关岛着陆之前没有进行任何MQ-9行动或跑道测量的情况下进行的”。Chmielewski说，整个后勤足迹包括7名人员和半托盘设备，而发电机、轻型推车和燃料已经到位。设备抵达关岛后7小时内又出动了一次。他补充说，总的来说，实验表明，MQ-9可以在“维修人力减少近90%、维修设备减少95%，发射和回收设备减少100%”的情况下进行操作。这些实验验证了美国空军在太平洋岛屿作战的中心辐概念的各个方面，在艰苦的地点进行小规模维护、快速加油和快速重新武装。“这种能力将使其后勤团队从其他大足迹中转移出去，并保持更接近战斗，以最大限度地提高其战斗力，”第556号说。Chmielewski说：“从维护到通信再到运营，我们的团队在一个几乎不可能的时间表上从现有能力中创新新策略，在各个领域做了非凡的工作……开始验证MQ-9的敏捷能力。”他承认432联队和49联队在测试中的支持。他说，下一步将把MQ-9以其新的精益形式应用到英勇盾牌2022演习中，以“增加战区的战略和运营成功”。

中文标题: 加拿大反应堆已具备镥-177生产能力
整编内容: 加拿大布鲁斯电力公司（Bruce Power）近日宣布，布鲁斯核电厂7号机组反应堆已成为世界上第一个具备生产医用放射性同位素镥-177的核反应堆。镥-177可用于治疗神经内分泌肿瘤和前列腺癌等。目前，布鲁斯7号机组中的同位素生产系统已安装完成。布鲁斯电力将在这一系统中对镱-176进行辐照，这是生产镥-177的第一步。此外，布鲁斯电力还表示，该系统未来还可能会生产其他医用同位素。
整编机构: 中核战略规划研究总院
源标题: Bruce 7 prepares for isotope production
原文:
25 January 2022
Share
Bruce unit 7 has become the first nuclear power reactor in the world with installed capability to produce the medical radioisotope lutetium-177 (Lu-177). The isotope, which is used in the treatment of cancers such as neuroendocrine tumours and prostate cancer, will be produced from ytterbium targets irradiated in the reactor.
(Image: Bruce Power)
The isotope production system, or IPS, that has now been installed in the Candu reactor will be able in future to produce other isotopes for medical uses, Bruce Power said. The IPS has been designed by Isogen, a partnership of Kinectrics and Framatome and its installation is the latest step in a project that began over three years ago, when Bruce Power and ITG, a subsidiary of radiopharmaceutical technology company ITM IsotopenTechnologien München (ITM), announced a joint effort to explore the production of Lu-177 at Bruce Power's Candu reactors.
Bruce Power will conduct the irradiation of ytterbium-176 targets in the IPS as a first step in the production of no-carrier-added Lu-177 (nca Lu-177). Processing of the irradiated targets for the production ofnca Lu-177, as well as the global supply of the isotope, will be handled by ITM.
Activities will now shift to planned commissioning and preparation for the commercial production that will begin once these activities and regulatory submissions are successfully completed, Bruce Power said.
James Scongack, Bruce Power's chief development officer, described the installation of the IPS as a "milestone" towards the unit becoming the first power reactor in the world to provide a "scalable, game-changing solution" in medical isotope supply. "Our medical isotope program and the IPS installation are a result of years of innovation and development in partnership with Isogen, Saugeen Ojibway Nation, and ITM, and will provide large-scale capacity to help produce medical isotopes, which will be used across the world in new treatments to fight cancer," he said.
Bruce Power will market the new isotope supply in partnership with Saugeen Ojibway Nation (SON) through a project named Gamzook'aaminAakoziwin, which includes an equity stake for SON and a revenue-sharing programme.
"From the initial concept in 2019 to production expected in 2022, our Gamzook'aaminAakoziwin project is on track to meet an ambitious timeline to have isotope supply ready to meet the increasing demand from doctors and cancer patients around the world,” said Chief Lester Anoquot, Chippewas of Saugeen First Nation. "Saugeen Ojibway Nation is proud of the part we have played and will continue to play in this project."
中文原文: 2022年1月25日分享布鲁斯7号机组已成为世界上第一个具备生产医用放射性同位素lutetium-177(Lu-177)能力的核电反应堆。这种同位素用于治疗神经内分泌肿瘤和前列腺癌等癌症，将从在反应堆中辐照的镱靶中产生。（图片：布鲁斯·鲍尔）布鲁斯·鲍尔说，现在已经安装在Candu反应堆中的同位素生产系统，或称IPS，将来将能够生产用于医疗用途的其他同位素。IPS是由Kinectrics和Framatome的合作伙伴Isogen设计的，它的安装是一个项目的最新步骤，该项目始于三年前，当时布鲁斯电力公司和放射性制药技术公司ITM IsotopenTechnologien München(ITM)的子公司ITG宣布了一项联合努力，在布鲁斯电力公司的坎杜反应堆探索Lu-177的生产。Bruce Power将在IPS中对镱-176靶材进行辐照，作为生产无载流子Lu-177(nca Lu-177)的第一步。用于生产NCA LU-177的辐照靶的处理以及同位素的全球供应将由ITM负责。布鲁斯·鲍尔（Bruce Power）表示，一旦这些活动和监管文件成功完成，活动将转移到计划中的调试和商业生产的准备工作上，商业生产将开始。布鲁斯电力公司首席开发官詹姆斯·斯康克（James Scongack）将IPS的安装描述为该机组成为世界上第一个在医用同位素供应方面提供“可扩展、改变游戏规则的解决方案”的动力反应堆的“里程碑”。他说：“我们的医用同位素项目和IPS安装是与Isogen、Saugeen Ojibway Nation和ITM合作多年创新和发展的结果，将提供大规模的能力来帮助生产医用同位素，这些同位素将用于世界各地抗击癌症的新治疗。”Bruce Power将与Saugeen Ojibway Nation(SON)合作，通过一个名为Gamzook'aamin Aakoziwin的项目销售新的同位素供应，该项目包括SON的股权和一个收入分享计划。“从2019年的最初概念到预计2022年的生产，我们的Gamzook'aamin Aakoziwin项目有望实现一个雄心勃勃的时间表，即同位素供应准备好满足世界各地医生和癌症患者日益增长的需求，”索根第一民族的首席莱斯特·阿诺科特说。“索根·奥吉布威民族对我们在这个项目中发挥的作用感到自豪，并将继续发挥作用。”

中文标题: 美陆军与高校合作开展战地增材制造研究
整编内容:
罗文大学与德雷克塞尔大学组成的研究团队自2017年以来一直与陆军研究实验室合作，开发军用增材制造技术，近日美国国防部向该研究团队提供100万美元资金，以继续开发用于战地的增材制造材料、工艺和设备。
研究团队将在此前研究的基础上，进一步开展战地增材制造研究，特别是开发聚合物增材制造新工艺，探索性能更优的材料，以便陆军作战人员可以战场使用它们来制造所需的物品。例如，利用增材制造生产战场受损车辆的零部件，而无需返回基地或等待新零件的运送。
研究团队正在研究用于战场增材制造的最佳方法，开发可持续且能够承受极端环境的材料，具体包括：开发军用级聚合物材料，利用该材料3D打印出重量更轻、更耐用的部件；开发用于光学镜片的增材制造技术，未来有望用于作战人员或其他陆军武器系统；开发新型自修复材料，当装备或部件表面出现裂纹时，其内部的树脂材料会发生反应，密封裂纹或孔洞，实现其快速修复。

源标题: Engineering ways to make new parts, equipment in the field
原文:
Since 2017, researchers from Rowan University’s Henry M. Rowan College of Engineering and Drexel University have collaborated with Pittsburgh-based PPG and the U.S. Department of Defense’s Army Research Laboratory to develop additive manufacturing technologies for military applications. The Department of Defense has awarded the collaborators an additional $999,981 in funding to continue research on 3D printing.
The research is led by principal investigator Joseph Stanzione, Ph.D., associate professor of chemical engineering in the Henry M. Rowan College of Engineering and the director of the Advanced Materials & Manufacturing Institute（AMMI）, and principal investigator Giuseppe Palmese, Ph.D., the dean of the Henry M. Rowan College of Engineering and the associate director of AMMI.
Stanzione, Palmese, and collaborators will build on previous research focusing on 3D printing in military settings, specifically to develop new processes for 3D printing with polymers. The Army can use 3D printing to manufacture pieces of equipment in vehicles that are damaged in the field without needing to travel back to the base or wait for a new part to be shipped, for example. The research team is working to pinpoint the best ways to print these items and with materials that are sustainable and able to withstand extreme conditions.
“The work that we've been doing is related to finding and developing materials that provide better performance characteristics so that the Army can use them in 3D-printing processes to make the parts that will be used in the field,” Palmese said.
Polymers are lightweight materials typically used to manufacture everyday items like fiberglass, paints, and even toys. In this application, they will be used to create military-grade materials. Using polymers to 3D-print these items makes them lighter and more durable. The researchers are also looking into methods of 3D-printing optical lenses.
“You can 3D-print advanced optical lenses not only for soldier wear but for other advanced systems,” Stanzione said.
Other areas of research include developing self-healing materials. In the event a crack forms in a surface, resin within the item will react to seal the crack or puncture.
The multi-disciplinary research team includes post-doctoral students, graduate students and undergraduate students in specialties like chemical engineering and materials, and science engineering.
“The students are learning how to conduct cutting-edge research,” Stanzione said. “Both the Army and PPG are very happy with the student involvement because it’s helped to train the next generation of scientists and engineers that they could potentially hire someday.”
中文原文: 自2017年以来，罗文大学亨利·M·罗文工程学院和德雷克塞尔大学的研究人员与匹兹堡的PPG和美国国防部陆军研究实验室合作，开发用于军事应用的增材制造技术。国防部已经向合作者提供了额外的999,981美元的资助，以继续进行3D打印的研究。这项研究由首席研究员Joseph Stanzione博士、Henry M.Rowan工程学院化学工程副教授兼先进材料与制造研究所(AMMI)所长和首席研究员Giuseppe Palmese博士、Henry M.Rowan工程学院院长兼AMMI副所长领导。Stanzione、Palmese和合作者将在以前的研究基础上，专注于军事环境中的3D打印，特别是开发聚合物3D打印的新工艺。例如，陆军可以使用3D打印在战场上损坏的车辆中制造设备，而不需要返回基地或等待新的零件被运送。研究小组正在努力找出印刷这些物品的最佳方法，并使用可持续的、能够承受极端条件的材料。帕尔梅斯说：“我们一直在做的工作与寻找和开发提供更好性能特征的材料有关，以便军队可以在3D打印过程中使用它们来制造将用于现场的部件。”聚合物是轻质材料，通常用于制造日常用品，如玻璃纤维，油漆，甚至玩具。在本应用程序中，它们将用于创建军用级材料。使用聚合物3D打印这些物品使它们更轻、更耐用。研究人员还在研究3D打印光学镜头的方法。斯坦齐奥内说：“你可以3D打印先进的光学镜头，不仅用于士兵穿戴，还用于其他先进系统。”其他研究领域包括开发自愈材料。在表面形成裂纹的情况下，物品内的树脂将起反应密封裂纹或穿刺。这支多学科的研究队伍包括化学工程与材料、理工科等专业的博士后、研究生和本科生。“学生们正在学习如何进行尖端研究，”斯坦齐奥内说。“军队和PPG都对学生的参与感到非常高兴，因为这有助于培养他们有朝一日可能雇佣的下一代科学家和工程师。”
中文源标题: 在现场制造新零件、新设备的工程方法

中文标题: 美导弹防御局承认验证SM-3 Block IIA的机密能力
整编内容:
美导弹防御局（MDA）近日公开承认曾秘密开展SM-3 Block IIA拦截弹研制试验。2022年4月9日，MDA和美海军在太平洋开展了宙斯盾武器系统-01飞行试验（FEM-01），旨在研发SM-3 Block IIA高度机密的潜在新能力。导弹防御局表示，出于安全因素考虑，当时有关该试验的情况并未对外公布。但近期作战试验鉴定局（DOT&E）提交国会的2022年度报告中提及了此次试验。
MDA称FEM-01为一次“实验”，但DOT&E称其为“研制性试验”。根据DOT&E报告的描述，试验中夏威夷考艾岛太平洋导弹靶场发射了一枚中程弹道导弹靶弹，一艘配备宙斯盾系统的阿利·伯克级驱逐舰向目标发射了一枚SM-3 Block IIA后成功收集了数据。过顶探测器、弹道导弹防御系统过顶持续红外架构（BOA）、指挥与控制、作战管理与通信系统（C2BMC）和巴克利太空部队基地的探测器处理网络都参与了该次试验。
报道称，由于MDA和美国海军曾在之前验证过对中程弹道导弹的拦截能力，因此2022年4月试验中的靶弹很可能不是典型的中程弹道导弹。另有一位前国防部官员推测，此次中程弹道导弹靶弹在能力上可能有所增强，很可能是用于高超声速导弹拦截的先期试验，诸如滑翔段或类似在飞行中进行了（弹道）调整”。
SM-3 Block IIA拦截弹由美国雷锡恩公司和日本三菱重工联合研发，用于防御短中程弹道导弹。较早期SM-3型号相比，该型具有更大的发动机和更大的动能弹头，弹头上装备了新型引导头，可以提升探测、识别和跟踪能力。
整编机构: 北京航天长征科技信息研究所
源标题: MDA acknowledges clandestine SM-3 Block IIA experiment of classified capability
原文:
The Missile Defense Agency executed a covert launch of the nation's most advanced Aegis guided missile interceptor over the Pacific Ocean, keeping under wraps until now an experiment -- which one senior Pentagon official also called a developmental test -- of a highly classified potential new capability for the Standard Missile-3 Block IIA.
On April 9, 2022, MDA and the Navy executed Flight Experiment Aegis Weapon System-01 （FEM-01） an event not publicly acknowledged until Inside Defense asked about the test which is mentioned in a new report by the Pentagon’s top weapons tester sent to Congress last week.
“The U.S. Missile Defense Agency successfully gathered data after U.S. Navy sailors aboard an Aegis Ballistic Missile Defense System-equipped destroyer fired a Standard Missile-3 Block IIA missile at a Medium Range Ballistic Missile target,” MDA spokesman Mark Wright told Inside Defense on Jan. 25.
“Due to the level of security considerations that marked this test, no press release was issued at that time, and no other information is releasable now,” Wright said.
The target was launched from the Pacific Missile Range Facility on Kauai, HI; MDA, which typically names the specific ship that participates in tests and experiments declined to identify the Arleigh Burke-class destroyer in FEM-01. The ship launched the SM-3 Block IIA toward the target over open ocean.
MDA officials characterized FEM-01 as an experiment.
Nickolas Guertin, director of operational test and evaluation, told Congress and the defense secretary in his office’s 2022 annual report that FEM-01 was a “developmental test.”
“The MDA conducted a developmental test of Aegis BMD, firing a Standard Missile-3 Block IIA guided missile against an MRBM target,” Guertin wrote. “Operational assets included overhead sensors, [Ballistic Missile Defense System （BMDS） Overhead Persistent Infrared （OPIR） Architecture （BOA）], [the Command and Control, Battle Management, and Communications system] and the Enterprise Sensor Processing Network at Buckley Space Force Base, Colorado.”
Guertin’s report notes that his office observed the test only and that MDA was not required in advance to provide a test plan to his office for FEM-01.
The SM-3 Block IIA interceptor is a cooperative development project launched in 2006 with Japan. Developed by Raytheon and Mitsubishi Heavy Industries, the interceptor has a 21-inch-diameter body -- an increase from 13.5 inches used in earlier SM-3 variants -- to fly faster and farther in order to defend against short- to intermediate-range ballistic missiles.
The guided missile features two improvements on earlier variants: a larger motor and a larger kinetic warhead. The warhead has new improvements, including a seeker that improves search, discrimination and tracking functions.
In October 2019, Pentagon leaders approved the SM-3 Block IIA program, for transition to production -- signaling confidence in the interceptor after early flight-test challenges.
In November 2020, at the direction of Congress, MDA and the Navy executed a flight test to test the capability limits of the SM-3 Block IIA against a much longer-range target: a rudimentary intercontinental ballistic missile. The SM-3 Block IIA chased down the ICBM target and intercepted in that event.
The April 2022 experiment, FEM-01, included a medium range ballistic missile target. Since MDA and the Navy previously demonstrated the ability of the SM-3 Block IIA against this class of targets, it is likely this was not a typical MRBM target.
One former DOD official -- who still holds security clearances -- was not aware of last year’s FEM-01 when asked about it by a reporter but said: “If it is what I think it is, it is way too classified to speak about.”
A second former DOD official, also not privy to FEM-01 before being asked about it by a reporter, speculated what MDA might have been up to.
“I think it was a medium-range target that they enhanced or something,” the former senior DOD official said. “If I had to bet money, in future we’ll find out this was a hypersonic precursor test of some sort where they had something a hypersonic [missile] does -- some kind of glide phase or something like an inflight adjustment.”
中文原文: 导弹防御局在太平洋上空秘密发射了美国最先进的宙斯盾导弹拦截器，直到现在还对标准导弹-3 Block IIA的高度机密潜在新能力进行了实验--一名五角大楼高级官员也称之为开发测试--保密。2022年4月9日，MDA和海军执行了宙斯盾武器系统-01(FEM-01)飞行实验，这一事件直到国防内部询问这项测试时才公开承认，五角大楼最高武器测试人员上周提交给国会的一份新报告中提到了这项测试。1月25日，MDA发言人马克·赖特（Mark Wright）对《国防内幕》(Inside Defense）表示：“美国导弹防御局成功收集了数据，此前美国海军水手乘坐一艘配备宙斯盾弹道导弹防御系统的驱逐舰向一个中程弹道导弹目标发射了一枚标准的导弹-3 Block IIA导弹。”赖特说：“由于标志着这次测试的安全考虑水平，当时没有发布新闻稿，现在也没有其他信息可以发布。”目标是从考艾岛的太平洋导弹靶场发射的；MDA通常命名参与测试和实验的特定船只，拒绝识别FEM-01中的阿利·伯克级驱逐舰。该船在开阔的海洋上空向目标发射了SM-3 Block IIA。MDA官员将FEM-01定性为实验。作战测试和评估主任尼科拉斯·格尔廷（Nickolas Guertin）在其办公室的2022年年度报告中告诉国会和国防部长，FEM-01是一项“发展测试”。Guertin写道：“MDA进行了宙斯盾BMD的开发测试，向MRBM目标发射了一枚标准的导弹-3 Block IIA导弹。”“作战资产包括头顶传感器、[弹道导弹防御系统(BMDS)头顶持久红外(OPIR)体系结构(BOA)]、[指挥和控制、战斗管理和通信系统]以及科罗拉多州巴克利太空部队基地的企业传感器处理网络。”Guertin的报告指出，他的办公室只观察了测试，MDA没有被要求提前向他的办公室提供FEM-01的测试计划。SM-3 Block IIA拦截弹是2006年与日本合作开发的项目。这种拦截器由雷神公司和三菱重工公司开发，其机身直径为21英寸，比早期SM-3变体使用的13.5英寸有所增加，可以飞得更快、更远，以防御短程至中程弹道导弹。这种导弹的特点是对早期变体的两个改进：一个更大的发动机和一个更大的动弹头。弹头有了新的改进，包括改进搜索、辨别和跟踪功能的导引头。2019年10月，五角大楼领导人批准了SM-3 Block IIA计划，用于向生产过渡--这表明了在早期飞行测试挑战后对拦截器的信心。2020年11月，在国会的指示下，MDA和海军进行了一次飞行测试，以测试SM-3 Block IIA对一个远距离目标的能力极限：一枚基本的洲际弹道导弹。SM-3 Block IIA追击洲际弹道导弹目标并在该事件中拦截。2022年4月的实验FEM-01包括一个中程弹道导弹目标。由于MDA和海军之前展示了SM-3 Block IIA对抗此类目标的能力，很可能这不是典型的MRBM目标。一名仍持有安全许可的前国防部官员在被记者问及去年的FEM-01时并不知道，但他说：“如果它是我认为的那样，它太机密了，不能谈论。”第二名前国防部官员在被记者问及FEM-01之前也不知情，他猜测MDA可能在做什么。“我认为这是一个中程目标，他们提高了什么，”这位前国防部高级官员说。“如果我必须赌钱，将来我们会发现这是一次高超音速前驱测试，在这种测试中，他们有高超音速导弹所做的事情--某种滑翔阶段或类似于空中调整的东西。”
中文源标题: MDA承认秘密SM-3 Block IIA分类能力实验

中文标题: 日本组建新的电子战部队以强化电子战能力
整编内容: 2022年，日本陆上自卫队（JGSDF）将在新泻的高田驻地，鸟取的米子驻地和福岛的川内驻地组建三个新的小型电子战部队，增加熊本的建军驻地和长崎的相浦驻地的EW部队数量。2023年，JGSDF计划在长崎对马驻地和冲绳与那过国驻地组建的新EW部队 的“兵团办公室大楼”，改善北海道东千岁驻地的EW部队设施。
整编机构: 北京海鹰科技情报研究所
源标题: Japan to form new EW units, strengthen existing facilities
原文:
The JGSDF's EW units are equipped with the truck-mounted network electronic warfare system (pictured above) that enables collection, analysis, and jamming of the enemy's radio waves. (Janes/Kelvin Wong)
The Japan Ground Self-Defense Force (JGSDF) will establish three new electronic warfare (EW) units as well as expand two existing EW units in 2022, a spokesperson for Japan's Ministry of Defense (MoD) told Janes.
The JGSDF will form three small-scale EW units at Camp Takada in Niigata, Camp Yonago in Tottori, and Camp Kawauchi in Fukushima, the spokesperson said.
The JGSDF will also increase the number of EW units at Camp Kengun in Kumamoto and Camp Aiura in Nagasaki, the spokesperson added.
In addition, the JGSDF is planning to improve certain facilities such as the “corps office building” for new EW units that will be formed in 2023 at Camp Tsushima in Nagasaki and Camp Yonaguni in Okinawa, the spokesperson said. Similar facilities at Camp Higashi-Chitose in Hokkaido will also be improved, the spokesperson added.
中文原文: JGSDF的电子战部队配备了车载网络电子战系统（如上图所示），可以收集、分析和干扰敌人的无线电波。（简妮/王霄）日本防卫省发言人告诉Janes，日本陆上自卫队(JGSDF)将在2022年建立三个新的电子战(EW)部队，并扩大两个现有的电子战部队。这位发言人说，JGSDF将在新潟的高田营地、鸟取的Yonago营地和福岛的Kawauchi营地组建三个小规模电子战部队。这位发言人补充说，JGSDF还将增加熊本Kengun营地和长崎Aiura营地的电子战部队数量。发言人说，此外，JGSDF正计划改善某些设施，如2023年将在长崎对岛营地和冲绳与那国营地组建的新电子战部队的“兵团办公楼”。这位发言人补充说，北海道东千岁营地的类似设施也将得到改善。

中文标题: GE海事与TEI公司签署谅解备忘录尝试将GE燃气轮机在土耳其本地化
整编内容:
GE海事（GE Marine）与土耳其TUSAS发动机工业公司（TUSAS Engine Industries, Inc，TEI）签署了一份谅解备忘录。根据该备忘录，GE和TEI将尝试将LM2500和LM500燃气轮机的制造、组装和维修实现土耳其本地化。 
根据谅解备忘录，GE和TEI将继续讨论土耳其国家和出口舰船所用GE LM2500系列和LM500燃气轮机的制造、组装、测试、维护、检查、维修和大修相关的本地化问题。谅解备忘录还寻求将TEI纳入潜在的海军项目。 
签署这份谅解备忘录后，TEI将有机会成为土耳其舰用发动机和出口舰船用LM2500、LM500燃气轮机的OEM服务提供商。这种合作还将使这类航改燃气轮机的设计、部件制造、组装和测试的本地化成为可能。
LM2500燃气轮机应用于土耳其海军
LM2500系列——基本型LM2500（25.1 MW）、LM2500+（30.2 MW）和LM2500+G4（35.3 MW）都是双转子发动机，具有快速启动能力、易于舰上维护的特点，可靠性超过99%，可用性超过98%。GE一直是土耳其海军的供应商。事实上，土耳其所有的Milgem级多用途轻型护卫舰都由GE LM2500燃气轮机和两台柴油发动机提供动力，采用柴油和燃气轮机相结合的配置。此外，24台LM2500燃气轮机在土耳其海军的Barbaros级和Gabya级护卫舰上运行，两台LM2500发动机将为目前正在建造的DIMDEG舰队补给舰提供动力。GE海事部门丰富的国内经验使LM2500和LM500燃气轮机分别成为土耳其海军新的TF2000和快速攻击舰计划的理想选择。
轻质复合材料模块
2020年，GE为未来的“圣塔芭芭拉”号航母（LCS 32）向美国Austal公司交付了其第一个新型轻型LM2500复合材料燃气轮机模块。GE还庆祝了美国海军“特德·史蒂文斯”号驱逐舰（USS Ted Stevens，DDG 128）的第一个新型轻型LM2500复合材料燃气轮机模块的完成。
有了GE燃气轮机，无论是在岸上还是在海上，土耳其海军都获得了世界范围的支持，并与其他盟国的舰船实现了互操作性。GE交付的燃气轮机已经用于646艘军舰上，为全球40个国家的海军提供服务，并为美国海军舰队提供95%的燃气轮机。GE的分体式压气机和动力涡轮设计允许现场维护，通常不需要拆除燃气轮机，因此海军每年可节省数百万美元，并减少数周/数月的船只不可用情况。
整编机构: 中国航空发动机研究院
源标题: GE Marine, TEI Sign Memorandum of Understanding to Explore Localization of GE Gas Turbines in Turkey
原文:
August 18, 2021
ISTANBUL, TURKEY-- GE Marine and TUSAS Engine Industries, Inc. （TEI） signed a Memorandum of Understanding （MOU） whereby GE and TEI will explore additional localization efforts relating to the manufacture, assembly and repair of GE’s LM2500 and LM500 gas turbines, the companies announced today at theIDEF ’21industry exhibition.
“GE Marine and TEI have partnered in Turkey for many years. With this MOU in place, we hope to discover other opportunities for TEI to play a critical role in supporting the Turkish shipbuilding industry in partnership with GE Marine,” said Steve Rogers, EMEA Business Development and Sales Director, GE Marine. “Our philosophy is to provide in-country support from build to delivery to lifetime maintenance of GE’s gas turbines,” Rogers added.
Under the MOU, GE and TEI will continue discussions on localization relating to the manufacture, assembly, test, maintenance, inspection, repair, and overhaul of Turkey’s national and exported fleet of marine GE LM2500 family and LM500 gas turbines. The MOU also seeks ways to incorporate TEI into various design processes for potential naval programs.
“Since 1985, with its partner GE, TEI has been a major player in the defense and aerospace industries by manufacturing high quality aero engine components, rendering preeminent in-service support for military and commercial engines, and producing and servicing its indigenous engines not only for national needs but also global OEMs and end-users,” said Mahmut Faruk Ak?it, Ph.D., CEO and President of TEI. “With this signed MOU, TEI will have the opportunity to become an approved and certified OEM service provider to Turkey’s marine engines and exported fleet of LM2500 family and LM500 gas turbines. This collaboration also will enable the localization efforts in design, component manufacturing, assembly and test of such aeroderivative gas turbines and open new doors for utilizing the capability of other local companies and organic depots in the ecosystem,” Ak?it added.
LM2500 for Turkish Naval Forces
The LM2500 family — the base LM2500 （25.1 MW）, LM2500+ （30.2 MW） and the LM2500+G4 （35.3 MW） — all are two spool engines that offer quick start capabilities, easy on-board maintenance, and an outstanding worldwide fleet performance of greater than 99% reliability and more than 98% availability.
GE has long been a trusted supplier to the Turkish Naval Forces. In fact, all of Turkey’s MILGEM multi-purpose corvettes are powered by a GE LM2500 and two diesel engines in a combined diesel and gas turbine configuration. Additionally, 24 LM2500s operate aboard the Turkish Navy’sBarbaros- andGabya-class frigates, and two LM2500 engines will power the DIMDEG Fleet Replenishment Ship currently under construction.
GE Marine’s vast in-country experience makes the LM2500 and LM500 gas turbines ideal for the Turkish Naval Forces’ new TF2000 and Fast Attack ship programs, respectively.
Lightweight composite module
In 2020, GE delivered its first new lightweight LM2500 composite gas turbine module to Austal USA for the futureUSS Santa Barbara（LCS 32）. GE also celebrated the completion of the first new module for the Arleigh Burke destroyerUSS Ted Stevens（DDG 128）.
This new module, which was fully certified by the United States Navy in 2019 after receiving MIL-S-901D shock qualification, offers these benefits:
· One-piece composite carbon fiber construction eliminates corrosion
· Shock, fire, and smoke tested
· 5,500 lb wall weight reduction versus steel
· Improved sound attenuation; 60% （4 dBA）
· Reduced wall temperature （25°F to 50°F cooler）
· Improved entrance with access doors that are 60% lighter, 6” taller than steel design; large 8”x 18” viewing window; new, large external plenum access panel; and larger, lighter rear panel for easier maintenance access.
Worldwide support
With a GE gas turbine, navies have worldwide support whether onshore or at sea, and interoperability benefits with other allied ships. GE has delivered gas turbines onboard 646 naval ships serving 40 navies worldwide and provides 95% of the commissioned propulsion gas turbines in the United States Navy fleet. With GE’s split casing compressor and power turbine design, in-situ maintenance is allowed, often making a gas turbine removal unnecessary; navies save millions of dollars a year and weeks/months of ship unavailability.
中文原文: 2021年8月18日土耳其伊斯坦布尔--通用电气海事公司和图萨斯发动机工业公司(TEI)签署了一份谅解备忘录(MOU)，根据该备忘录，通用电气和TEI将探索与通用电气LM2500和LM500燃气轮机的制造、组装和维修有关的额外本地化努力，这两家公司今天在第21届工业展览会上宣布。“GE Marine和TEI在土耳其合作多年。随着这份谅解备忘录的实施，我们希望为TEI找到其他机会，与GE Marine合作，在支持土耳其造船业方面发挥关键作用，“GE Marine EMEA业务发展和销售总监史蒂夫·罗杰斯说。罗杰斯补充说：“我们的理念是为通用电气的燃气轮机提供从建造到交付到终身维护的国内支持。”根据谅解备忘录，通用电气公司和TEI公司将继续讨论与土耳其国家和出口的通用电气LM2500系列和LM500燃气轮机船队的制造、组装、测试、维护、检查、修理和大修有关的本地化问题。谅解备忘录还寻求将TEI纳入潜在海军项目的各种设计过程的方法。TEI首席执行官兼总裁Mahmut Faruk Ak？it博士说：“自1985年以来，TEI一直是国防和航空航天工业的主要参与者，生产高质量的航空发动机部件，为军用和商用发动机提供卓越的在职支持，不仅为国家需求，而且为全球原始设备制造商和最终用户生产和服务其本土发动机。”“签署谅解备忘录后，TEI将有机会成为土耳其船用发动机和出口船队LM2500系列和LM500燃气轮机的经批准和认证的OEM服务提供商。这一合作还将使此类气动衍生燃气轮机的设计、部件制造、组装和测试实现本地化，并为利用生态系统中其他本地公司和有机仓库的能力打开新的大门，“Ak？它补充说。土耳其海军用LM2500LM2500系列--基础型LM2500(25.1MW)、LM2500+(30.2MW)和LM2500+G4(35.3MW)--都是两个滑阀发动机，提供快速启动能力，易于机上维护，并在全球范围内以超过99%的可靠性和超过98%的可用性表现出色。通用电气长期以来一直是土耳其海军值得信赖的供应商。事实上，土耳其所有的MILGEM多用途轻型护卫舰都是由通用电气LM2500和两台柴油发动机在柴油和燃气轮机组合配置中提供动力的。此外，24艘LM2500s在土耳其海军的巴巴罗斯-安德加比亚级护卫舰上运行，两台LM2500发动机将为目前正在建造的DIMDEG舰队补给舰提供动力。GE Marine丰富的国内经验使LM2500和LM500燃气轮机分别成为土耳其海军新型TF2000和快速攻击舰项目的理想选择。轻质复合模块2020年，通用电气向美国Austal公司交付了第一个新的轻质LM2500复合材料燃气轮机模块，用于未来号圣巴巴拉(LCS32)。通用电气还庆祝了阿利·伯克驱逐舰泰德·史蒂文斯号（DDG 128）的第一个新模块的完成。这款新模块在获得MIL-S-901D冲击资格后，于2019年获得美国海军的全面认证，提供了这些好处：·单件复合碳纤维结构消除腐蚀·电击、火灾和烟雾测试·与钢相比，壁重减少5,500磅·改善声音衰减；60%（4 dBA）·降低壁温(25°F至50°F冷却器）·改进的入口，入口门轻60%，比钢制设计高6“；8英寸x18英寸大视窗；新的，大的外部增压通道面板；和更大，更轻的后面板，更容易维护访问。全世界的支持有了GE燃气轮机，海军无论在岸上还是海上都有全球范围的支持，并与其他盟军船只的互操作性受益。通用电气已经为全球40个海军提供了646艘海军舰艇上的燃气轮机，并提供了美国海军舰队中95%的委托推进燃气轮机。通用电气的分体式压缩机和动力涡轮设计，允许现场维护，通常使燃气轮机拆除成为不必要；海军每年节省数百万美元和船只不可用的周/月。

中文标题: 欧洲防务局启动中型无人水面艇(MUSV)研发项目
整编内容: 11月16日，欧洲防务局（EDA）与爱沙尼亚、法国、拉脱维亚联合启动“中型半自主水面艇”项目（M-SASV），研发排水量250-500吨的中型无人水面艇，该无人水面艇将搭载模块化载荷，主要在近海执行情监侦、反潜、反舰、水雷战任务，必要时可由人工操控。M-SASV项目是EDA宣布的“永久性结构合作”（PESCO）框架内14个新的联合项目之一，这些项目涉及陆地（2个）、海上（2个）、空中（6个）、网络/C4ISR（2个）和太空（2个）五个军事领域。
整编机构: 船舶信息研究中心
源标题: european Defence Agency Launches New MUSV ProjectThe European Defence Agency (EDA) yesterday launched a new Medium Unmanned Surface Vehicle (MUSV) project with Estonia, France, Latvia. The project, dubbed M-SASV, is one of 14 new joint projects within the Permanent Structured Cooperation (PESCO) framework announced yesterday by the EDA.
原文:
Xavier Vavasseur?17 Nov 2021
Estonia, France and Latvia will develop jointly medium-size (250-500 tons) semi-autonomous vessels to perform various missions (ISR, ASuW, ASW… more details below).
The 14 projects launched in the fourth wave cover five military domains: land (2), maritime (2), air (6), cyber/C4ISR (2) and space (2). Projects range from the development of new military capabilities and the identification of future needs in areas such as air power and maritime surface escort, to enhancing the exchange of classified governmental imagery and joint training for main battle tanks. Projects to be taken forward will help increase the coherence of the European capability landscape and deliver operational benefits on the ground.
EDA Chief Executive, Ji?í ?ediv? said:
“The launch of the fourth wave of PESCO projects is an important milestone for European defence cooperation. These new 14 projects invigorate the PESCO process which along with the Coordinated Annual Review on Defence (CARD) and the European Defence Fund (EDF) are now beginning to create indispensable synergies for Member States to develop effective and cost-efficient capabilities together. I am proud of the work the PESCO Secretariat has done to bring this fourth wave to the table, in particular EDA’s contribution in carrying out the capability assessment of projects. EDA has already provided support to eight PESCO projects stands ready to support its Member States going forward.”
An existing major PESCO project in the maritime field is the EPCEuropean Patrol Corvette.
Medium size Semi-Autonomous Surface Vehicle – M-SASV
The 3-nation project, Medium size Semi-Autonomous Surface Vehicle (M-SASV) will develop a medium size (250-500 tons) semi-autonomous surface vehicle with multiple mission modules, such as Intelligence, Surveillance, Reconnaissance (ISR), Anti-submarine warfare, Anti-surface warfare (ASuW) and Naval Mine Warfare (NMW).
The M-SASV platform will be developed following a manned (when needed) and unmanned (when possible) approach, and will provide increased operational flexibility and crew protection. The design for M-SASV will focus on littoral operations, however the platform will be also deployable as part of naval task groups.
The participating three nations are: Estonia, France, Latvia. The Initial Capability Requirements have already been drafted and industry partners are working to establish a consortium.
For the record, the U.S. Navy is also actively working onMUSV and LUSV projects.
中文原文: 泽维尔·瓦瓦瑟尔？2021年11月17日爱沙尼亚、法国和拉脱维亚将联合开发中型（250-500吨）半自主船只，以执行各种任务(ISR、ASuW、ASW……更多细节如下）。第四波启动的14个项目涵盖五个军事领域：陆地(2)、海上(2)、空中(6)、网络/C4ISR(2)和空间（2）。项目范围从发展新的军事能力和确定空中力量和海上水面护航等领域的未来需求，到加强政府机密图像的交流和主战坦克的联合训练。即将推进的项目将有助于增强欧洲能力格局的一致性，并在实地提供业务效益。EDA首席执行官Ji？í?ediv？说：“第四波PESCO项目的启动是欧洲防务合作的一个重要里程碑。这14个新的项目为PESCO进程注入了活力，该进程与协调一致的年度防务审查和欧洲防务基金一道，现已开始为成员国共同发展有效和具有成本效益的能力创造不可或缺的协同作用。我对PESCO秘书处为推动第四次浪潮所做的工作感到自豪，特别是EDA在进行项目能力评估方面的贡献。EDA已经为八个PESCO项目提供了支持，随时准备支持其成员国前进。“PESCO在海事领域的一个现有的主要项目是EPCEuropean巡逻艇。中型半自主地面飞行器M-SASV中型半自主水面飞行器（M-SASV）将开发一种中型（250-500吨）半自主水面飞行器，具有多个任务模块，如情报、监视、侦察(ISR)、反潜战、反水面战(ASuW)和海军水雷战(NMW)。M-SASV平台将按照有人（必要时）和无人（可能时）的方式开发，并将提供更大的操作灵活性和船员保护。M-SASV的设计将侧重于沿海作战，但该平台也将作为海军任务组的一部分部署。参加的三个国家是：爱沙尼亚、法国、拉脱维亚。最初的能力要求已经起草，行业伙伴正在努力建立一个联盟。记录在案的是，美国海军也在MUSV和LUSV项目上积极工作。
中文源标题: 欧洲防务局(EDA)昨日与爱沙尼亚、法国和拉脱维亚启动了一项新型中型无人水面飞行器(MUSV)项目。该项目被称为M-SASV，是EDA昨天宣布的永久结构合作(PESCO)框架内14个新的联合项目之一。

中文标题: 美国发布风险管理框架旨在提高人工智能安全可信度
情报来源: 美国国家标准和技术研究院
整编内容: 近日，美国商务部国家标准与技术研究院(NIST)发布了人工智能风险管理框架(AI RMF 1.0)，这是一份供人工智能系统设计、开发、部署或使用的组织自愿使用的指导性文件，以帮助管理人工智能技术的诸多风险。该框架主要分为两部分，第一部分为讨论如何组织构建与人工智能相关的风险，并概述可信赖的人工智能系统特征。第二部分是框架的核心，描述了治理、映射、测量和管理四个功能，以帮助相关组织在实践中应对人工智能系统风险。研究人员表示，该框架可为组织提供灵活、结构化、可衡量的流程，使其能够应对人工智能风险，有望推动人工智能技术的研发实践和标准化发展，并在遵循管理人工智能风险流程基础上最大限度地发挥人工智能技术优势，同时降低对个人、团体、社区、组织和社会产生负面影响的可能性。
关键词: 人工智能风险管理框架 人工智能系统 人工智能技术
整编机构: 国家工业信息安全发展研究中心
源标题: NIST Risk Management Framework Aims to Improve Trustworthiness of Artificial Intelligence
原文:
New guidance seeks to cultivate trust in AI technologies and promote AI innovation while mitigating risk.
WASHINGTON — The U.S. Department of Commerce’s National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) has released its Artificial Intelligence Risk Management Framework (AI RMF 1.0), a guidance document for voluntary use by organizations designing, developing, deploying or using AI systems to help manage the many risks of AI technologies. 
The AI RMF follows a direction from Congress for NIST to develop the framework and was produced in close collaboration with the private and public sectors. It is intended to adapt to the AI landscape as technologies continue to develop, and to be used by organizations in varying degrees and capacities so that society can benefit from AI technologies while also being protected from its potential harms.
“This voluntary framework will help develop and deploy AI technologies in ways that enable the United States, other nations and organizations to enhance AI trustworthiness while managing risks based on our democratic values,” said Deputy Commerce Secretary Don Graves. “It should accelerate AI innovation and growth while advancing — rather than restricting or damaging — civil rights, civil liberties and equity for all.” 
Compared with traditional software, AI poses a number of different risks. AI systems are trained on data that can change over time, sometimes significantly and unexpectedly, affecting the systems in ways that can be difficult to understand. These systems are also “socio-technical” in nature, meaning they are influenced by societal dynamics and human behavior. AI risks can emerge from the complex interplay of these technical and societal factors, affecting people’s lives in situations ranging from their experiences with online chatbots to the results of job and loan applications. 
The framework equips organizations to think about AI and risk differently. It promotes a change in institutional culture, encouraging organizations to approach AI with a new perspective — including how to think about, communicate, measure and monitor AI risks and its potential positive and negative impacts. 
The AI RMF provides a flexible, structured and measurable process that will enable organizations to address AI risks. Following this process for managing AI risks can maximize the benefits of AI technologies while reducing the likelihood of negative impacts to individuals, groups, communities, organizations and society.
The framework is part of NIST’s larger effort to cultivate trust in AI technologies — necessary if the technology is to be accepted widely by society, according to Under Secretary for Standards and Technology and NIST Director Laurie E. Locascio. 
“The AI Risk Management Framework can help companies and other organizations in any sector and any size to jump-start or enhance their AI risk management approaches,” Locascio said. “It offers a new way to integrate responsible practices and actionable guidance to operationalize trustworthy and responsible AI. We expect the AI RMF to help drive development of best practices and standards.”
The AI RMF is divided into two parts. The first part discusses how organizations can frame the risks related to AI and outlines the characteristics of trustworthy AI systems. The second part, the core of the framework, describes four specific functions — govern, map, measure and manage — to help organizations address the risks of AI systems in practice. These functions can be applied in context-specific use cases and at any stages of the AI life cycle.
Working closely with the private and public sectors, NIST has been developing the AI RMF for 18 months. The document reflects about 400 sets of formal comments NIST received from more than 240 different organizations on draft versions of the framework. NIST today released statements from some of the organizations that have already committed to use or promote the framework.
The agency also today released a companion voluntary AI RMF Playbook, which suggests ways to navigate and use the framework. 
NIST plans to work with the AI community to update the framework periodically and welcomes suggestions for additions and improvements to the playbook at any time. Comments received by the end of February 2023 will be included in an updated version of the playbook to be released in spring 2023.
In addition, NIST plans to launch a Trustworthy and Responsible AI Resource Center to help organizations put the AI RMF 1.0 into practice. The agency encourages organizations to develop and share profiles of how they would put it to use in their specific contexts. Submissions may be sent to AIFramework@nist.gov.
NIST is committed to continuing its work with companies, civil society, government agencies, universities and others to develop additional guidance. The agency today issued a roadmap for that work.
The framework is part of NIST’s broad and growing portfolio of AI-related work that includes fundamental and applied research along with a focus on measurement and evaluation, technical standards, and contributions to AI policy.
中文原文: 新的指导方针寻求培养对人工智能技术的信任，促进人工智能创新，同时降低风险。华盛顿--美国商务部国家标准和技术研究所(NIST)发布了人工智能风险管理框架（AI RMF 1.0)，这是一份指导文件，供设计、开发、部署或使用人工智能系统的组织自愿使用，以帮助管理人工智能技术的许多风险。AI RMF遵循国会对NIST制定框架的指示，是与私营和公共部门密切合作制定的。它的目的是随着技术的不断发展，适应人工智能的景观，并被组织以不同的程度和能力使用，以便社会能够从人工智能技术中受益，同时也免受其潜在的危害。商务部副部长唐·格雷夫斯（Don Graves）表示：“这一自愿框架将有助于开发和部署人工智能技术，使美国、其他国家和组织能够提高人工智能的可信度，同时基于我们的民主价值观管理风险。”“它应该加快人工智能创新和增长，同时推进--而不是限制或损害--所有人的公民权利、公民自由和公平。”与传统软件相比，AI带来了许多不同的风险。人工智能系统是根据数据进行训练的，这些数据可能会随着时间的推移而变化，有时会显著地和意外地变化，以难以理解的方式影响系统。这些系统在本质上也是“社会技术”的，这意味着它们受到社会动态和人类行为的影响。人工智能风险可能来自这些技术和社会因素的复杂相互作用，影响人们的生活，从他们使用在线聊天机器人的经历到工作和贷款申请的结果。该框架使组织能够以不同的方式思考AI和风险。它促进了机构文化的变革，鼓励组织以新的视角对待人工智能--包括如何思考、交流、衡量和监测人工智能风险及其潜在的积极和消极影响。AI RMF提供了一个灵活的、结构化的和可测量的过程，使组织能够解决AI风险。遵循这一过程来管理人工智能风险，可以最大限度地发挥人工智能技术的好处，同时减少对个人、团体、社区、组织和社会产生负面影响的可能性。该框架是NIST培养对人工智能技术信任的更大努力的一部分--如果该技术要被社会广泛接受，这是必要的，根据标准和技术副部长兼NIST主任劳里·E·洛卡西奥的说法。Locascio说：“人工智能风险管理框架可以帮助任何行业和任何规模的公司和其他组织启动或加强他们的人工智能风险管理方法。”“它提供了一种新的方式来整合负责任的实践和可操作的指导，以操作可信和负责任的人工智能。我们期望人工智能RMF有助于推动最佳实践和标准的发展。“人工智能RMF分为两个部分。第一部分讨论了组织如何构建与人工智能相关的风险，并概述了值得信赖的人工智能系统的特征。第二部分是框架的核心，描述了治理、地图、度量和管理四个具体功能，以帮助组织解决人工智能系统在实践中的风险。这些功能可以应用在特定于上下文的用例中，也可以应用在AI生命周期的任何阶段。NIST与私营和公共部门密切合作，已经开发AI RMF 18个月了。该文件反映了NIST从240多个不同组织收到的关于框架草案版本的大约400组正式评论。NIST今天发布了一些已经承诺使用或推广该框架的组织的声明。该机构今天还发布了一个自愿的AI RMF剧本，它建议了导航和使用该框架的方法。NIST计划与人工智能社区合作，定期更新该框架，并欢迎随时为playbook的添加和改进提出建议。2023年2月底前收到的评论将包括在2023年春季发布的更新版本中。此外，NIST计划推出一个值得信赖和负责任的AI资源中心，以帮助组织将AI RMF1.0付诸实践。工程处鼓励各组织制定和分享如何在其具体情况下使用该系统的简介。提交的材料可以发送到AIFramework@nist.gov。NIST致力于继续与公司、民间社会、政府机构、大学和其他方面合作，以制定更多的指导方针。该机构今天发布了这项工作的路线图。该框架是NIST广泛且不断增长的人工智能相关工作组合的一部分，其中包括funda

中文标题: 美国特种作战司令部计划采购下一批巡飞弹
整编内容: 美国特种作战司令部（SOCOM）2月6日发布“陆射有机巡飞弹-Ⅱ”（GOLAM-II）项目招标书，旨在快速采办一型无需进一步开发就可部署的巡飞弹，要求竞标方案的技术准备等级为7，这意味着模型或原型已经在战场环境中得到验证。该巡飞弹预期射程在20-120公里，续航时间为1-2小时，战斗部最小重量为2.27千克，最小净重为10.89千克。此外，该项目解决方案将为特种作战部队提供精确打击能力，以应对包括反介入/区域拒止（A2/AD）在内的所有环境中的多种目标。
整编机构: 北京海鹰科技情报研究所
源标题: SOCOM Shops For Next Wave Of Loitering Munitions
原文:
U.S. Special Operations Command (SOCOM) has consolidated acquisition of ground-launched loitering munitions into a single program with rapid acquisition authority and released the first solicitation with an 18-day deadline. 
Proposals for the Ground Organic Loitering Aerial Munition-Echelon II (GOLAM-II) are due Feb. 24, with any industry questions for SOCOM acquisition officials allowed until Feb. 17. 
SOCOM only wants proposals for loitering munitions that can become operational without further development. The requirement for technology readiness is level 7, which means a model or prototype has already been demonstrated in a field environment.
A list of desired performance requirements for GOLAM-II released on Feb. 6 does not appear to be advancing the state of the art in the loitering munition field.
The desired range must be 20-120 km (12-75 mi.) with endurance of 1-2 hr. The warhead should weigh at least 5 lb. with a minimum net explosive weight of 24 lb. Loitering munitions that must be operated by two people meet the requirement, but SOCOM may prefer a single-operator system. 
The loitering munition must be able to be precise and address a spectrum of targets. In addition to a threshold requirement for an explosive warhead, SOCOM set an objective standard for other warhead variants capable of armor penetration and non-lethal effects, such as jamming, electromagnetic pulse and a concussive blast.
The standards for GOLAM-II may qualify a broad range of U.S.-based, existing systems, such as the AeroVironment Switchblade, Raytheon Coyote and possibly the secretive Aevex Phoenix Ghost, which has been sent to Ukraine. 
Other U.S. companies have unveiled their own large loitering munitions, but their developmental status is not clear. These include the Northrop Grumman Jackal and Area-I Altitus 600M and 700M.
The GOLAM-II solicitation does not appear to prohibit bids based on foreign technology, but SOCOM’s call for only International Traffic in Arms Regulation-compliant proposals means any involvement by foreign nationals must be disclosed. 
The policy could open the door to proposals by Israeli firms, which pioneered the loitering munition concept. Current options include the Vision Hero loitering munition series and Elbit Systems SkyStriker.
中文原文: 美国特种作战司令部(SOCOM)已将地面发射游荡弹药的采购合并为一个具有快速采购权限的单一项目，并发布了第一次招标，期限为18天。地面有机游荡空中弹药第二梯队（GOLAM-II）的提案将于2月24日提交，对SOCOM采购官员的任何行业问题都允许在2月17日之前提出。SOCOM只想要关于游荡弹药的建议，这些弹药可以在没有进一步发展的情况下投入使用。技术准备度的要求是7级，这意味着模型或原型已经在现场环境中演示过。2月6日发布的GOLAM-II预期性能要求清单似乎没有推进游荡弹药领域的最新技术。所需射程为20-120公里（12-75英里），耐力为1-2小时。弹头重量至少为5磅。最小净炸药重量为24磅。必须由两人操作的游荡弹药符合要求，但SOCOM可能更喜欢单操作系统。游荡弹药必须能够精确地瞄准一系列目标。除了对爆炸性弹头的阈值要求外，军事和技术委员会还为能够穿透装甲和产生非致命效应的其他弹头变体，如干扰、电磁脉冲和冲击爆炸，规定了客观标准。GOLAM-II的标准可能符合广泛的美国现有系统，如AeroVironment弹簧刀、雷神郊狼，可能还有秘密的Aevex凤凰幽灵，该系统已经被送往乌克兰。其他美国公司公布了他们自己的大型游荡弹药，但他们的发展状况尚不清楚。其中包括诺斯罗普·格鲁曼豺狼和第一区阿尔泰特斯600米和700米。GOLAM-II招标似乎没有禁止基于外国技术的投标，但SOCOM呼吁只在国际上贩运符合监管的武器提案，这意味着外国国民的任何参与都必须披露。这项政策可能为以色列公司的提议打开大门，这些公司开创了游荡弹药的概念。目前的选项包括视觉英雄游荡弹药系列和埃尔比特系统天空前锋。

中文标题: 沙特将在本土组装MAXXPRO防地雷反伏击车
整编内容:
沙特ERAF公司和美国航星防务公司在3月8日于利雅得举行的2022年世界防务展期间签署了一项协议，在沙特阿拉伯的一家新工厂组装MAXXPRO防地雷反伏击车，旨在为沙特武装部队提供最新一代的防地雷反伏击车辆，这些车辆已经在伊拉克和阿富汗的冲突中展示了其防护性和机动能力。
MAXXPRO防地雷反伏击车基于航星防务公司的7000型4×4卡车底盘，采用V形车体乘员舱设计，可使地雷或简易爆炸装置向上的爆炸偏离，提高车辆和乘员的生存能力。同时，车辆倾斜的装甲面也能有效抵御爆炸威胁。有了这样的设计，MAXXPRO防地雷反伏击车能够在车轮和车体下方承受7千克地雷的爆炸能量。
MAXXPRO防地雷反伏击车由前至后分别是发动机舱、乘员舱和战斗班组舱。乘员舱包括驾驶员和指挥官。车辆前部车体的每一侧都装有一个门，后部装有液压坡道，供士兵快速进出车辆。该车采用MaxxForce D系列D8.7L16型六缸四冲程涡轮增压中冷直喷发动机和阿里逊3000全自动变速箱，共有五个前进档和一个倒档，最高时速105千米，最大续航里程600千米。
整编机构: 北方科技信息研究所
源标题: WDS 2022: ERAF and Navistar sign an agreement to assemble MAXXPRO MRAPs in Saudi Arabia
原文:
World Defense Show 2022 Saudi Arabia Show Daily News
POSTED ONWEDNESDAY, 09 MARCH 2022 08:40
Saudi company ERAF and American company NAVISTAR have signed an agreement on Tuesday, March 8, 2022, during the World Defense Show 2022 that takes place in Riyadh to assemble the MAXXPRO MRAP (Mine Resistant Ambush Protected Vehicle) in a new facility in Saudi Arabia.
On its booth, ERAF from Saudi Arabia displays the MAXXPRO MRAP Mine Resistant Armored Protected vehicle at World Defense Show 2022. (Picture source Army Recognition)
With this new agreement, NAVISTAR from the United States and ERAF from Saudi Arabia would like to provide the latest generation of MRAP vehicles to the armed forces of Saudi Arabia which have already demonstrated its protection and mobility capabilities during the conflicts in Iraq and Afghanistan.
Saudi company ERAF was established in 1996 as a manufacturing services provider attending to the needs of the military, commercial and industrial sectors. Currently, ERAF can develop and supply a broad portfolio of land, naval and power systems, defense products, security and commercial applications. ERAF systems and products are installed on new and old platforms, and the Saudi company also performs comprehensive platform modernization and upgrade programs.
Navistar Defense is an American company that produces wheeled combat armored vehicles and military trucks including the MAXXPRO family of MRAP (Mine Resistant Ambush Protected) vehicles. The MAXXPRO MRAP is one of the most protected vehicles in the world and the vehicle was designed to offer a high level of protection against mine and IED (Improvised Explosive Device).
The MaxxPro vehicle is based on the Navistar International model 7000 4x4 truck chassis and incorporates the design of a crew capsule with a V-shaped hull to increase vehicle and crew survivability by deflecting an upward directed blast from a landmine or Improvised Explosive Device away from the vehicle, while also presenting a sloped armor face. With such design, the MAXXPRO is able to withstand a 7 kg land mine blast under the wheeled and body of the vehicle without any injuries.
The MAXXPRO is designed with three main parts with the engine compartment at the front, the crew in the middle including the driver and commander, and the troop's compartment at the rear. The front of the vehicle is fitted with a single door on each side of the hull while the rear part is equipped with a hydraulic ramp offering the soldier to quickly enter and leave the vehicle.
The International Maxxpro 4x4 MRAP is powered by the MaxxForce D family engine model D8.7L16, Turbo inter-cooled, direct electronic injection, and four-stroke. MaxxForce six-cylinder direct-injection turbocharged diesel D8.7L16 is coupled to a fully automatic power shift gearbox Allison 3000 with a total of five speeds forward and one in reverse. It can run at a maximum speed of 105 km/h with a maximum cruising range of 600 km.
中文原文: 世界防务展2022沙特阿拉伯展每日新闻发布于2022年03月09日星期三08:40沙特公司ERAF和美国公司NAVISTAR于2022年3月8日星期二在利雅得举行的2022年世界国防展期间签署了一项协议，在沙特阿拉伯的一个新设施中组装MAXXPRO MRAP（防雷伏击防护车辆）。来自沙特阿拉伯的ERAF在2022年世界国防展上展示了MAXXPRO MRAP防雷装甲防护车。（图片来源陆军识别）根据这一新协议，美国的NAVISTAR和沙特阿拉伯的ERAF将向沙特阿拉伯武装部队提供最新一代的MRAP车辆，沙特阿拉伯武装部队在伊拉克和阿富汗冲突期间已经展示了其保护和机动能力。沙特ERAF公司成立于1996年，是一家满足军事、商业和工业部门需求的制造服务提供商。目前，ERAF可以开发和供应广泛的陆、海军和电力系统、国防产品、安全和商业应用。ERAF系统和产品安装在新旧平台上，沙特公司还执行全面的平台现代化和升级方案。Navistar Defense是一家美国公司，生产轮式战斗装甲车和军用卡车，包括MAXXPRO系列MRAP（防雷伏击防护）车辆。MAXXPRO MRAP是世界上最受保护的车辆之一，该车辆旨在提供高度的地雷和简易爆炸装置防护。MaxxPro车辆基于Navistar International model 7000 4x4卡车底盘，并结合了带有V形船体的乘员舱设计，通过将地雷或简易爆炸装置的向上定向爆炸偏离车辆，增加车辆和乘员的生存能力，同时还提供了倾斜的装甲面。通过这样的设计，MAXXPRO能够承受7公斤的地雷爆炸下的车轮和车辆的身体没有任何伤害。MAXXPRO设计有三个主要部分，发动机舱在前面，机组人员在中间，包括司机和指挥官，部队舱在后面。车辆的前部在船体的每一侧安装了一扇门，而后部安装了一个液压坡道，供士兵快速进出车辆。国际Maxxpro 4x4 MRAP由MaxxForce D系列发动机型号D8.7L16、涡轮中冷、直接电喷和四冲程提供动力。MaxxForce六缸直喷涡轮增压柴油D8.7L16与全自动动力换挡变速箱Allison 3000耦合，共有五个前进速度和一个倒车速度。最大速度可达105公里/小时，最大续航里程可达600公里。

中文标题: 意大利与美国合作开发基于“湾流”G550飞机的C4ISTAR平台
情报来源: 英国《简氏防务周刊》网站
整编内容: 意大利国防部在2021~2023年的多年规划文件（DPP）中透露，将和美国合作改装“湾流”G550多任务飞机，用于早期预警和控制/电子攻击(CAEW/EA)任务。该项目总价值21.5亿欧元，分两个阶段进行。第一阶段将在2021至2032年间进行一系列基于“湾流”G550的指挥、控制、通信、计算机、情报、监视、跟踪、侦察(C4ISTAR)解决方案的开发，费用为12.23亿欧元，包括保障支持和相关基础设施。该项目涉及一个多任务系统，基于配备现代化传感器的“湾流”G550，用于战略信息收集和电子战，适合集成到C4ISTAR的网络中心架构中，以实现实时信息共享。（航空工业信息中心 羽禾 供稿 陈珊珊 审核）
整编机构: 航空工业信息中心
源标题: Italy confirms plans to develop G550-based C4ISTAR aircraft in co-operation with the US
原文:
August 6, 2021 
Italy has confirmed plans to acquire new Gulfstream G550-based multimission aircraft that will be later modified for conformal airborne early warning and control/electronic attack (CAEW/EA) roles via a deal with the United States, the Ministry of Defence (MoD) revealed in the country's latest multi-year planning document (Documento Programmatico Pluriennale: DPP) for 2021–23.
The DPP, released on 5 August, provides new details on plans initially announced in October 2020 for the Italian Air Force's (Aeronautica Militare Italiana: AMI's) C4ISTAR aircraft acquisition programme that is now budgeted for a total of EUR2.15 billion (USD2.5 billion) over two separate phases.
The first phase, which has been approved by ministerial decree in February 2021, will see the development of the G550-based C4ISTAR solution over a series of tranches from 2021 through to 2032 for an estimated programme value of about EUR1.223 billion to include operational support and related infrastructure.
“The programme relates to a multimission system, based on the Gulfstream G550 aerial platform equipped with modern sensors for strategic information collection and electronic superiority, suitable for integration into a net-centric architecture of C4ISTAR for real-time sharing of information, able to operate both in an autonomous context [and as part] of a complex inter-force structure,” the DPP noted.
中文原文: 2021年8月6日意大利国防部（MoD）在该国2021-23年最新的多年规划文件（Documento Programmatico Pluriennale：DPP）中透露，意大利已确认计划购买新的湾流G550多导飞机，这些飞机将通过与美国的一项协议，稍后将被修改为适形机载预警和控制/电子攻击（CAEW/EA）角色。8月5日发布的DPP提供了2020年10月最初宣布的意大利空军C4ISTAR飞机采购计划的新细节，该计划目前在两个独立阶段的预算总额为21.5亿欧元（25亿美元）。第一阶段已于2021年2月获得部长令批准，将从2021年至2032年分一系列阶段开发基于G550的C4ISTAR解决方案，预计方案价值约为12.23亿欧元，包括运营支持和相关基础设施。DPP指出：“该计划涉及一个多导系统，基于湾流G550空中平台，配备了用于战略信息收集和电子优势的现代传感器，适合集成到以网络为中心的C4ISTAR体系结构中，用于实时共享信息，能够在自主背景下（和作为复杂的部队间结构的一部分）运行。”
