中文标题: 美国空军向工业界寻求高功率电磁脉冲武器使能技术
整编内容:
美国空军高功率电磁脉冲武器研究人员要求工业界开发新的武器概念、材料、部件和紧凑型电源组件。
位于北卡罗来纳州柯特兰空军基地的空军研究实验室定西能局官员上周五发布了一项针对先进电磁技术项目的机构公告，表示项目正在寻求评估和利用主要电源技术的进步，从而优化未来高功率电磁脉冲武器系统的尺寸、重量和功率。
为期五年的先进电磁技术项目正在围绕六项支撑技术展开：重复脉冲功率：带电粒子束相互作用、紧凑型低功耗大功率材料和等离子技术、高功率电磁脉冲基础研究，以及固态高功率电磁脉冲。
整编机构: 北京航天情报与信息研究所
源标题: Air Force approaches industry for enabling technologies in high-power electromagnetic and microwave weapons
原文:
KIRTLAND AIR FORCE BASE, N.M. - U.S. Air Force high-power electromagnetic (HPEM) weapons researchers are asking industry to develop new HPEM weapons concepts, materials, components, and compact power topologies for future military programs.
Officials of the Air Force Research Laboratory Directed Energy Directorate at Kirtland Air Force Base, N.M., issued a broad agency announcement on Friday for the Advanced Electromagnetic Technology (AET) project.
This project also seeks to evaluate and capitalize on advances in prime power technologies to optimize size, weight, and power (SWaP) requirements for future HPEM weapon systems.
The five-year AET project revolves around six enabling technologies: repetitive pulsed power; charged particle beam interactions; compact low-duty-factor prime power HPEM material and plasma technology; HPEM fundamental research; and solid-state-HPEM.
Related: Air Force seeks to apply high-power electromagnetic technologies to EW and cyber warfare
Repetitive pulsed power seeks to advance compact pulsed-power technologies that enable compact, pulsed power systems suitable to drive high-power electromagnetic sources.
These enabling technologies include Marx banks, pulsed forming networks, pulse forming lines, linear transformer drivers, hybrid pulsed power topologies, nonlinear transmission lines, solid state switches, gas switches, capacitors, transformers, insulating dielectrics, varactors, resistors, magnetic and dielectric conducting and structural materials.
This research for high-power microwave weapons and similar systems also will develop prime power sources and strategies for compact energy storage, charging, discharging, and power conditioning of pulsed power systems for manned and unmanned aircraft. The research will include computer analysis and modeling of pulsed and prime power systems and components to predict and evaluate performance, operational suitability, and lifetime.
Charged particle beam interactions involves enabling technologies for high-energy particle beam weapons that can disable or destroy enemy electronic components and systems. This research effort can be divided into two components: the first component focuses on understanding and characterizing the effects that high energy particle beams can have on electronic systems, and the second component entails designing and building an accelerator with which to perform effects tests.
Related: Air Force asks industry for laser weapons and high-power microwaves to defend against cruise missiles
Compact low-duty-factor prime power seeks to develop compact prime power technologies for intermittent, high-power, pulsed operation, and high efficiency to function as compact energy storage and power conditioning sources for directed-energy systems like high-power microwave weapons and laser weapons.
HPEM material and plasma science and technology seeks to understand how millimeter wave radiation interacts with high-temperature materials to develop materials for power beaming applications.
HPEM fundamental research will work on the interactions of materials for next-generation high-power microwave weapons, including modeling, and testing of materials heated using high-power microwave or millimeter-wave radiation.
Solid-state HPEM seeks to develop nonlinear-transmission-line or other solid-state high power electromagnetic weapon concepts for future aircraft weapons. The effort will look into ruggedization, lifetime tests on system components, pulsed power, prime power sources, and antennas.
中文原文: 新墨西哥州柯特兰空军基地--美国空军高功率电磁武器研究人员要求工业界为未来的军事项目开发新的高功率电磁武器概念、材料、组件和紧凑的功率拓扑。位于新墨西哥州柯特兰空军基地的空军研究实验室定向能局官员周五发布了一项高级电磁技术(AET)项目的广泛机构公告。该项目还寻求评估和利用主要动力技术的进步，以优化未来HPEM武器系统的尺寸、重量和功率（交换）要求。为期五年的AET项目围绕六项使能技术展开：重复脉冲功率；带电粒子束相互作用；紧凑型低占空比原功率HPEM材料及等离子体技术；HPEM基础研究；和固态-HPEM。相关：空军寻求将大功率电磁技术应用于电子战和网络战重复脉冲电源寻求发展紧凑的脉冲电源技术，使紧凑的脉冲电源系统适合驱动高功率电磁源。这些使能技术包括Marx banks、脉冲成形网络、脉冲成形线、线性变压器驱动器、混合脉冲功率拓扑、非线性传输线、固态开关、气体开关、电容器、变压器、绝缘介质、变容管、电阻器、磁性和电介质导电和结构材料。对高功率微波武器和类似系统的研究也将为载人和无人驾驶飞机脉冲电源系统的紧凑储能、充电、放电和功率调节开发主要电源和策略。这项研究将包括对脉冲和原始电力系统和部件的计算机分析和建模，以预测和评估性能、操作适用性和寿命。带电粒子束相互作用涉及高能粒子束武器的使能技术，这些武器可以禁用或摧毁敌人的电子部件和系统。这项研究工作可以分为两个部分：第一部分侧重于理解和描述高能粒子束对电子系统的影响，第二部分需要设计和建造一个加速器来进行影响测试。相关：空军向工业界提出激光武器和高功率微波防御巡航导弹的要求紧凑型低占空比原动力技术旨在发展间歇、大功率、脉冲和高效率的紧凑型原动力技术，作为高功率微波武器和激光武器等定向能系统的紧凑型储能和功率调节源。HPEM材料和等离子体科学与技术寻求了解毫米波辐射如何与高温材料相互作用，以开发用于功率波束应用的材料。HPEM的基础研究将致力于下一代高功率微波武器的材料相互作用，包括建模和测试使用高功率微波或毫米波辐射加热的材料。固态HPEM寻求为未来飞机武器开发非线性传输线或其他固态大功率电磁武器概念。这项工作将研究加固、系统部件寿命测试、脉冲电源、原始电源和天线。

中文标题: 日本开发可自修复的超高分子量聚合物凝胶
情报来源: 美国物理学家组织网站
整编内容: 由日本国立材料科学研究所、北海道大学和山口大学组成的研究小组开发出一种基于超高分子量（UHMW）聚合物制造可拉伸和自修复聚合物凝胶的物理方法。研究人员通过简单的一步法制备了仅由UHMW聚合物的物理缠结形成的高度可拉伸和自修复的聚合物凝胶，并表现出高拉伸性、高离子电导率和可回收性等优异性能。此外，UHMW凝胶在没有任何外部刺激的情况下表现出室温自愈能力。拉伸实验和分子动力学模拟显示，断裂表面的非平衡态以及聚合物链与溶剂之间的微观相互作用对聚合物的自愈能力起着至关重要的作用。该材料符合循环经济要求，有望用作柔性物联网（IoT）设备的耐用离子导电材料。研究发表在《科学进展》（Science Advances）杂志上。
整编机构: 中国航发航材院
源标题: Development of an easy-to-synthesize self-healing gel composed of entangled ultrahigh molecular weight polymers
原文:
A research team consisting of the National Institute for Materials Science (NIMS), Hokkaido University and Yamaguchi University has developed a method for easily synthesizing a self-healing polymer gel made of ultrahigh molecular weight (UHMW) polymers (polymers with a molecular weight greater than 106 g/mol) and non-volatile ionic liquids. This recyclable and self-healable polymer gel is compatible with circular economy principles. In addition, it may potentially be used as a durable, ionically conductive material for flexible Internet of Things (IoT) devices. The team's work was published in Science Advances.
Self-healing polymeric materials are capable of spontaneously repairing damaged areas, thereby increasing their material lifetimes and making them feasible for promoting a circular economy. Most reported self-healing polymeric materials in recent years has taken a chemical approach, in which functional groups capable of reversible dissociation and reformation (e.g., hydrogen bonding) were integrated into polymeric networks. However, this approach often requires precise synthetic techniques and complex manufacturing processes. On the other hand, an alternative physical approach (i.e., the use of physical entanglement of polymer chains) to synthesizing versatile polymeric materials with self-healing capabilities has rarely been explored.
This research team recently developed a technique for easily synthesizing UHMW gels composed of entangled UHMW polymers using ionic liquids. The mechanical properties of UHMW gels were found to be superior to those of conventional, chemically crosslinked gels. In addition, they can be recycled via thermal processing, and exhibit high self-healing capabilities at room temperature.
The use of the newly developed recyclable, self-healing, easy-to-synthesize UHMW gel material is expected to promote a circular economy. In addition, because this material is synthesized using non-volatile, flammable ionic liquids, it may be used as a safe, ionically conductive soft material in flexible electronics.
中文原文: 由国立材料科学研究所(NIMS)、北海道大学和山口大学组成的研究小组开发了一种容易合成由超高分子量(UHMW)聚合物（分子量大于106克/摩尔的聚合物）和非挥发性离子液体制成的自愈合聚合物凝胶的方法。这种可回收、自愈合的聚合物凝胶符合循环经济原则。此外，它可能被潜在地用作柔性物联网（IoT）设备的耐用、电导材料。该小组的研究成果发表在《科学进展》上。自修复聚合物材料能够自发地修复受损区域，从而延长材料寿命，使其成为促进循环经济的可行之物。近年来报道的自愈合聚合物材料大多采用化学方法，将能够可逆解离和重整（如氢键）的官能团整合到聚合物网络中。然而，这种方法往往需要精确的合成技术和复杂的制造过程。另一方面，一种替代的物理方法（即利用聚合物链的物理缠结）来合成具有自愈合能力的多功能聚合物材料很少被探索。该研究小组最近开发了一种利用离子液体轻松合成由缠结的超高分子量聚合物组成的超高分子量凝胶的技术。UHMW凝胶的力学性能优于传统的化学交联凝胶。此外，它们可以通过热加工回收，并在室温下显示出高度的自修复能力。新开发的可回收、自修复、易合成的超高分子量凝胶材料的使用有望促进循环经济。此外，由于这种材料是使用非挥发性、易燃的离子液体合成的，因此它可以作为一种安全的、导电的软材料应用于柔性电子学中。
中文源标题: 一种易合成的由缠结超高分子量聚合物组成的自愈凝胶的研制

中文标题: 英国开发寸提高太阳能电池发电效率的新方法
整编内容: 近日，英国萨里大学研究人员发现在制造阶段对钙钛矿太阳能电池进行简单的调整就可以提高其发电效率。钙钛矿太阳能电池被认为是硅基太阳能器件的天然替代方案，因为它们具有高能量转换效率、低开发成本和轻质量等优良特征。研究人员使用两种有机铵盐在无需热退火的情况下恢复了与富勒烯电子传递层接触的整齐钙钛矿薄膜的光致发光量子产率。研究人员证明了卤化物钙钛矿表面的成功操纵是通过调制剂和钙钛矿间的相互作用实现的，此外他们还证明了强相互作用表面调制有利于减少倒置钙钛矿太阳能电池的界面复合损失，且与羟基功能化的苯乙基胺相比，硫乙基胺更有利于钙钛矿表面形成准二维结构。该研究成功将钙钛矿太阳能电池的功率转换效率提高到了21.9%，成果将有望应用于提高太空探测器的发电效率。
关键词: 太阳能电池 钙钛矿 富勒烯 功率转换效率
整编机构: 国家工业信息安全发展研究中心
源标题: Simple semiconductor solutions could boost solar energy generation and enable better space probes
原文:
A "simple" tweak to perovskite solar cells during the fabrication stage could help to unlock the untold potential of the renewable energy source, claims research from the University of Surrey.
Surrey's Advanced Technology Institute (ATI) has demonstrated that by precisely controlling the fabrication process, it is possible to regulate and reduce unwanted energy loss in perovskite solar panels.
Dr. Bowei Li, a lead researcher of the program at the Advanced Technology Institute, University of Surrey, said:
"The future of perovskite solar panels is incredibly exciting, with the promise of not only improving the performance of solar farms and roof panels but many opportunities in powering spacecraft and interstellar probes."
"We hope the relatively straightforward approach demonstrated in our study, which tackles recombination losses, can improve the reproducibility, efficiency and stability of perovskite solar cells."
Perovskite solar cells are widely considered the natural successor to silicon-based solar devices because of their high energy conversion efficiency, low development cost, and lightweight nature. Named after a naturally occurring mineral with a structurally similar chemical formula, perovskites are synthetic composites with three-dimensional lattice crystal structures.
The University of Surrey's Advanced Technology Institute is a global leader in research into perovskite solar cells and their contribution to boosting global clean energy generation.
Dr. Wei Zhang, the primary supervisor of the research from the University of Surrey, said, "Perovskites are wonderful semiconductor materials enabling the revolution of next-generation photovoltaic technologies. However, despite unprecedented success in many emerging applications, their full potential has yet to be unlocked."
"Our work will foster the understanding of the complex interplay between the passivators and perovskites at the material interfaces and take the perovskite photovoltaics to new heights."
Professor Ravi Silva, the co-supervisor of the research program and Director of the ATI at the University of Surrey, said, "Net-Zero is impossible if solar energy isn't a crucial component of the mix. Solar energy is currently the leading technology for large-scale inexpensive green energy harvesting worldwide."
"The ATI, and indeed the University of Surrey, is dedicated to making sure that this perovskite technology complements conventional solar modules and is central to the sustainability requirements for tomorrow's world."
The research has been published by Advanced Energy Materials.
中文原文: 萨里大学的研究称，在制造阶段对钙钛矿太阳能电池进行“简单”的调整可能有助于释放可再生能源的无限潜力。萨里的先进技术研究所(ATI)已经证明，通过精确控制制造过程，有可能调节和减少钙钛矿太阳能电池板中不必要的能量损失。萨里大学先进技术研究所该项目的首席研究员李博伟博士说：“钙钛矿太阳能电池板的未来令人难以置信地兴奋，不仅有望提高太阳能农场和屋顶电池板的性能，还有望为航天器和星际探测器提供动力。”“我们希望我们研究中展示的解决重组损失的相对简单的方法能够提高钙钛矿太阳能电池的重复性、效率和稳定性。”钙钛矿太阳能电池具有能量转换效率高、开发成本低、重量轻等优点，被广泛认为是硅基太阳能器件的天然替代品。钙钛矿是一种天然矿物，具有类似的化学式，是一种具有三维晶格晶体结构的合成复合材料。萨里大学先进技术研究所是钙钛矿太阳能电池及其对促进全球清洁能源发电的贡献研究的全球领导者。萨里大学的首席主管张威博士说：“钙钛矿是推动下一代光伏技术革命的奇妙半导体材料。然而，尽管在许多新兴应用中取得了前所未有的成功，但它们的全部潜力尚未释放。”“我们的工作将促进对钝化剂和钙钛矿在材料界面上复杂相互作用的理解，并将钙钛矿光伏带到新的高度。”该研究项目的联合主管、萨里大学ATI主任拉维·席尔瓦教授说：“如果太阳能不是混合的关键组成部分，净零是不可能的。太阳能目前是全球大规模廉价绿色能源收集的领先技术。”“ATI和萨里大学致力于确保这种钙钛矿技术补充传统的太阳能组件，并对未来世界的可持续发展要求至关重要。”这项研究已经发表在《先进能源材料》杂志上。
中文源标题: 简单的半导体解决方案可以促进太阳能发电，并实现更好的空间探测器

中文标题: 俄罗斯成功测试再生混合物（REMIX）燃料
整编内容: 俄罗斯新设计的再生混合物（REMIX）燃料成功通过了为期5年的测试，并准备进行试点使用。2016年，含有5根REMIX燃料棒的燃料组件装入巴拉科沃核电厂VVER-1000反应堆中。在此次测试中，燃料组件的性能完全正常。REMIX燃料由后处理产生的铀钚混合物加上低浓铀制成，具有与天然铀燃料相同的特性，这也意味着反应堆不需要改造即可应用REMIX燃料。俄罗斯REMIX燃料旨在节约铀原料并在轻水堆中实现闭式燃料循环。从理论上讲，在反应堆60年的设计运行寿命中，只需循环装载三次REMIX燃料。俄罗斯于2020年批准投资建立完整的REMIX燃料生产线。铀钚燃料芯块将在矿业与化学联合体（MCC）生产，REMIX燃料组件将在西伯利亚化学联合体（SCC）制造。
整编机构: 中核战略规划研究总院
源标题: Successful test of recycled fuel
原文:
World Nuclear News, 17 September 2021
Workers with a fresh VVER-1000 fuel assembly (Image: TVEL)
Recycled REMIX nuclear fuel has passed a five-year operational test in Russia and is ready for pilot operation, Rosatom fuel subsidiary TVEL has said. REMIX is designed to reduce uranium consumption and close the fuel cycle using mainstream light-water reactors.
TheIn mid-2016, three VVER-1000 fuel assemblies made specially with five REMIX rods among their 300 normal rods were loaded into the third reactor at the Balakovo nuclear power plant. Today, Rosatom announced that the trial was successful. "During all five years of testing, our specialists monitored the neutronic and life characteristics of experimental fuel assemblies. There were no deviations from normal operation, which confirms the design properties of the new nuclear fuel," said Yury Ryzhkov, deputy chief engineer for safety and reliability at Balakovo.
The trial fuel assemblies will be examined in more detail at the Research Institute of Atomic Reactors in Dimitrovgrad in around 2023 after they have cooled and the highest levels of radioactivity have subsided.
In the meantime, TVEL's vice president for science and technology Alexander Ugryumov said, "We expect the next step ... should be pilot operation of several fuel assemblies with all REMIX fuel rods." No schedule or specific reactor was mentioned for this next stage of development.
REMIX (from Regenerated Mixture) fuel is made from uranium and plutonium recovered as an unseparated mixture from previously used fuel. They are topped up with low-enriched uranium to give a fuel that performs within the same parameters as normal fuel made only from fresh low-enriched uranium. This means a reactor would not need any modification to start using REMIX.
The cycle of reprocessing, recycling and top-up can be repeated as many as five times, with waste fission products removed each time and vitrified in glass ready for permanent geological disposal. In theory, a new reactor could operate for its whole design life of 60 years on just three REMIX fuel loads, circulating them continuously.
In August last year, Rosatom approved investment to set up a full manufacturing line for REMIX fuel. The uranium-plutonium fuel pellets will be made at the Mining and Chemical Combine in Zheleznogorsk, in the Krasnoyarsk region, where there is already a large storage facility for VVER-1000 fuel. The pellets will be manufactured into finished fuel assemblies at the Siberian Chemical Combine in Seversk in the Tomsk region of Russia.
So far, the REMIX project is focused on creating a new fuel strategy for VVER-1000 reactors. The country also builds and operates newer VVER-1200 units at home and abroad, as well as older RBMK models.
中文原文: 《世界核报》，2021年9月17日工人们拿着新鲜的VVER-1000燃料组件（图片：TVEL）Rosatom燃料子公司TVEL表示，回收的混和核燃料已经在俄罗斯通过了为期五年的运行测试，并准备进行试点运行。REMIX的设计目的是减少铀的消耗，并关闭使用主流轻水反应堆的燃料循环。2016年年中，三个VVER-1000燃料组件被装载到巴拉科沃核电站的第三个反应堆中，这些燃料组件在300个普通棒中专门使用了五个混合棒。今天，Rosatom宣布试验成功。“在所有五年的测试中，我们的专家监测了实验燃料组件的中子和寿命特性。巴拉科沃负责安全和可靠性的副总工程师尤里·雷日科夫（Yury Ryzhkov）表示：”没有偏离正常运行，这证实了新核燃料的设计特性。“2023年左右，在冷却和最高放射性水平消退后，试验燃料组件将在迪米特洛夫格勒的原子反应堆研究所进行更详细的检查。与此同时，TVEL负责科学和技术的副总裁亚历山大·乌格留莫夫说，“我们预计下一步...应该是几个带有所有混和燃料棒的燃料组件的试点运行。”没有提到下一阶段开发的时间表或具体的反应堆。再混合（再生混合物）燃料是从以前使用的燃料中回收的未分离混合物铀和钚制成的。它们被添加了低浓缩铀，以获得一种性能与仅由新鲜低浓缩铀制成的普通燃料相同的参数的燃料。这意味着反应器不需要任何修改就可以开始使用REMIX。再处理、再循环和加装的循环可以重复五次，每次都将废弃裂变产品移除，并在玻璃中玻璃化，准备永久地质处置。理论上，一个新的反应堆只需要三个混合燃料负载，并不断循环，就可以运行60年的整个设计寿命。去年8月，Rosatom批准投资建立一条REMIX燃料的完整生产线。铀钚燃料芯块将在克拉斯诺亚尔斯克地区热列兹诺戈尔斯克的采矿和化学联合工厂生产，那里已经有一个大型VVER-1000燃料储存设施。这些颗粒将在俄罗斯托木斯克地区塞夫斯克的西伯利亚化学联合企业制造成成品燃料组件。到目前为止，REMIX项目的重点是为VVER-1000反应堆创建一个新的燃料战略。该国还在国内外建造和运营较新的VVER-1200单元，以及较旧的RBMK模型。
中文源标题: 回收燃料试验成功

中文标题: 劳伦斯伯克利国家实验室获得三项2021年研发100大奖
情报来源: 美国能源部劳伦斯伯克利国家实验室网站
整编内容:
该实验室的三项技术获得了今年的R&D 100大奖，涉及存储和逻辑芯片、下一代电池以及辐射检测和测绘方面的技术创新。R&D 100大奖由美国R&D杂志颁发，旨在遴选出年度100项最具创新性和颠覆性的技术。这三项技术的简介如下：
1. 用于逻辑和存储芯片量产的新型光刻掩模材料
智能手机或计算机等设备的制造商不断尝试缩小系统芯片上的元件尺寸，以便在不增加成本的情况下增强芯片性能和功率。这一目标可通过光刻技术实现，通过将掩模图案快速复制到目标晶圆上来实现芯片的量产。但这项技术受到光源波长的影响，芯片尺寸越小，所需要的波长越短。极紫外光刻（EUVL）技术是一种新的光刻技术，使用极短波长的光（波长为10-14纳米的极紫外光）来绘制出非常小的图案。目前该技术已在大型芯片制造商中开始应用，但该技术面临的一大挑战是制造出需要确保吸收材料足够暗以充分阻挡光线的掩模图案。为此，伯克利实验室创造出了一种新的更暗的吸收材料——铬锑，该材料可以制成高质量的纳米薄膜，并且能够以高度的控制和分辨率绘制图案，最小可达5纳米。这一研究有望为逻辑和存储芯片的制造提供高分辨率、单次曝光和具有成本效益的光刻图案。
2. 下一代锂离子电池的新型正极材料
全球锂离子电池市场规模超过300亿美元，预计未来五年将翻一番，高性能、安全的电池对许多行业都至关重要。然而，在高电压下，目前用于锂离子电池的正极材料会随着时间的推移而退化，性能出现显著下降，从而限制了锂离子电池的广泛应用。改进的正极材料可以帮助电池在重复循环中以高容量和高电压可靠运行，而不牺牲性能、安全性或成本。为此，伯克利实验室开发了一种独特的正极材料，该材料使用层状岩盐共生结构，结合了富锂金属氧化物的高容量、阳离子有序层状结构的快速动力学以及阳离子无序岩盐结构的结构稳定性。这种材料可提供高容量、快速充电和能量传递，以及优异的循环稳定性和热稳定性。该研究展现了一种新的电池电极设计理念，开发出一类新的高性能共生正极材料。
3. 3D实时辐射检测和测绘平台
辐射源的探测和测绘对于国际安全、核反应堆安全工作至关重要。伯克利实验室的科学家开发了中子和伽马射线源定位和测绘平台（NG-LAMP），这是第一个三维实时测绘伽马射线和中子源的平台。与目前便携式辐射成像系统使用的二维方法相比，三维地图可以更好地确定特定区域或物体的污染或热点，从而实现更有效的规划和响应。NG-LAMP平台采用伯克利实验室开发的场景数据融合技术，通过设备上的传感器（包括激光雷达和视觉传感器）和辐射数据提供三维高分辨率的核辐射地图。伯克利实验室开发的一套软件，被称为“定位和绘图平台”，结合了设备收集的数据，机载计算单元实时使用这些数据生成三维放射性重建。
整编机构: 兵器210所
源标题: Berkeley Lab Honored with Three R&D 100 Awards
原文:
Three technologies from the U.S. Department of Energy’s (DOE) Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory (Berkeley Lab) have won a 2021 R&D 100 award, representing innovations for memory and logic chips, next-generation batteries, and radiation detection and mapping.
Presented by R&D Magazine, the R&D 100 Awards, which are selected by an independent panel of judges, recognize the year’s 100 most innovative and disruptive technology products from industry, academia, and government-sponsored research. Established in 1963, the R&D 100 Awards is the only science and technology awards competition that recognizes new commercial products, technologies, and materials for their technological significance that are available for sale or license.
Go here to see all of the winners. The three awards this year brings the total of Berkeley Lab R&D 100 wins to 108, including two Editors’ Choice Awards. The winners were honored in virtual awards ceremonies from Oct. 19-21, 2021.
Following are descriptions of the winning technologies:
A new lithography photomask material for mass production of logic and memory chips
Green stock image of logic and memory chip
Components that go onto chips are getting smaller and smaller, but current methods for copying patterns onto wafers are limited in their precision. (Credit: Pixabay/Michael Schwarzenberger)
Manufacturers of devices like smartphones or computers are continually trying to scale down the components that go onto each system-on-a-chip (SOC) in order to add performance and power without significantly raising costs. This downscaling is achieved using photolithography, which is the approach that enables high-volume manufacturing by rapidly copying the layout of a pattern from a photomask onto a target wafer. The technique is limited by the size of the wavelengths, and so downscaling has required increasingly shorter wavelengths.
A new photolithography technology called extreme ultraviolet lithography (EUVL), which uses extremely small-wavelength light and is capable of patterning very small features, has recently been deployed at the largest chip makers, but one challenge of the new technology is the thickness of the mask pattern that is required to ensure typical absorber materials are dark enough to sufficiently block the light. Berkeley Lab scientists have created a new, darker absorber material, chromium-antimony, that results in high-quality nanometer films and can be patterned with a high degree of control and resolution, down to 5 nanometers. The invention promises high resolution, single exposure, and cost-effective patterning for the fabrication of logic and memory chips.
Investigators: Daniel Staaks (PI), Stefano Cabrini (Molecular Foundry), Patrick Naulleau, Farhad Salmassi, Eric Gullikson (Center for X-ray Optics, Materials Sciences Division)
A novel cathode material for next-generation lithium-ion batteries
Layered-rocksalt intergrown oxide material.
The cathode in the Berkeley Lab invention uses a novel layered-rocksalt intergrown oxide material. (Credit: Berkeley Lab/Wei Tong)
The $30 billion-plus global lithium-ion battery market is expected to double in the next five years, with high performance, safe batteries critical to many industries. However, at high voltage, cathode materials currently used for Li-ion batteries degrade and show significant declining performance over time, limiting their usefulness in many key applications.
Improved cathode materials could help batteries operate reliably at high capacity and high voltage over repeated cycles without sacrificing performance, safety, or cost. Berkeley Lab scientists have developed a unique cathode material that uses a layered- rocksalt intergrown structure, combining the high capacity of lithium-rich metal oxides, fast kinetics of a cation-ordered layered structure, along with structural stability of a cation-disordered rocksalt structure. Such a material has been shown to offer high capacity, fast charging time and energy transfer, and superior cycling and thermal stability. In addition, the cost for raw materials to produce layered-rocksalt intergrown electrodes is estimated to be significantly less than that of lithium-rich layered oxides when expensive cobalt is completely replaced by cost-effective iron. This innovation exemplifies a new battery electrode design concept and opens up a new class of high-performance intergrown cathode materials.
Investigators: Wei Tong (PI), Ning Li, Meiling Sun, Jing Xu (Energy Technologies Area) and Wanli Yang (Energy Sciences Area)
A 3D, real-time radiation detection and mapping platform
Technical illustration depicting the lightweight NG-LAMP device includes LiDAR and visual sensors, radiation sensors, and a computing component.
The lightweight NG-LAMP device includes LiDAR and visual sensors, radiation sensors, and a computing component. (Credit: Berkeley Lab/Josh Cates)
Detection and mapping of radiation sources is critical for international security, nuclear reactor safety, and decontamination efforts. Berkeley Lab scientists developed the Neutron and Gamma Ray Source Localization and Mapping Platform (NG-LAMP), the first real-time platform for mapping gamma ray and neutron sources in three dimensions. 3D maps can pinpoint contamination or hotspots to specific areas or objects better than 2D approaches used by the current portable radiation imaging systems in the market, enabling more efficient planning and response.
The NG-LAMP platform employs Berkeley Lab-developed Scene Data Fusion, which provides 3D, high resolution nuclear radiation maps with data from sensors on the device (including LiDAR and visual sensors) and radiation data. A Berkeley Lab-developed software suite, dubbed the Localization and Mapping Platform, combines the data collected by the device, and, in real time, the onboard computing unit uses the data to produce 3D reconstructions of the radioactivity (without transmitting sensor data and performing computation on an external platform). The 3D maps are then transmitted to the user over WiFi.
The lightweight device is suitable for portable operations and for operations on unmanned aerial and ground vehicles. Such a capability can support the U.S. military, international inspectors, and law enforcement in locating radiation sources, as well as support nuclear reactor emergency response and decontamination efforts.
Investigators: Joshua Cates (PI), Ryan Pavlovsky, Victor Negut, Brian Quiter, Tenzing Joshi, Alex Moran (Physical Sciences Area)
中文原文: 美国能源部(DOE)劳伦斯伯克利国家实验室（伯克利实验室）的三项技术获得了2021年R&D 100奖，代表了存储器和逻辑芯片、下一代电池以及辐射检测和绘图的创新。R&D 100奖由R&D杂志颁发，由一个独立的评委小组选出，表彰来自工业界、学术界和政府资助研究的年度100个最具创新性和颠覆性的技术产品。成立于1963年的R&D 100奖是唯一的科技奖项竞赛，以表彰新的商业产品、技术和材料的技术意义，并可供销售或获得许可。去这里看看所有的获胜者。今年的三个奖项使伯克利实验室R&D 100获奖总数达到108个，包括两个编辑选择奖。获胜者在2021年10月19日至21日的虚拟颁奖仪式上获得荣誉。以下是获奖技术的描述：一种用于大规模生产逻辑和存储芯片的新型光刻光掩模材料逻辑和存储芯片的绿色股票图像芯片上的组件越来越小，但目前将图案复制到晶圆上的方法精度有限。（信用：Pixabay/Michael Schwarzenberger）智能手机或计算机等设备的制造商一直在努力缩小每个片上系统(SOC)上的组件，以便在不显著提高成本的情况下提高性能和功耗。这种缩小是通过光刻来实现的，光刻是一种通过将图案的布局从光掩模快速复制到目标晶片上来实现大批量制造的方法。这种技术受到波长大小的限制，因此缩小尺度需要越来越短的波长。一种称为极紫外光刻(EUVL)的新光刻技术最近在最大的芯片制造商中得到应用，它使用极小波长的光，能够形成非常小的特征，但新技术的一个挑战是掩模图案的厚度，该厚度需要确保典型的吸收材料足够暗以充分阻挡光。伯克利实验室的科学家们创造了一种新的、更暗的吸收剂材料--铬锑，这种材料可以产生高质量的纳米薄膜，并可以以高度的控制和分辨率制作图案，最低可达5纳米。本发明承诺用于制造逻辑和存储芯片的高分辨率、单次曝光和成本有效的图案化。调查人员：丹尼尔·斯塔克斯(PI)、斯特凡诺·卡布里尼（分子铸造）、帕特里克·瑙洛、法尔哈德·萨尔马西、埃里克·古利克森（X射线光学中心，材料科学部）新一代锂离子电池正极材料层状岩盐共生氧化物材料。伯克利实验室发明的阴极使用了一种新颖的层状岩石盐共生氧化物材料。（信用：伯克利实验室/魏彤）超过300亿美元的全球锂离子电池市场预计将在未来五年翻一番，高性能、安全的电池对许多行业至关重要。然而，目前用于锂离子电池的正极材料在高电压下降解，随着时间的推移表现出显著的性能下降，限制了它们在许多关键应用中的用途。改进的正极材料可以帮助电池在高容量和高电压下在重复循环中可靠地运行，而不牺牲性能、安全或成本。伯克利实验室的科学家开发了一种独特的正极材料，使用层状-岩盐共生结构，结合了富锂金属氧化物的高容量、阳离子有序层状结构的快速动力学以及阳离子无序岩盐结构的结构稳定性。这种材料已被证明具有高容量、快速充电时间和能量传递以及优越的循环和热稳定性。此外，当成本效益高的铁完全取代昂贵的钴时，生产层状-岩盐共生电极的原材料成本估计将显著低于富锂层状氧化物。这一创新体现了一种新的电池电极设计概念，并开辟了一种新型的高性能共生正极材料。调查人员：魏彤（皮）、宁利、孙美玲、徐靖（能源技术区）、杨万里（能源科学区）三维实时辐射探测与制图平台描述轻质NG-LAMP装置的技术说明包括激光雷达和视觉传感器、辐射传感器和计算组件。所述轻型NG灯装置包括激光雷达和视觉传感器、辐射传感器和计算组件。（信用：伯克利实验室/乔希·凯茨）辐射源的探测和测绘对国际安全、核反应堆安全至关重要
